prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Berry Blue Frozen Dessert?
completion:
Step 1: Toss 2 cups berries with sugar. Step 2: Let stand for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 3: Transfer berry-sugar mixture to food processor. Step 4: Add yogurt and process until smooth. Step 5: Strain through fine sieve. pour into baking pan (or transfer to ice cream maker and process according to manufacturers' directions). freeze uncovered until edges are solid but centre is soft.  transfer to processor and blend until smooth again. Step 6: Return to pan and freeze until edges are solid. Step 7: Transfer to processor and blend until smooth again.", 
"fold in remaining 2 cups of blueberries. Step 8: Pour into plastic mold and freeze overnight. let soften slightly to serve.

prompt: How do I make Biryani?
completion:
Step 1: Soak saffron in warm milk for 5 minutes and puree in blender. Step 2: Add chiles, onions, ginger, garlic, cloves, peppercorns, cardamom seeds, cinnamon, coriander and cumin seeds, poppy seeds, nutmeg, mace, cilantro or mint leaves and lemon juice. blend into smooth paste. put paste into large bowl, add yogurt and mix well. Step 3: Marinate chicken in yogurt mixture with salt, covered for at least 2 - 6 hours in refrigerator. Step 4: In skillet. heat oil over medium heat for 1 minute. add ghee and 15 seconds later add onion and fry for about8 minutes.", 
"reserve for garnish. Step 5: In same skillet, cook chicken with its marinade with tomatoes for about 10 minutes over medium heat, uncovered. Step 6: Remove chicken pieces from the sauce and set aside. add rice to sauce, bring to boil, and cook, covered over low heat for 15 minutes. Step 7: Return chicken and add raisins, cashews and almonds; mix well. Step 8: Simmer, covered for 5 minutes. Step 9: Place chicken, eggs and rice in large serving dish in such a way that yellow of the eggs, the saffron-colored rice, the nuts and the chicken make a colorful display.", 
"add reserved onion as garnish.

prompt: How do I make Best Lemonade?
completion: Step 1: Into a 1 quart jar with tight fitting lid, put sugar and lemon peel, or zest;  add 1 1/2 cups very hot water (not from tap!). with lid fitted firmly, shake jar until sugar is dissolved. Step 2: Add lemon juice. refrigerate until chilled. Step 3: To serve: into each 12-ounce glass, over ice cubes, pour 1/4 cup of the lemon syrup. Step 4: Then add chilled club soda or, if you prefer, water. Step 5: Stir to mix well.

prompt: How do I make Carina's Tofu-Vegetable Kebabs?
completion:
Step 1: Drain the tofu, carefully squeezing out excess water,  and pat dry with paper towels. Step 2: Cut tofu into one-inch squares. Step 3: Set aside.  cut  eggplant lengthwise in half, then cut each half into approximately three strips. Step 4: Cut strips crosswise into one-inch cubes. Step 5: Slice zucchini into half-inch thick  slices. Step 6: Cut red pepper in half, removing stem and seeds, and cut each half into  one-inch squares. Step 7: Wipe mushrooms clean with a moist paper towel and remove  stems. Step 8: Thread tofu and vegetables on to barbecue skewers in alternating color  combinations: for example, first a piece of eggplant, then a slice of tofu, then zucchini, then red pepper, baby corn and mushrooms.", 
"continue in this way until  all skewers are full. Step 9: Make the marinade by putting all ingredients in a  blender, and blend on high speed for about one minute until mixed. Step 10: Alternatively, put all ingredients in a glass jar, cover tightly with the lid  and shake well until mixed. Step 11: Lay the kebabs in a long, shallow baking pan or on  a non-metal tray, making sure they lie flat. evenly pour the marinade over the  kebabs, turning them once so that the tofu and vegetables are coated. Step 12: Refrigerate the kebabs for three to eight hours, occasionally spooning the  marinade over them.", 
"broil or grill the kebabs at 450 f for 15-20 minutes, or on the grill, until the vegetables are browned. Step 13: Suggestions  this meal can be served over cooked, brown rice. amounts can easily be doubled to make four servings.

prompt: How do I make Cabbage Soup?
completion: Step 1: Mix everything together and bring to a boil. Step 2: Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes (longer if you prefer your veggies to be soft). Step 3: Refrigerate until cool. Step 4: Serve chilled with sour cream.

prompt: How do I make Best Blackbottom Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Graham cracker crust: in small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar   and butter.  press evenly on bottom and sides of 9-inch pie plate. chill   until firm (about 1 hour). Step 2: Chocolate layer: in medium saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.   gradually stir in milk.  cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until   mixture boils.  remove from heat. in small bowl, beat egg yolks. gradually   stir in small amount of hot mixture; return to saucepan. cook over low   heat, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes. remove from heat.", 
"remove 1-1/2   cups custard to medium bowl; add  semi-sweet chocolate   morsels and vanilla extract. stir until morsels are melted and mixture is   smooth. Step 3: Pour into prepared graham cracker crust; chill until set (about 30   minutes). Step 4: While chocolate layer is chilling, prepare vanilla layer. Step 5: Vanilla layer: in large bowl, combine cold water and gelatin; let stand 5   minutes.  add remaining warm custard; stir until gelatin dissolves.  cool 15   minutes.  stir in rum; beat with wire whisk until smooth. set aside.", 
"in   1-1/2 quart bowl, combine egg whites and cream of tartar; beat until foamy.  gradually add sugar; beat until stiff peaks form.  fold egg whites into   custard; pour over chocolate layer. Step 6: Chill until set (about 2 hours). Step 7: Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate shavings, if desired. Step 8: Makes one   9-inch pie.

prompt: How do I make Warm Chicken A La King?
completion: Step 1: Melt 1 1/2 ozs butter, add the flour and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring. Step 2: Gradually add milk and cook, stirring, until thick and smooth. Step 3: Melt the  remaining butter and saute sliced celery, button mushrooms and chopped pepper  until soft but not coloured. Step 4: Add celery, mushrooms, pepper, chicken and  pimiento to the sauce and heat through. Step 5: Season to taste.  combine the egg  yolks, double cream and worcestershire sauce. add to the chicken mixture and  heat through. Step 6: Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with chopped parsley.

prompt: How do I make Buttermilk Pie With Gingersnap Crumb Crust?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Make pie crust, using 8 inch pie pan, do not bake. Step 3: Mix sugar and margarine in medium bowl until blended; beat in egg whites and egg. Step 4: Stir in flour, salt, and buttermilk until well blended. Step 5: Pour filling into prepared crust, bake 40 minutes or until sharp knife inserted near center comes out clean. Step 6: Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve warm or chilled. Step 7: Combine graham crumbs, gingersnap crumbs, and margarine in 8 or 9 inch pie pan, pat mixture evenly on bottom and side of pan.", 
"bake 8 to 10 minutes or until edge of crust is lightly browned. Step 8: Cool on wire rack.

prompt: How do I make A Jad - Cucumber Pickle?
completion: Step 1: Slice the cucumber in four lengthwise, then slice the pieces to segments about an eighth of an inch thick. Step 2: Slice the tops of the chilies (green ones can be used if red are not available, but thais like the color contrast), tap out any loose seeds and discard, then slice the chilies across into thin rounds. Step 3: Slice the shallots and water chestnuts. Step 4: Combine and serve. this will keep 2 or 3 weeks in a refrigerator.

prompt: How do I make Butter Pecan Cookies?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: Cream butter in large mixing bowl. Step 3: Gradually add brown sugar and granulated sugar. Step 4: Cream well. Step 5: Add unbeaten egg yolk and vanilla and beat well. Step 6: Blend in sifted flour to form a stiff dough. Step 7: Shape dough into small balls. Step 8: Place on greased cookie sheet. flatten cookies with bottom of glass dipped in sugar. Step 9: Bake at 350 degrees for 7-9 minutes, till golden brown (do not overbrown.) cool before frosting. Step 10: Garnish with pecan halves.

prompt: How do I make Boston Cream Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Step 2: Gradually add 1/2 cup sugar, beating until very stiff peaks form. Step 3: Sift together remaining dry ingredients into another bowl. Step 4: Add oil, half the  milk and vanilla. Step 5: Beat 1 minute at medium speed. Step 6: Add remaining milk and egg yolks. Step 7: Beat 1 minute, scrape bowl. Step 8: Gently fold in egg whites. Step 9: Bake in two greased 9x 1.5-inch round pans in 350°f oven for 25 minutes. Step 10: Cool 10 minutes and then remove from pans. Step 11: Cool completely. Step 12: Fill with cream filling.", 
"frost with chocolate glaze. Step 13: French custard filling: in saucepan, combine sugar, flour, cornstarch and salt.  gradually stir in milk. Step 14: Cook and stir until mixture thickens and boils; cook and stir 2-3 minutes longer. Step 15: Stir a little of hot mixture into egg yolk; return to hot mixture. Step 16: Cook and stir until mixture just boils. Step 17: Add vanilla; cool. Step 18: Beat until smooth; fold in whipped cream. Step 19: Chocolate glaze: melt chocolate and butter over low heat, stirring constantly. Step 20: Remove from heat. stir in confectioners' sugar and vanilla until crumbly.", 
"blend in 3 tablespoons boiling water. Step 21: Add enough water (about 2 teaspoons), a teaspoon at a time, to form medium glaze of pouring consistency. Step 22: Pour quickly over top of cake; spread glaze evenly over top and sides.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Breasts Lombardi?
completion:
Step 1: Cook mushrooms in 2 tbsp butter in a large  skillet, stirring constantly, just   until tender. Step 2: Remove from heat; set aside.  cut each chicken breast half in  half lengthwise.   place each piece of chicken  between two sheets of wax paper; flatten to  1/8\" thickness, using a meat  mallet or rolling pin. Step 3: Dredge chicken pieces in flour. Step 4: Place 5 or 6  pieces of chicken in 1 to 2  tbsp butter in a  large skillet; cook over medium  heat 3 to 4 minutes on each  side or until  golden. Step 5: Place chicken in a lightly  greased 13x9\" baking dish,  overlapping  edges.", 
"repeat procedure with  remaining chicken and butter. Step 6: Reserve pan  drippings in skillet.  sprinkle  reserved mushrooms over chicken. Step 7: Add wine and  broth to skillet.  bring to a boil;  reduce heat, and simmer,  uncovered, 10  minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 8: Stir in salt and pepper. Step 9: Pour  sauce over  chicken. Step 10: Combine cheeses and green  onions; sprinkle over chicken. Step 11: Bake  uncovered at 450 for 12 to 14 minutes. Step 12: Broil 5 1/2\" away from heat 1 to  2  minutes or until browned.

prompt: How do I make Biscotti Di Prato?
completion:
Step 1: Egg wash 1 egg, large 1 tsp water in the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with the paddle attachment blend the flour, the sugar, the baking powder, and the salt until the mixture is combined well. Step 2: In a small bowl, whisk together the whole eggs, the yolks, the vanilla and the almond extract, add the mixture to the flour mixture, beating until a dough is formed, and stir in the almonds. Step 3: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface, knead it several times, and divide it into fourths.", 
"working on 2 large buttered and floured baking sheets, with floured hands form each piece of dough into a flattish log 11 inches long and 2 inches wide, arrange the logs at least 3 inches apart on the sheets, and brush them with the egg wash. Step 4: Bake the logs in a preheated 350f oven for 35 minutes and let them cool on the baking sheets on racks for 10 minutes. Step 5: On a cutting board, cut the logs crosswise on the diagonal into 3/4\" inch slices, arrange them the biscotti, cut sides down, on the baking sheets, and bake them in the 350f oven for 5 to 7 minutes on each side, or until they are pale golden.", 
"transfer the biscotti to racks to cool and store them in airtight containers.

prompt: How do I make Chai Tea?
completion: Step 1: Bring water and spices to boil in saucepan. Step 2: Reduce heat, cover and simmer 20  minutes. Step 3: Add teabags and milk, simmer 3-5 minutes. Step 4: Add sweetner to taste. serves 4. Step 5: (the tea becomes spicier as it sits, may want to strain out spices).

prompt: How do I make Cafe Cappuccino?
completion: Step 1: Stir ingredients together. Step 2: Process in a blender until powdered. Step 3: Use 2 tbsp.  of mixture for each cup of hot water.

prompt: How do I make Jimmy G's Carrot Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Grease and lightly flour 2 9x1 1/2-inch round baking pans or grease one 13x9x2-inch baking pan. Step 2: Set pan(s) aside. in a large mixing bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and 5 spice seasoning. Step 3: Add carrots, oil, eggs, coconut.  beat with electric mixer till combined. Step 4: Add walnuts, and raisins and fold into batter. Step 5: Pour batter into prepared baking pan(s). bake in a 350~f oven for 30 - 35 minutes for round pans or 35 - 40 minutes for 13x9-inch pan or until a wooden toothpick comes out clean.", 
"cool layer cakes on wire racks for 10 minutes. Step 6: Remove from pans. Step 7: Cool thoroughly on wire racks. Step 8: Or, place 13x9-inch can in pan on a wire rack; cool thoroughly. Step 9: Frost with cream cheese frosting. Step 10: Cover and store in refrigerator.

prompt: How do I make Carrot Cake?
completion: Step 1: Beat together the eggs, oil, and white sugar. blend mixture for thirty seconds. Step 2: Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and spices. add the  carrots and raisins. Step 3: Pour egg mixture into dry ingredients, and mix well. pour  batter into well greased 10 inch tube or bundt pan. Step 4: Bake at 350 degrees f (175  degrees c) oven for 45 to 50 minutes. cool cake on wire rack, and then  refrigerate until completely cooled. Step 5: To make cream cheese glaze: blend together  confectioners' sugar, cream cheese, corn syrup, and vanilla. spread over cooled  cake.

prompt: How do I make Betty Crocker's Southwestern Guacamole Dip?
completion: Step 1: Peel and mash avocados until lumpy. Step 2: Add remaining ingredients and chill for 1 - 2 hours.

prompt: How do I make Buttermilk Pie?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°f. Step 2: Beat the butter and sugar together until light. Step 3: Add the eggs and beat; then beat in vanilla. Step 4: Sift the dry ingredients together and add to the batter alternatively with the buttermilk; beat until smooth. Step 5: Pour into a deep dish pie shell and bake at 400f for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 350f and bake for 50-60 additional minutes. Step 6: Pie should turn a nice golden brown and a knife inserted should come out clean. Step 7: I think it is absolutely best when it is just still warm. (not too hot, or it will be like napalm.).

prompt: How do I make Black Bean Salsa?
completion: Step 1: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Step 2: Serve with tortilla chips.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Burgundy Beef & Vegetable Stew?
completion:
Step 1: Trim fat from beef, cut into 1-inch pieces. Step 2: In dutch oven, heat oil over medium high hunt until hot. add beef (half at a time) and brown evenly, stirring occasionally. Step 3: Pour off drippings. Step 4: Season with thyme, salt and pepper. Step 5: Stir in broth, wine and garlic. bring to boil; reduce heat to low. Step 6: Cover tightly and simmer 1 1/2 hours. Step 7: Add carrots and onions. Step 8: Cover and continue cooking 35 to 40 minutes or until beef and vegetables are tender. Step 9: Bring beef stew to a boil over medium-high heat. add cornstarch mixture; cook and stir 1 minute. stir in sugar snap peas.", 
"reduce heat to medium and cook 3 to 4 minutes or until peas are heated through.

prompt: How do I make Lou's Fabulous Bruschetta?
completion: Step 1: Cut baguette into slices. Step 2: Butter and then sprinkle garlic powder each piece, and bake till lightly golden brown. Step 3: Mix garlic powder, parmesan cheese, and salt in the ricotta cheese, till a lovely blended taste. Step 4: Dice tomatoes in small cubes,   add olive oil, and  small strips of fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips. Step 5: Spread the ricotta mixture, generously on the cooled garlic bread slices. Step 6: Top with tomato mixture and bake at 350f for 10 minutes. Step 7: Enjoy!

prompt: How do I make Blueberry Dessert?
completion: Step 1: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Step 2: Mix 2 cups baking mix, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup butter  and egg yolks until crumbly. Step 3: Press into ungreased rectangular pan, 13x9x2\". Step 4: Bake 10 min. Step 5: Beat egg whites until stiff; fold in blueberries. Step 6: Spread over baked  layer. Step 7: Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly; sprinkle over blueberry mixture. bake until golden brown, about 20 min.

prompt: How do I make Brownie Heart Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Cake:  grease 5 cup heart shaped pan; dust with unsweetened cocoa Step 2: Powder and set aside.  in bowl, blend together brown sugar, butter and vanilla; add eggs, one at a time, beating well with wooden spoon after each addition. Step 3: Sift together flour, cocoa and salt; add all at once to creamed mixture, mixing just until blended. Step 4: Stir in nuts; spread in prepared pan. Step 5: Loosely cover tip of heart with foil to prevent from drying out. bake in 350xf oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until just barley firm to the touch.", 
"let cool in pan for 10 minutes; turn out onto rack and let cool completely. Step 6: Frosting:  in top of double boiler over hot, not boiling, water, melt white chocolate with butter. Step 7: (alternatively, in microwaveable dish, microwave at medium/50% for 1 to 2 minutes or until softened.)  remove from heat and let cool slightly; stir in sour cream until smooth and blended. Step 8: Refrigerate for 10 minutes; spread smoothly over sides then top of cooled cake. garnish:  sprinkle cocoa in attractive pattern on top of cake. arrange almonds around top edge.

prompt: How do I make Black Bean, Corn, and Tomato Salad?
completion: Step 1: In a bowl whisk together lemon juice, oil, and salt to taste. Step 2: Stir in remaining ingredients, except lettuce leaves, with salt and black pepper to taste. Step 3: Let salad stand, stirring once or twice, 15 minutes for flavors to develop. Step 4: Line 2 plates with lettuce and divide salad between them.

prompt: How do I make Cabbage and Sausage Soup?
completion: Step 1: In a medium stockpot or dutch oven heat olive oil, over high heat, and saute sausage for 3 minutes. Step 2: Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside. add onion, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper and sun dried tomatoes. Step 3: Reduce heat to medium high and saute until onions are soft, about 3 - 5 minutes. Step 4: Stir in the wine and cook 2 minutes. Step 5: Add cabbage, reserved sausage and chicken stock. Step 6: Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Step 7: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - notes :    to serve, place a piece of garlic toast in the bottom of the bowl and ladle soup over top.

prompt: How do I make Almond Pound Cake?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Cream butter and almond paste until fluffy. Step 3: Add sugar, gradually add eggs, one at a time.  mix together flour, cornstarch and baking powder, then add flour mixture and milk alternately. Step 4: Bake in greased 9x5 loaf pan for 1 hour. Step 5: Double recipe for a bundt pan and bake 75 minute. Step 6: Cool 10 min in pan, then turn out and cool completely. Step 7: Serve with powdered sugar, orange glaze or chocolate glaze.

prompt: How do I make Black Coffee Barbecue Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan and simmer over low heat for 20  minutes. Step 2: Cool, then puree in a blender or food processor until smooth. Step 3: This can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks in a covered  container.

prompt: How do I make Bourbon Pecan Pound Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Combine butter and sugar in bowl of electric mixer and blend until light and fluffy. Step 2: Add eggs one at a time, beating constantly. Step 3: Sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg. Step 4: Blend sour cream and bourbon. Step 5: Alternately add flour and sour cream mixture to batter. Step 6: Add pecans. Step 7: Grease bottom and sides of tube or bunt pan. Step 8: Pour in batter and bake at 325 degrees for about one hour and 30 minutes. Step 9: Test cake frequently after first hour and 15 minutes for doneness. Step 10: Let cake cool in pan for 15 minutes before turning out on wire rack.", 
"to prepare glaze, combine sugar and bourbon. Step 11: Stir while gradually adding water. Step 12: Add only enough water to make a pourable glaze without allowing mixture to become too thin. Step 13: Pour glaze over top of warm cake and let dribble down sides.

prompt: How do I make Chicago Style Pizza?
completion:
Step 1: For crust, dissolve yeast in water. Step 2: Add sugar,  salt and 2 tablespoons oil. Step 3: Stir in flour to make a soft  dough. Step 4: Turn out onto well floured board. Step 5: Knead about 3  minutes. Step 6: Put in greased bowl; cover and let rise in warm place  about 1 1/2  hours. Step 7: Brush a 14-inch deep-dish pizza pan with  2 tablespoons oil; sprinkle  with corn meal. Step 8: Punch dough down;  press in bottom of pan. Step 9: Let rise 30 minutes. Step 10: Punch down  again, lightly coat with olive oil. Step 11: Cook at 450 degrees for  about  10 minutes until set. (punch down dough after 5 minutes or so.) arrange cheese  over dough.", 
"place pepperoni,  olives, peppers and mushrooms over cheese. spread  pizza sauce. sprinkle with oregano, crushed pepper and  parmesan cheese. place  pizza in oven and cook at 450 degrees  until cheese is melted and crust is  golden (about 20 to 25 minutes). makes  8 slices.

prompt: How do I make Chicha Peruana?
completion:
Step 1: Procedure: mash for 90 minutes at 160°f. Step 2: We did two 1.5 gallon batches, each spiced differently (one with curacao/coriander, the other with allspice/cinammon). we would rather have used a higher proportion of jora, but on brewday we discovered that our ability to determine the weight of things is seriously imparied. Step 3: Instead of the 4.5lbs we thought we had, we found we had only 3lbs of jora. Step 4: Rather than readjust (the og would have been more appropriate at ~1.045 in any case), we added more sugar, a course of action that was inspired by homebrewed weizen as much as anything else. the result is a very tasty beverage, pretty big all the way around on corn, and yet the flavor is quite subtle. be warned that chicha is at its peak 2 to 4 days after pitching while it still retains some sweetness and body.", 
"once the chicha ferments out, you are left with a fairly bland beverage that reminds me of iced tea more than anything else. if i'd been thinking (chicha lends itself to gulping), i would have kegged the stuff on the third day after pitching and stuck it in the fridge. while we took the trouble to grow our own (blue) corn, i see no reason why one could not start with good ol' yellow corn from the grocery store (domestic 20-row?) in fact, i plan on doing this if only to see what kind of chicha it makes.", 
"specifics:  og: 1.055  fg: 1.012 types of chicha so far, there appear to me to be several main ways in which chicha de jora is made. these range in difficulty from trivial to a process almost indentical to what barley-beer homebrewers are familiar with. Step 5: Facil (easy) - corn is mixed with water and sugar and allowed to sit for several days until the corn begins to germinate. the sugar ferments and the corn, lending nothing fermentable, adds flavor. Step 6: Abbreviated - the jora is mashed but the mash is ultimately brought to a boil, allowed to settle, and the clear liquid, or upi, now finished chicha, is drawn off.", 
"traditional - similiar to the abbreviated method, but the jora is mashed and the mash is allowed to settle. the upi is drawn off the mash into a separate vessel for boiling. Step 7: Modern - the ground jora is mashed and lautered through some sort of filtering device such as a manifold or false bottom. Step 8: This process is helped by the inclusion of some crushed malted barley (barley assisted). the first is apparently how much chicha is made in people's kitchens. Step 9: Bill ridgely describes most of the others in his articles.", 
"also note that the methods that include mashing use a batch sparge. that is, the sweet liquor (upi) is merely drained from the mash and there are no continuous additions of sparge water to the surface of the mash. Step 10: Certainly sparging can be performed if desired, but it is neither traditional nor necessary (corn kernels have no husk and therefore do not form a filterbed). chicha is traditionally allowed to spontaneously ferment. for the last type (modern), george duarte suggests that ground, unmalted corn could be mixed with a small amount of crushed 2-row malted barley and boiled for 20 minutes or so to gelatinize the starch in the corn.", 
"this gooey mass would then be added to more water and barley malt and mashed as per 'normal' homebrew procedures. Step 11: This could probably be sparged as usual.

prompt: How do I make Buckwheat Bread?
completion:
Step 1: Proof the yeast in the lukewarm water with the sugar. Step 2: After you get a yeast sponge add the buttermilk (room temperature), salt, eggs and the three different kinds of flour and caraway seeds. Step 3: Mix well. Step 4: Take the dough out onto a lightly floured work surface, kneading until smooth. Step 5: Place the dough in a large buttered bowl, cover with a towel and let stand in a warm place to rise until doubled in bulk. Step 6: This will take from 1~/2 to 2 hours. Step 7: Take the dough out and punch it down a couple of times.", 
"knead and shape the dough into a loaf and place in a buttered loaf pan (9~ by 5~). let stand in a warm place, covered with a towel, to rise for about 1 hour or until doubled in size. preheat the oven to 400 degrees. brush the bread with a little melted butter and bake in the oven for about 30 minutes or until light brown and the bread sounds hollow when tapped with your finger. Step 8: Cool wrapped in a towel.

prompt: How do I make Chicken and Dumplings?
completion:
Step 1: Place chickens in large saucepan, cover with water and bring to a boil. Step 2: Simmer until chickens are tender. Step 3: Remove chickens from pan and set aside. remove backbones. Step 4: Add chopped carrot, celery and onion and simmer 30 minutes. Step 5: Add chicken stock base and remove from heat. strain and reserve stock. Step 6: Melt butter and stir in 1 cup flour until smooth. Step 7: Add to straine reserved chicken stock. Step 8: Simmer 5 minutes. Step 9: Add sherry and lemon juice, salt to taste and, if desired, food color.", 
"for dumplings, combine 1 1/2 cups flour, baking powder and 1/4 tsp salt in mixing bowl. Step 10: Cut in shortening until mixture resembles cornmeal. Step 11: Stir in milk until just blended. Step 12: Place about 1/2 inch water in saucepan with wire rack that comes 2 to 3 inches above water line. cover rack with lightly oiled waxed paper, oiled side up. Step 13: With water gently simmering, drop dumplings by tablespoon onto waxed paper, leaving room in between for expansion. Step 14: Steam 8 minutes, uncovered, then cover and steam 7 minutes longer.", 
"meanwhile, remove skin from cooked chicken and bone, if desired. Step 15: Cut in large pieces. Step 16: Place chicken pieces in casserole. arrange dumplings on chicken. Step 17: Cover with sauce and sprinkle with peas for color.

prompt: How do I make Brownie Pudding?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: Combine flour, granulated sugar, 1/4  cup cocoa,  baking powder and salt in a bowl. Step 3: Stir in milk, butter and vanilla  until  smooth. Step 4: Stir in chocolate chips. Step 5: Spread in ungreased shallow 1  1/2 quart  casserole.  sprinkle brown sugar and 1/4 cup cocoa on top. Step 6: Place in oven, pour  boiling water over top. Step 7: Bake 35 minutes, cool 10 minutes before  serving. Step 8: Serve with ice cream if desired.

prompt: How do I make Bratwurst?
completion:
Step 1: Grind the veal and pork with a 3/8 in.  (0.95 cm) plate. Step 2: Place the ground meat into a mixing tub and add all remaining ingredients. Step 3: Mix very thoroughly. Step 4: Return to the cooler and chill at least 1 hour. Step 5: Stuff the prepared casings.tie into 4 in.  (10 cm) links. Step 6: Poach the sausages in good veal stock for the best flavor. Step 7: Cover with the cold stock and heat gently. Step 8: Maintain a temperature of no more than 160 f (710c). when the sausages reach an internal temperature of 140 f (60 c), remove from the stock.", 
"cool quickly. Step 9: Dry wrap, and refrigerate for use.

prompt: How do I make Brownie Cheesecake Torte?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Step 2: Combine first 4 ingredients in a bowl. Step 3: Firmly press mixture into bottom and 1 inch up sides of a 9-inch springform pan coated with cooking spray. Step 4: Set aside. combine 1/2 cup sugar, flour, vanilla, and cheeses;  beat at medium speed of a mixer until well-blended. Step 5: Add egg whites and 2 tablespoons milk; beat well. Step 6: Combine 1/2 cup batter, 1 tablespoon milk, 2 tablespoons sugar, and cocoa in a small bowl; stir well. Step 7: Spoon remaining batter alternately with cocoa mixture into prepared crust. swirl together using the tip of a knife.  bake at 425 degrees for 10 minutes.", 
"reduce oven temperature to 250 degrees; bake 45 minutes or until almost set. cool completely on a wire rack. Step 8: Garnish with chocolate syrup and fresh raspberries, if desired.

prompt: How do I make California Chilled Salsa?
completion: Step 1: * also delicious made with red sweet peppers or a combination of red and  green for nice color. Step 2: Combine all ingredients; if finer texture is desired may be put  through food grinder using fine blade. Step 3: Cover tightly and chill overnight. Step 4: Serving ideas : serve cold as a relish with meat. Step 5: Kim c.

prompt: How do I make Alfredo Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Place butter in microwave safe pot and heat on high for 30 seconds or until melted. Step 2: Add cream and warm on high for approximately 1 minute. Step 3: Add parmesan cheese and warm until cheese melts. Step 4: Add salt and pepper to taste. (if serving with shrimp, you might not need much salt.). Step 5: Pour over 4 servings of warm noodles (i use angel hair) and toss to coat. serve immediately. Step 6: Notes: i serve it with cubed, grilled or broiled chicken breast mixed in with the noodles or shrimp. add a green salad and you have a complete meal. i have used margarine and canned parmesan cheese and it worked fine.

prompt: How do I make Buttermilk Ranch Dressing?
completion: Step 1: Mash together garlic and salt to form a paste.  remove to a small bowl. Step 2: Whisk in buttermilk sour cream, lime juice, parsley, chives, and salt and pepper. Step 3: Taste  and adjust seasonings. Step 4: Use immediately or cover and refrigerate.

prompt: How do I make Brisket with Sauerkraut and Applesauce?
completion:
Step 1: In a large cook pot place undrained tomatoes, sauerkraut with applesauce and  brown sugar. Step 2: Bring to a boil. Step 3: Lower heat and add brisket so that mixture can  cover some of brisket.cover and simmer until meat is fork tender ( about 3 hours ); spooning sauce over brisket intermittently. Step 4: When meat is done, place brisket  on serving platter. Step 5: Remove excess fat from pot. season sauce to taste ( more  sugar, spices etc. ). thicken if desired with a bit of cornstarch mixed with  some cold water and add to sauce and cook and stir till thickened.", 
"for best  serving, prepare brisket ahead of time, let cool completely, slice meat, cover  with sauce and refrigerate till needed ( may be frozen ). gently reheat and  serve slices of meat and sauce.

prompt: How do I make Bread Pudding?
completion: Step 1: Mix bread and milk together. Step 2: Add the 2 eggs and the 2 egg yolks with 5 tbsp of sugar and salt. Step 3: Add to the milk mixture will be the vanilla and butter. Step 4: Mix well and pour into a slightly greased 1 1/2 quart casserole. Step 5: Bake in a pie pan of water at 350° oven for 45 minutes. Step 6: For the meringue topping: beat the egg whites until stiff and add the 4 tbsp of sugar to it. Step 7: Pour in slowly Step 8: Top the already baked pudding with it--making swirly peaks for decorations. Step 9: Bake again at 300° until a golden brown.

prompt: How do I make All Purpose Quick Mix With 28 Variations?
completion:
Step 1: Blend flours, baking powder and salt.  cut  butter or margarine into flour mixture until  it resembles coarse cornmeal. Step 2: Store  tightly covered in refrigerator or  freezer until needed. Step 3: To prepare a variation:  mix together baking mix and additional ingredients listed in one of the variations.  spread batter in a 13x9 inch loaf pan  and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or until done.  you may also make as muffins; baking time will be shorter. Step 4: There are 28 variations of what you can do with  this mix: variations include  almond, apple, apricot, banana,  blueberry, butterscotch chip, carrot, chocolate or carob chip, coconut,  cranberry, date, fig, granola, lemon, orange, peach,  pineapple, peanut, pear,  pecan, pineapple, prune, pumpkin, raisin, spice, yam,  walnut, yogurt & zucchini---with this same mix as the base for all of them! here are the variations:", 
"sweet potato or yam:    3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons cinnamon  1/2 teaspoons allspice  1 cup chopped 1 cup mashed, cooked sweet potato  nuts  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1/3 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1/2 cup milk. Step 5: Walnut:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped walnuts  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 1/4 cup milk. Step 6: Yogurt:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1/2 teaspoons baking soda  1 cup chopped nuts 1 cup yogurt, any flavor   1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1/2 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 2/3 cup milk.", 
"zucchini:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons cinnamon  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup shredded zucchini  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 2/3 cup milk or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 cup milk. Step 7: Almond:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons almond extract  1 cup sliced almonds  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 1/4 cup milk. Step 8: Apple:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons cinnamon  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup apple, shredded  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 2/3 cup milk or apple juice or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 cup milk or  apple juice.", 
"apricot:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup diced, dried apricots  1 egg  3/4 cup honey - 3/4 cup apricot nectar or 1 cup sugar - 1 cup apricot nectar. Step 9: Banana:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup mashed bananas  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1/3 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1/2 cup milk. Step 10: Blueberry:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons grated orange peel  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup blueberries  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 cup orange juice. Step 11: Butterscotch chip:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons vanilla  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup butterscotch chips  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 1/4 cup milk.", 
"carrot:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons cinnamon  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup grated carrot  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 2/3 cup milk or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 cup milk. Step 12: Chocolate or carob chip:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup chcolate or carob chips 1 egg   2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 1/4 cup milk. Step 13: Coconut:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped nuts  3/4 cup coconut  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 1/4 cup milk.", 
"cranberry:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 tbsp grated orange peel  1 cup chopped nuts  3/4 cup cranberries, chopped  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 3/4 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 cup orange  juice. Step 14: Date:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 tbsp grated orange peel  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup dates, chopped 1 egg   2/3 cup honey - 3/4 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 cup orange juice. Step 15: Fig:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1/2 teaspoons cinnamon  1/2 teaspoons allspice  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup chopped, dried figs  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 3/4 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 cup orange juice.", 
"granola:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup granola  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk, apple, or orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 1/4 cup milk, apple, or orange juice. Step 16: Lemon:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  2 tbsp grated lemon peel  1 cup chopped nuts  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 1/4 cup milk. Step 17: Orange:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  2 tbsp grated orange peel  1 cup chopped nuts  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 1/4 cup orange juice. Step 18: Peach:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons cinnamon  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup diced, dried peaches  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 3/4 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 cup orange juice.", 
"peanut:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped peanuts  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 1/4 cup milk. Step 19: Pear:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons cinnamon  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup diced, dried pears  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 3/4 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 cup orange juice. Step 20: Pecan:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped pecans  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 1 1/4 cup milk. Step 21: Pineapple:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 tbsp grated orange peel  1 cup chopped nuts  2/3 cup drained, crushed pineapple  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 2/3 cup orange juice or 3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed - 3/4 cup  orange juice.", 
"prune:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 tbsp grated orange peel  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup chopped, dried prunes  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 3/4 cup prune juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 cup prune juice. Step 22: Pumpkin:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 teaspoons cinnamon  1/2 teaspoons allspice  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup canned pumpkin  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1/3 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1/2 cup. Step 23: Raisin:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1 cup chopped nuts  1 cup raisins  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 3/4 cup milk or orange juice or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 cup milk or orange juice.", 
"spice:  3 1/2 cup quick mix  1/2 teaspoons cinnamon  1/2 teaspoons nutmeg  1/4 teaspoons cloves  1 cup chopped nuts  1 egg  2/3 cup honey - 1 cup milk or 3/4 cup sugar - 1 1/4 cup milk.

prompt: How do I make Brazilian Empadinhas?
completion:
Step 1: Dough cut butter into salt and flour. Step 2: Stir in rest of the ingredients and knead to  combine or just process everything until it forms a ball. Step 3: Let rest covered 1  hour make balls the size of a walnut, from 2/3  of the dough and line small  muffin tins with the dough. Step 4: Place 2 tsp. of the cold filling into the lined  tins. Step 5: Make small balls with the rest of the dough. Step 6: Flatten them to make lids for the mini pies. Step 7: Brush tops with egg yolk bake in preheated 350 f oven for 30 to  35 minutes or until golden brown.", 
"shrimp filling clean and devein shrimp, saving heads and shells. Step 8: Make a broth with the shells  and heads and 2 cups water. Step 9: Cook 1 hour, uncovered over low heat. strain broth  and cook it down to 1/2 cup. Step 10: Cook onions and garlic in olive oil until they  start changing color. Step 11: Add bell pepper and cook 2 minutes, add tomatoes, broth  and seasonings and simmer almost to a paste. add shrimp and cook just until they become opaque. stir in cornstarch diluted in 2 tbsp water. Step 12: Stir until thick.", 
"add parsley. Step 13: Let cool before using Step 14: Notes : may use other fillings such as chicken, hearts of palms, cheese miriam podcameni posvolsky rio de janeiro

prompt: How do I make Bubble and Squeak?
completion:
Step 1: Wash potatoes under cold running water then place in a large saucepan. Step 2: Cover with salted water, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer until soft, uncovered, about 15 minutes. Step 3: Drain and set aside and allow to cool slightly. Step 4: Peel potatoes and mash. Step 5: Add butter and cream and mix well. Step 6: Meanwhile fry bacon until crisp. Step 7: Drain on paper towel and set aside. in the same skillet add onion to bacon drippings and saute until soft, about 3 - 5 minutes. Step 8: Stir in celery, sage and pepper and saute 2 minutes longer.", 
"add lemon juice. combine vegetables with mashed potatoes, stir well to combine and refrigerate for 2 hours. Step 9: Shape potato mixture into 10 patties. Step 10: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet and saute patties until brown and crispy, about 5 minutes per side. crumble bacon over top and serve.                    - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

prompt: How do I make Braised Brussels Sprouts With Vinegar and Dill?
completion: Step 1: Trim sprouts; halved if desired. Step 2: In large pot of boiling salted water, cook brussels sprouts for 8 minutes if whole, 6 minutes if halved, or until barely tender. Step 3: Drain, refresh under cold running water and drain again. Step 4: In well-greased 13x9-inch casserole, combine sprouts, dill, vinegar, and salt and pepper to taste; mix well. Step 5: Bake, covered, in 350°f oven for 10 minutes. Step 6: Uncover and bake for 5 minutes longer.

prompt: How do I make Butter Madeira Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Grease lined tin with melted butter. Step 2: Sift flour and baking powder into  processor and add all remaining ingredients. Step 3: Run machine for 20 counts. Step 4: Scrape  down sides. Step 5: Run machine for a further 30 counts. Step 6: Transfer to prepared tin and spread evenly with a spatula.  bake at 160° c for 1 1/2 hours. Step 7: Leave in tin 15 minutes  before turning onto a rack. Step 8: Variations seed cake = add 2-3 tsp caraway seeds after scraping down the sides. Step 9: Orange cake = omit vanilla. Step 10: Add 1 tsp orange peel.", 
"lemon cake = add 1 tsp lemon peel. Step 11: Chocolate speckle cake = add 1 crushed chocolate flake bar after scraping down sides. Step 12: Raisin cake = add 3 oz raisins after scraping down sides. Step 13: Spicy cake = add 2-3 tsp mixed spice with the other ingredients.

prompt: How do I make Butter Dips?
completion:
Step 1: Heat oven to 450. Step 2: Melt butter in oven oblong 13 x 9 1/2 x 3 inch pan. Step 3: Remove when butter is melted. Step 4: Sift dry ingredients into bowl. Step 5: Add milk. Step 6: Stir slowly with a fork until dough just clings together. Step 7: Knead lightly about 10 times. Step 8: Roll out 1/2 inch thick into rectangular 12 x 8 inch pan. Step 9: Cut in half lengthwise, then crosswise into 16 strips. Step 10: Dip each strip on both sides in melted butter. Step 11: Place close together in two rows. Step 12: Bake 15-20 minutes until golden brown.", 
"serve piping hot.

prompt: How do I make Brownies?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven. Step 2: It must be hot to begin the baking. Step 3: Cut the chocolate and the butter into small pieces and put together in a pan. Step 4: Cook until butter and chocolate are well melted and mixed (one  or two minutes). don't let the chocolate burn or it will become too much bitter! i suggest to use always wooden tablespoons, if possible. add the two cups of sugar and let the preparation get cold. Step 5: Incorporate the eggs, mixing very well after each one of them. Step 6: Parfum with the vanilla, the rum and the coffee. add the nuts and the flour, mixing always very well.", 
"put this heavy cream into a rectangular bakery pan and bake it for approximately 30 minutes. Step 7: Serve cold (room temperature).          serves: about 12 big brownies (for tea time)                 about 24 small ones  (for coffee, after a meal).

prompt: How do I make Breakfast Burritos?
completion: Step 1: Scramble eggs with a small amount of milk. Step 2: In another pan, crumble sausage and brown. Step 3: Combine with cheese; cook over low flame until cheese melts. Step 4: Mix in just enough ketchup until mixture holds together. Step 5: Warm tortillas in microwave on medium for about 30 seconds until soft enough to roll up without cracking. Step 6: Place about 1/4 cup egg mixture in tortilla and roll up. Step 7: Serve with salsa.

prompt: How do I make Almond Joy Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Cake:  bake according to directions on super moist betty crocker german chocolate cake mix in 9\"x13\" pan. grease and flour pan. after allowing cake to to cool thoroughly, slice in half, making two thin layers. lay top half aside carefully. Step 2: Center:  cut up marshmallows with kitchen shears, (rub blades with margarine to prevent  sticking). Step 3: Boil margarine, milk, and sugar together for 3 minutes.   pour over marshmallows until melted.   add coconut and stir. Step 4: Spread this mixture over bottom half of cake. sprinkle generously with chopped almonds, if desired.", 
"replace top half of cake. Step 5: Icing:  combine sugar, milk and margarine, cook to soft ball stage or until candy  thermometer reaches 238 degrees.  stir constantly to prevent scorching.    remove  from heat, stir in chocolate chips, add marshmallow creme and vanilla flavoring.   beat until well blended. Step 6: Cool, (not very much). spread on cake. sprinkle entire  cake generously with almond  pieces. Step 7: Cake is better if it sits overnight.

prompt: How do I make Almond Paste?
completion: Step 1: Force blanched almonds through fine blade of food chopper 4x or whirl in electric blender. add lemon juice. Step 2: Cook water and sugar until candy thermometer registers 240*f or until a small amount of mixture dropped into cold water forms a soft ball. add to ground almonds. mix well. when cool enough to handle, knead until smooth. cool. Step 3: Pack in a jar, cover & store in refrigerator for at least 1 week to ripen. makes about 2 pounds. Step 4: Note: if almond paste is too stiff to handle after storage, place in top part of double boiler and heat over hot, not boiling, water until sufficiently soft to handle. use in cookies, coffee cakes or in other pastries and desserts.

prompt: How do I make Brown Rice and Vegetable Pilaf?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Step 2: Heat chicken broth to boiling. Step 3: Combine broth   with brown rice, butter, oregano, marjoram, and summery  savory in 3 quart  casserole and bake, covered, for 1-1/2 hours or until  rice is tender. Step 4: Keep  hot.   melt butter in large skillet or dutch oven. Step 5: Add celery, snow peas,  broccoli, green onion, and ginger and stir fry until crisp-tender. Step 6: Add  vegetables, lemon rind, and toasted coconut to rice.  toss lightly  to combine.  adjust seasonings.

prompt: How do I make Brown Bag Apple Salad?
completion: Step 1: In medium-size bowl, stir together orange juice, honey and lemon juice. Step 2: Add apples, grapes, orange sections and walnuts; toss to coat with juice mixture. Step 3: Refrigerate or pack into individual containers for lunches and snacks.

prompt: How do I make Blue Stuffed Mushrooms?
completion: Step 1: In a medium bowl, combine the blue cheese and the cream cheese. Step 2: Beat them together with an electric mixer so that they are smooth. Step 3: Add the half & half and beat it in so that the mixture is fluffy. Step 4: Fill the mushroom caps with the cheese mixture. Step 5: Top each with a pecan half and a basil leaf.

prompt: How do I make Blueberry Buttertarts?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375f. Step 2: Leave shells in foil cups and place on a baking sheet. in  large bowl, whisk egg with syrup, juice and vanilla. Step 3: In another bowl, stir sugar with flour. Step 4: Divide berries among shells. Step 5: Pour in egg mixture, filling each shell right to top. Step 6: Bake on bottom rack at 375f oven until bubbly and top is a bit  crusty, from 18-23 minutes.tarts will firm up when cool and can be refrigerated  2 days.

prompt: How do I make Calzone?
completion:
Step 1: Open rolls and let stand until they reach room temperature. heat tomato sauce  with basil and oregano; set aside. simmer sausages in water to cover for 20  minutes; drain, cool, remove the casings and slice thinly. Step 2: For each calzone,  compress half the rolls into a flat cake and roll on a floured board to make an  11-inch diameter circle. brush lightly with oil and spread half the tomato sauce over half the dough circle to within 1/2 inch of edge. top sauce with half the  sausage; sprinkle with half the mozzarella cheese and romano cheese. fold plain  half over filling to within 1/4 inch of opposite edge. roll bottom edge up over  top edge; pinch or crimp together to seal.", 
"brush with oil. Step 3: Repeat to make second calzone. transfer both calzones with a wide spatula to a greased baking sheet,  placing slightly apart. pierce tops in a few places with a fork. Step 4: Bake in a 500  degrees oven for 6 minutes or until golden brown. Step 5: *any brand of biscuits refrigerated dough may be substituted.

prompt: How do I make Capsicum, Tomato and Crunchy Bread Salad?
completion:
Step 1: Dressing:separate garlic bulbs into cloves, don't peel. Step 2: Combine garlic, tomatoes and oil in baking dish. Step 3: Bake uncovered, in moderately hot oven about 30 minutes, or until tomatoes are soft, gently turning tomato occasionally; cool. Step 4: Reserve garlic for the dressing. Step 5: Cut bread into 2 cm squares, combine in a bowl with extra olive oil; mix well. Step 6: Place bread in single layer on oven tray, toast in moderate oven about 10 minutes. Step 7: Quarter capsicums, remove seeds and membranes. Step 8: Grill capsicums, skin side up, until skin blisters and blackens.", 
"peel away skin, slice capsicums into thick strips. Step 9: Combine tomatoes, capsicums, basil in a large bowl; toss gently. Step 10: Add crunchy bread to salad just before serving. Step 11: Dressing squeeze pulp from garlic.  blend with vinegar and sugar until smooth. Step 12: Add oil gradually in a thin stream while motor is running. Step 13: Blend until thick.

prompt: How do I make Chaat Masala?
completion: Step 1: "toast and grind cumin and fennel seeds and combine with remaining ingredients."

prompt: How do I make Bread Pudding with Jack Daniels Sauce?
completion:
Step 1: Cube bread. Step 2: Set aside in a large mixing bowl. Step 3: Combine all ingredients except butter. Step 4: Mix well and pour over bread. Step 5: Soak bread in milk mixture for 15 minutes. Step 6: Pour into a 13x9 buttered pan. Step 7: Top bread mixture, with cut up butter. Step 8: Bake at 325 for 60-90 minutes or until pudding mixture has risen 1 inch. Step 9: Serve warm sauce over bread pudding. Step 10: Sauce Step 11: Combine ingredients and add sugar and water until dissolved. Step 12: Add butter, and simmer until melted. Step 13: Cook over high heat of 2 minutes.", 
"add jack daniels, and simmer for 3-5 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Braised Chicken with Onions and Tomatoes?
completion: Step 1: Heat oil in large saucepan over high heat. add onions and sauti 2 minutes. Step 2: Stir in ginger, garlic and chiles. Step 3: Add chicken pieces and brown lightly. Step 4: Add tomatoes and remaining spices, yogurt, rum and salt. reduce heat to low and braise 40 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Step 5: Serve with cilantro and rice. with leftovers. Step 6: Freezes well.

prompt: How do I make Cheesy Scalloped Potato Side Dish?
completion: Step 1: Layer potatoes, flour, milk, and salt and pepper (if desired) in a large casserole dish in several layers, then top with cheeses and paprika. Step 2: Bake at 350°f for 1 1/2 hours. Step 3: Optional crockpot method:  spray crock pot with non-stick spray.  layer ingredients in crockpot as directed for oven method.  cook on high about 5 hours, until potatoes are tender. Step 4: All cooking times are approximate.  preparation time allows for peeling and slicing potatoes.  cooking time is for oven method.

prompt: How do I make Borscht?
completion: Step 1: Saute cabbage, onion and celery in butter until soft in large saucepan. Step 2: Add  tomato sauce, beets with juice, herbs, sugar and enough water to cover  ingredients. Step 3: Bring to boil, reduce heat, simmer 25-30 minutes. Step 4: Add lemon  juice  a few minutes before serving. Step 5: Serve with chopped boiled eggs, sour cream  and pumpernickel bread.

prompt: How do I make Cheeseburger Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Combine ground beef and flour in skillet. add onion and brown. Step 2: Pour off drippings. Step 3: Add tomato sauce, ketchup, salt and pepper. Step 4: Pour into 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Step 5: Bake for 10 minutes at 425°f. Step 6: Top with cheese and biscuits. Step 7: Bake for 10-15 minutes longer.

prompt: How do I make Caputo's Halibut With Mint and Balsamic Vinegar?
completion: Step 1: Brush both sides of the fish with some of the olive oil and place on hot grill, barbecue or hot skillet. Step 2: Cook 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until  fish is done. Step 3: In another pan, heat the remaining oil, balsamic vinegar and the mint until just warm. Step 4: Just before serving, add the garlic to the sauce and spoon over the fish.

prompt: How do I make Cajun Beef Burgers?
completion:
Step 1: To make sauce: in large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat until hot. add onion and salt; cook and stir over low heat 10 minutes. Step 2: Add tomatoes and thyme; bring  to a broil. Step 3: Reduce heat; simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until sauce thickens  slightly. Step 4: Meanwhile shape ground beef into four 1/2-inch thick patties. Step 5: Sprinkle both sides of patties with black pepper and red pepper; brush lightly with 1  teaspoon oil. Step 6: Heat large heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat 5 minutes. Step 7: Place patties in skillet; panbroil 10 to 12 minutes or until centers are no  longer pink, turning once. spoon approx.", 
"1/2 of sauce onto bottom halves or  rolls; top with patties. Step 8: Spoon remaining sauce over patties; sprinkle with  parsley. Step 9: Close with roll tops. Step 10: Serve immediately. Step 11: Makes 4 servings (serving size: 1 sandwich). tip: mexican-style stewed tomatoes may be substituted for cajun-style. to grill, place patties on grid over medium, ash-covered coals. Step 12: Grill uncovered, 11 to 13 minutes or until centers are no longer pink, turning once.

prompt: How do I make Buttermilk Pie in Cornmeal Pastry?
completion:
Step 1: For pastry: sift together flour and salt; stir in cornmeal. Step 2: Cut in shortening until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Step 3: Stir in grated cheddar cheese; sprinkle water over mixture gradually, mixing lightly with fork. Step 4: Shape into ball; flatten on lightly floured surface. roll to about 1/8\" thickness. Step 5: Line 9\" pie pan; trim and flute edge. fill and bake as directed below. Step 6: For filling: separate 3 eggs and set whites aside for use in meringue. Step 7: Beat yolks, adding sugar gradually. Step 8: Cut butter into flour; add buttermilk, lemon peel and juice. fold in yolks.", 
"pour into 9\" cornmeal pie shell. Step 9: Bake in hot oven (425°f) 10 minutes; reduce temperature to 350°f and bake 20 to 25 minutes. Step 10: Cool. Step 11: To make meringue: beat 4-5 egg whites in a large bowl with electric mixer on high, until foamy. gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. (amount of sugar actually used will depend on the humidity in the air). Step 12: Pile meringue lightly over cooled butterrmilk filling. Step 13: Bake in moderate oven (350°f.) 12 to 15 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Butterflied Lamb with Garlic Butter?
completion:
Step 1: Open lamb out flat, place the fat-side down on a board.  using a meat mallet or  rolling pin pound the lamb to even thickness. Step 2: Combine herbs, rind, garlic,  pepper and butter in a small bowl; spread the mixture over the fat-side of the  lamb. Step 3: Place lamb in a large shallow dish, drizzle the juice over.  cover,  refrigerate 3 hours or overnight. Step 4: Place the potatoes and onions in a large  roasting dish; drizzle with oil.  bake uncovered, in a moderately hot oven 20  minutes. Step 5: Place lamb, fat-side up, over the vegetables in the roasting dish.  bake uncovered in moderately hot oven about 40 minutes or until lamb doneness as  desired.", 
"remove the lamb from the dish, cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Step 6: Drain the excess juices from the pan, bake potatoes and onions in a very hot  oven another 15 minutes or until crisp. Step 7: Slice lamb and serve with the  vegetables.

prompt: How do I make Borsch?
completion:
Step 1: Scrub well beets (do not peel them)  put in large pot with 8 cups water. Step 2: Bring  to boil and then reduce to  simmer and cook until tender. Step 3: (save cooking beet  water). when tender take slotted spoon and put beets immediately into cold  water. Step 4: Slip skins off with your hands. Step 5: If you have a cuisinart, chop beets into tiny pieces. Step 6: If no cuisinart, then you will have to chop the beets up by hand. Step 7: Put chopped beets into pot, add fresh dill, chopped, 1 can campbell's tomato  zest soup (undiluted) and 6 cups of the cooking beet water.", 
"if you want a  thinner borscht use a little more of the beet water. Step 8: Stir well. Step 9: Serve with 1  tbsp.  sour cream per individual serving. Step 10: Add salt to your own taste.  i don't  use any salt.  enjoy!

prompt: How do I make Chicken and Broccoli Lasagna?
completion: Step 1: Sauce: melt butter, stir in flour.  add milk, whisk until smooth.  stir in broth.  cook, stirring constantly, until thick. Step 2: Beat eggs in   separate bowl, add small amount of sauce; then combine egg mix with   all sauce. stir in cheese and seasonings. Step 3: Cook noodles. Step 4: Saute chicken in butter with onion and garlic. stir in broccoli, cook 5 min.  until tender.  add seasonings. Step 5: Layer in 9 x 13 pan: sauce, mozzarella, noodles, chicken. Step 6: Repeat. finish with cheese. Step 7: Freeze. bake 350 for 50 min, until bubbly.

prompt: How do I make Carrot Ginger Biscuits?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 450. Step 2: In a large bowl, stir together the all-purpose flour and  whole wheat flour, baking powder and baking soda, ginger and salt.  in a small  bowl, stir together the carrot, yogurt, oil and honey. Step 3: Add carrot mixture to  dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Step 4: Place the dough on a well-floured surface.  using a lightly floured rolling pin, roll out the dough until 1/2\" thick. Step 5: Using a 2 1/4\" biscuit cutter or glass ,  cut out rounds, gently rerolling the scraps, to form 12 biscuits.", 
"place the  biscuits on an ungreased baking sheet, spacing them 1\" apart.  bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until golden. Step 6: Serve warm.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Breasts Saltimbocca?
completion:
Step 1: Pound chicken breast halves until thin between  two sheets of waxed paper or  foil. Step 2: Place a slice of ham and cheese on each chicken piece.  roll up and tuck  ends in; secure with small skewers or  wooden picks. prompt: How do I make All-Purpose Crock Pot Chicken?

prompt: How do I make Amish Friendship Bread and Starter?
completion:
Step 1: Place one cup each sugar, milk, and flour in large glass or plastic bowl. Step 2: Cover lightly with plastic wrap and set on your counter at room temperature. stir with a wooden spoon everyday for 17 days. Step 3: On day 18 do nothing. Step 4: On days 19, 20, and 21, stir. Step 5: On day 22, add 1 cup sugar, 1 cup milk, and 1 cup flour, and stir again. Step 6: On days 23, 24, 25, and 26 stir. Step 7: On day 27, add 1 cup milk, 1 cup flour, and 1 cup sugar and stir. Step 8: It's now ready to use to make the bread. Step 9: Give away two cups of the starter to two friends, use one to make the bread, and keep one to keep the starter going.  when you give away a cup of the starter, give these directions for keeping it going:  do not refrigerate; do not use metal spoon or metal bowl; do not cover tightly, cover loosely with plastic wrap.", 
"amish friendship bread:  mix oil, eggs, and vanilla with the starter mix. Step 10: In a separate bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, vanilla pudding mix, and nuts. Step 11: Add to liquid mixture and stir thoroughly. Step 12: Pour into two large well-greased 9x5 inch loaf pans, or one bundt pan, that have been sprinkled with a mixture of cinnamon, sugar, and flour. Step 13: Sprinkle more cinnamon and sugar on the tops of the unbaked loaves (or cake).  bake at 325f for one hour or until done.

Step 4: Place mixture in heaped teaspoonfuls on greased oven trays which have been lightly dusted with cornflour. Step 5: Bake in slow oven 30 minutes. Step 6: Cool on trays.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Flambe?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to  350  f. Step 2: Lightly season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Step 3: In a large skillet over medium heat, brown chicken breasts on both sides. Step 4: Add onions and mushrooms and stir cook until the onions soften. Step 5: Transfer mixture to a shallow casserole dish and bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Step 6: In a small sauce pan warm the orange liqueur over low heat (should be lukewarm, not hot). take the casserole out of the oven. Step 7: Pour the liqueur over the chicken and vegetables and ignite it. when the flames die out, add the wine and return the casserole to the oven for another 15 minutes or until chicken breasts are no longer pink inside. remove the casserole from the oven.", 
"arrange the chicken and vegetables on a warm platter and keep hot. mix butter and flour to make a paste. stir this into the pan juices, add cream and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes until thickened. Step 8: Pour sauce over chicken. Step 9: Serve with wild rice and vegetables.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Curry?
completion:
Step 1: In a dry skillet over medium heat, toast coriander and cumin  seeds until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Step 2: Transfer to spice grinder, add  crushed red-pepper flakes, and grind to a powder. Step 3: Place in a small  bowl, and add turmeric, ginger, cloves, salt, and black pepper. Step 4: Add  chicken, and toss to coat. heat peanut oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.  add  chicken, cooking until browned, 3 to 5 minutes. Step 5: Remove chicken. Step 6: Set  aside. reduce heat, and add ginger, garlic, and onions.", 
"cook until  softened and deep-brown in color, 8 to 10 minutes. Step 7: Add cinnamon  sticks, bay leaf, and cardamom pods; cook for 10 minutes. Step 8: Add  tomatoes, chicken stock, and cooked chicken. Step 9: Raise heat to medium  high, and cook until liquid is reduced, about 15 minutes. Step 10: Meanwhile,  toast pappadams. Step 11: Reduce heat to low, and stir in yogurt and  raisins. Step 12: Cook until warmed throughout; add cilantro. Step 13: Serve with  basmati rice, and garnish with cashews.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Goulash on a Sour Cream Crust?
completion:
Step 1: Lightly saute the onions in 1 tbsp of the oil until golden. Step 2: Meanwhile place the seasoned flour and paprika in a mixing bowl, add the chicken to coat.  remove the onions from the pan, add the rest of the oil and saute the chicken for 2 - 3 minutes. Step 3: Return onions to the pan, add the tomato paste, wine and stock. Step 4: Bring to the boil and simmer for 6 - 7 minutes. Step 5: Remove pan from the heat and stir in the yoghurt.  (this can be made in advance and stored in the refrigerator.) crust place the butter, sour cream and egg into a bowl, mix to combine. stir in the flour and parsley to form a soft dough.", 
"press the dough into a lightly greased casserole or flan dish, working it well up the sides to a thickness of 12 mm. Step 6: Spoon the filling, cover and bake at 180c for 35 minutes. Step 7: Uncover and bake for a further 10 minutes or until golden and crusty.

prompt: How do I make Chicken in Pizza Dough?
completion:
Step 1: Prepare pizza dough (see recipe following).  while dough rises, prepare baked  chicken and vegetables. Step 2: After dough has risen and chicken has finished baking,  turn  dough onto a lightly floured board. Step 3: Cut off a small piece of  dough the  size of a tennis ball to use for a top decoration. Step 4: Form remaining dough into a  ball and roll out to a 12 x 17-inch  rectangle. place chicken, breast side down, in the middle  of the dough. Step 5: Arrange vegetables around chicken. Step 6: Wrap sides  and  ends of dough over chicken.", 
"turn right side up and place  on a baking sheet.  brush surface with beaten egg. Step 7: Roll out  reserved piece of dough. Step 8: Using a cookie cutter, cut out a  design and place on top of dough wrapped chicken. Step 9: Brush with  egg. Step 10: Bake in pre-  heated 425 degrees oven for 30 minutes, until  golden brown. Step 11: To serve, let everyone tear off the bread, then cut up  the chicken. Step 12: Pizza dough: dissolve yeast, sugar and salt in warm water. Step 13: In  large bowl,  combine 2 cups of flour and yeast  mixture; beat with an electric mixer several  minutes.", 
"stir in enough  additional flour to make a stiff dough. Step 14: Turn out on a   floured board and knead 5 minutes until smooth and elastic. place  dough in a  lightly oiled bowl; turn to coat surface of dough  with oil. Step 15: Cover with a damp  cloth and let rise in a warm  place until double in bulk (about 2 hours).

prompt: How do I make Chicken Lasagna?
completion: Step 1: Mix filling ingredients in large bowl. Step 2: Spread 1 cup filling on bottom of each of 2 8x8 pans. Step 3: Cook noodles for 3 min (or not at all). break noodles to fit pans and layer over filling. Step 4: Repeat. evenly divide remaining filling for the final layer. Step 5: Sprinkle with paprika. Step 6: Freeze. to serve, sprinkle cheddar cheese on top and bake from frozen to done for 1-2 hours at 400 deg.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Liver Pate?

Step 6: Add butter and cream cheese. pour in a mold or container. Step 7: Let stand covered in refrigerator until  firm about 3 hours. Step 8: Serve with crackers or party rye.                    - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

prompt: How do I make Chicken Liver Pate II?
completion: Step 1: Marinate livers in the cognac overnight. drain soak dried mushroom in hot water  for 1 hour. Step 2: Drain it squeezing out all the liquid melt 1 tbs butter in a pan add the livers, onion, mushroom and garlic. cook until almost all the red has  disappeared. Step 3: Add the cream, the funghi,  and the spices and cook to reduce by  half over high heat. turn off heat, process everything and mix in the butter  while still hot.. Step 4: Pour into a mold and refrigerate if you like you may top it  with gelatin

prompt: How do I make Coconut Shrimp With Orange Mustard Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Peel and devein the shrimp leaving the tails intact. combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika in a medium bowl, stirring well. Step 2: Make a well in center of the flour mixture. gradually add beer stirring until batter is smooth. Step 3: Dip shrimp in batter then dredge in the coconut. fry shrimp in hot oil until lightly browned. Step 4: Drain in paper towels. Step 5: Orange mustard sauce:  combine marmalade, juice and mustard in a small bowl, stirring well.  makes 1 cup. Step 6: Jan.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Liver Pate III?
completion:
Step 1: Using a large skillet, sweat the livers in 4 oz of the butter. Step 2: After 3 minutes,  add the onion, salt, and pepper. Step 3: Cook until the livers are just off-pink. Step 4: Set  aside and hold warm. Step 5: Line a 2 l/2quart mold with a single layer of the bacon  slices. Step 6: Chill the mold. Step 7: Puree the liver and onion mixture in a food processor. Step 8: Gently warm the remaining butter. Step 9: Add to the livers with the brandy and cream. Step 10: Mix again to assure uniformity pour into the well-chilled mold. Step 11: Place the mold  in a water bath that reaches to i in.", 
"(2.5 cm) from the top of the mold. Step 12: Bake  45-60 minutes at 3250f (1630c) until the pate sets. Step 13: Shake the pan gently to  observe the texture. a metal cake tester should come out clean. Step 14: The time will  vary depending on the thickness of the mold. Step 15: Record the time for future  reference. remove from the oven and water bath. Step 16: Cover and chill for a minimum of 12 hours. Step 17: Unmold, plate, and garnish for presentation.

prompt: How do I make Appetizers-Easy Stuffed Mushrooms?
completion: Step 1: Wash and dry the mushrooms. Step 2: Remove and chop the stems. Step 3: Melt butter in a 12 inch skillet over medium high heat.  add the mushroom stems, celery and  onion. Step 4: Saute until the onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Step 5: Stir in the bread crumbs, worcestershire sauce and seasonings. Step 6: Mound the stuffing onto the mushroom caps. Step 7: Arrange caps on a greased baking sheet.  bake for 5-7  minutes, or until thoroughly heated. Step 8: If you like mushrooms, you will like this!

prompt: How do I make Anzac Biscuits?
completion: Step 1: Mix oats, flour, sugar and coconut together. Step 2: Melt syrup and butter together. Step 3: Mix the bicarb with boiling water and add to butter and syrup mixture.  add this to dry ingredients. Step 4: Place tablespoonsful of the mixture on a greased oven slide (cookie sheet).  bake at 150 - 160 c (300-325f) for 20 minutes. Step 5: Good luck.

prompt: How do I make Ancho Chile Rub?
completion: Step 1: Combine ancho chiles, mild chili powder, hot chili powder, chimayo chili powder, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salt, and chipotle paste in a large bowl. Step 2: Makes about 2 cups.

prompt: How do I make Amish Six Layer Dinner?
completion: Step 1: Grease a casserole dish. Step 2: Sprinkle each layer with salt and pepper before adding the next layer.  place potatoes in the bottom of the casserole.  add the layer of  celery.  add the layer of hamburger.  add the layer of onions.  add the green  pepper. Step 3: Pour the tomatoes over the mixture. Step 4: Bake for 2 hours at 350°f (i  cover with foil after about an hour).

prompt: How do I make Chicken on Sunday  (Or Whenever)?
completion: Step 1: Grease large 9x13-inch pan. Step 2: Heat soups and milk together in a large saucepan. Step 3: Stir in minute rice (you want the mixture to be rather juicy). pour into 9x13-inch pan. Step 4: Place chicken part on top and then sprinkle with seasoning salt, pepper and curry lightly. Step 5: Cover all with foil. Step 6: Bake at 325°f for 2 hours and 15 minutes. Step 7: I have baked this on a higher temp with less baking time but, you have to watch that you don't make the rice get hard and crusty by doing so.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Pot Pie Lasagna?
completion:
Step 1: Prepare pasta according to package directions. Step 2: Spray a dutch oven or large   skillet with cooking spray; place over medium-high heat until hot. add  chicken  and saute 4 minutes or until cooked through. Step 3: Drain well and set  aside.   recoat dutch oven with cooking spray and place over medium-high heat until   hot. add  mushrooms, carrots and onions; saute 6 minutes. Step 4: Set aside.  place flour in a  medium saucepan. Step 5: Gradually add milk, stirring with a wire   whisk until blended; stir in sherry.", 
"bring to a boil over medium heat and  cook for 5 minutes or  until thickened, stirring constantly. Step 6: Stir in salt  and  red pepper. Step 7: Reserve one cup of sauce and set aside.  in a bowl, combine ricotta cheese, 1 cup mozzarella cheese and swiss  cheese.  preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 8: Spread 1 cup of the  sauce over the bottom of  a  13 x9 x 2-inch pan. Step 9: Arrange 4 pieces of the lasagne (3 lengthwise, 1  widthwise)over the sauce. top with half of ricotta cheese  mixture, half of   chicken mixture and half of remaining sauce mixture.   repeat layers, ending with 4 pieces of lasagne. spread reserved 1 cup of  sauce over  the last complete layer of lasagne, being sure to cover the  lasagne completely.", 
"cover lasagne with foil and bake 1 hour. Step 10: Uncover  lasagne,  sprinkle remaining  1/2 cup mozzarella cheese on top and bake an additional  5  minutes uncovered. Step 11: Re-cover and let stand 15 minutes before serving.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Roll-Ups?
completion:
Step 1: Boil chicken until done and no pink remains. Step 2: Cool and chop into  small cubes. Step 3: In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese, butter, onion,  pimento, milk,  salt, and pepper. Step 4: Stir in chicken and set aside.  open crescent rolls and place each piece of dough flat on a  lightly greased baking sheet.  place several  tablespoons of chicken mixture on the center of  each piece of dough. Step 5: Roll up  dough around the chicken mixture making sure are  edges are sealed. Step 6: Dip each  chicken roll in melted butter and roll in the crushed  croutons or corn flakes  (optional). place on baking sheet.  bake at 350°f for 15-20 minutes or  until golden brown.", 
"serve with chicken gravy if desired. Step 7: To make chicken  gravy add 1 can cream of chicken soup to a  small saucepan. Step 8: Add 1 tablespoon  fresh lemon juice and stir well. Step 9: Add milk or sour cream to thin to desired  consistency. Step 10: Cook over  low heat until hot. serve over chicken roll-ups.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Supreme with Mushrooms?
completion:
Step 1: Melt 15g of the butter in a pan. Step 2: Add the onions and saute until soft. add the  mushrooms and salt and pepper to taste and cook until soft. add the wine, tomato puree and stock and continue cooking, stirring, until the liquid is well  concentrated; chill. Step 3: Beat out the chicken breasts to an even thickness and place each one on a sheet of foil. Step 4: Divide the mushrooms mixture between them and dot  with the remaining butter. Step 5: Fold the foil over the top and seal the edges. Step 6: To freeze place parcels on a baking sheet and freeze, then pack in a plastic  bag.", 
"seal, label and return to the freezer. Step 7: To serve place the foil parcels on a baking sheet. cook from frozen in a  preheated hot oven, 220 c , for about 1 hour. Step 8: Remove the foil and sprinkle with  parsley.

prompt: How do I make Cola Roast?

Step 2: In a small bowl, combine the salt, pepper, and garlic powder; rub over surface of roast.  in a dutch oven, heat the oil to hot and brown roast on all sides. Step 3: Transfer roast to roasting pan. Step 4: Combine all the remaining ingredients; pour over roast.  cover and roast for 2 1/2-3 hours until tender.

prompt: How do I make Cola Cake?
completion: Step 1: Beat all but eggs and marshmallows for two minutes. Step 2: Add eggs and beat two minutes more.  stir in marshmallows. Step 3: Bake in 9 x 13 pan for 35 minutes. Step 4: Frosting: 1/2 cup butter or margarine  3 tablespoon cocoa 1 pound powdered sugar 1/3 cup coke or pepsi 1 cup chopped nuts mix butter, cocoa, sugar and coke well together and add chopped nuts. Step 5: Pour over hot cake.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Sate with Peanut Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Combine butter, 1/4 cup soy sauce, coriander, and 2 tbsp lime juice. marinate chicken in this while you make peanut sauce:  saute onion and garlic in oil  until tender. Step 4: Slowly and carefully add enough boiling water to form a thick paste.  now, broil chicken until done, basting with marinade.  serve with peanut sauce.

prompt: How do I make Coconut Crunch Beans?
completion:
Step 1: In nonstick skillet, cook sesame seeds, stirring, over medium heat for 2 minutes or until slightly golden. Step 2: Stir in half of the butter until melted. Step 3: Stir in coconut, chili powder, turmeric and salt; cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until coconut turns deep golden. Step 4: (coconut mixture can be stored in airtight container at room temperature for up to 24 hours.) in large pot of boiling salted water, cook beans for 3 minutes; drain well. Step 5: (beans can be prepared to this point, chilled under cold water, drained and refrigerated in towel-lined airtight container for up to 24 hours.) in nonstick skillet, melt remaining butter over medium heat; cook beans for about 3 minutes or until tender-crisp.", 
"toss with coconut topping.

prompt: How do I make Coconut Chicken Bites?
