Step 3: Dip chicken bites in the egg, then in the flour mixture. place the chicken bites onto a greased cookie sheet or baking pan. Step 4: Drizzle with melted butter. Step 5: Bake approximately 25 minutes or until the chicken is browned and cooked through. Step 6: Turn once during cooking. Step 7: This is good served with an apricot or plum dipping sauce.  jan.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Pound Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Use a 8 x 4 x 2 1/2\" loaf pan, (4 cups) or any 6 cup loaf  pan or fluted tube pan, greased and floured. Step 3: In a medium mixing bowl whisk  together the cocoa and water until smooth. Step 4: Allow to cool to room temperature  and lightly whisk in the vanilla and eggs. Step 5: In a large mixing bowl combine the  remaining dry ingredients and mix on low speed for 30 seconds to blend. Step 6: Add 1/2  the chocolate mixture and the butter. Step 7: Mix on low speed until the dry  ingredients are moistened.", 
"increase to medium speed and beat for 1 minute to  develop the cake's structure.  scrape down the sides. Step 8: Gradually add the  remaining chocolate mixture in 2 batches, beating 20 seconds after each addition to incorporate the ingredients and strengthen the structure.  scrape down the  sides. Step 9: Scrape the batter into the prepared pan and smooth the surface with a  spatula. Step 10: The batter will be almost 1/2 inch from the top of a 4-cup pan. Step 11: (if your  pan is slightly smaller, use any excess batter for cupcakes.)  bake for 50 to 60 minutes, (40 to 50 minutes in a fluted tube pan) or until a wooden toothpick  inserted in the center comes out clean.", 
"place loosely with buttered foil over  the cake after 20 minutes to prevent over browning. Step 12: The cake should start to  shrink away from the sides of the pan only after removal from the oven. Step 13: Let the cake cool in the pan on a rack for 10 minutes. Step 14: Loosen the sides with a metal  spatula and invert onto a greased wire rack. Step 15: If baked in a loaf pan, to keep  the bottom from splitting, reinvert so that the top is up and cool completely  before wrapping airtight. Step 16: Topping:  this is for extra moistness and gives a subtle coffee accent.", 
"in a  small pan, stir together 1/4 cup water and 2 tbsp sugar. Step 17: Bring to a full rolling boil. Step 18: Cover and remove from heat.  when cool, add 1 tbsp kahlua. Step 19: When cake is baked, brush half the syrup onto the top. Step 20: Cool the cake 10 minutes and invert it onto a lightly greased rack. Step 21: Brush the bottom and sides with remaining syrup. Step 22: Reinvert onto rack, top side up, to finish cooling.

prompt: How do I make Chicken With Portabella Mushrooms-?
completion: Step 1: Dredge the chicken breast pieces in flour and saute in olive oil. Step 2: In a non stick pan you can get by with very little. Step 3: Add the onions and mushrooms and saute till soft. Step 4: Add the lemon juice and fresh herbs, saute for 1 minute  till the flavors  combine.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Apple & Apricot?
completion: Step 1: Mix all ingredients thoroughly in a 3-quart pot. Step 2: Simmer uncovered for the better part of an hour, stirring often. Step 3: Add more juice if necessary and discard spice packet at end of cooking time. Step 4: Serve warm or chilled. Step 5: Keeps for days in the refrigerator.

prompt: How do I make Chicken, Mozzarella & Pepper Tarts?

prompt: How do I make Cola Fruit and Date Loaf?

Step 4: Heat cola to boiling.  remove from heat and stir in dates, mixing very well. Step 5: Stir in sugar and oil.  cool while preparing other ingredients. Step 6: Stir dry ingredients together and add to cola mixture.  stir in egg, extract and nuts. Step 7: Spoon batter into pan.  bake about 1 hour until cake tests done.  cool on a rack for 20 minutes then remove from pan and wrap. Step 8: Store overnight before slicing.

prompt: How do I make Coca-Cola Cake?

Step 3: Add dry ingredients to mixture and then add buttermilk, eggs, and marshmallows. Step 4: (batter will be thin). bake in 9x12 inch baking pan at 350 degrees for about 45 to 60 minutes or until tooth pick comes out clean. Step 5: Topping for coca-cola cake: combine butter cocoa and coke in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Step 6: Pour over sugar and mix well. Step 7: Add nuts an vanilla. Step 8: Pour over cake while still hot.

prompt: How do I make Chicken-Fried Steak With Cracked Pepper Gravy?
completion:
Step 1: Prepare the flour spice by blending the flour, salt, pepper, and cayenne. set aside on a plate or wax paper. Step 2: Prepare the batter by mixing the eggs with a whisk, in a large bowl. Step 3: Add the cream, and beer. whisk to blend. Step 4: Set aside. in a deep, heavy skillet, heat the oil to 350 degrees. while the oil is heating, prepare the round steaks by dredging them in the flour spice, taking care to evenly coat the meat. shake off any  excess. Step 5: Dip the meat into the batter, and then again in the flour  spice, evenly coating the batter so it is dry on the outside. when  the oil temperature reaches 350 degrees (when a drop of batter sizzles when dropped in it), gently slide one steak into the hot oil. cook the steak about 5 minutes.", 
"turn in, taking care not to break  the coating, and cook the meat 5 more minutes, or until the batter is nicely browned. drain the cooked steak on paper towels. repeat with the other steaks. Step 6: Hold the cooked steaks in a 225 degree oven until all four are done. pour cracker-pepper gravy over the steaks and serve. yield: 4 servings. Step 7: Cream gravy melt the butter in a heavy saucepan. Step 8: When the foam goes down, whisk in the flour. continually whisk until the flour cooks, becoming a fragrant light brown.", 
"slowly add the milk, continuing to whisk to  keep lumps from forming. Step 9: Season with salt and pepper. Step 10: Simmer gravy for 10 minutes to cook and reduce. serve hot.

prompt: How do I make Claudi Sanders' Refrigerator Rolls?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400. Step 2: Cream shortening and sugar until light and fluffy. Step 3: Add potatoes and cream again. Step 4: In separate pot,m heat milk to lukewarm, and dissolve yeast.  pour milk mixture into shortening, sugar and potatoes. Step 5: Ad enough flour (about 4 cups) to make a like a cake dough consistency. Step 6: Stir in salt.  cover. Step 7: Let rise 2 hours, stir in balance of flour (about 6 to 7 cups), baking soda and powder to make like biscuit dough-knead. Step 8: Cover and refrigerate 1/2 hour, make into tolls.", 
"let rise until double in size.  bake about 15-20 minutes. Step 9: Refrigerate and use over 5 or 6 days. Step 10: Makes 24 rolls.

prompt: How do I make $20,000 Prize-Winning Chili Con Carne?
completion: Step 1: In large saucepan or dutch oven, brown half the meat; pour off fat. remove meat. Step 2: Brown remaining meat; pour off all fat except 2 tbsps. Step 8: Serve hot.

prompt: How do I make Chilies Corn Muffins?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400. Step 2: Spray a standard muffin pan with cooking spray. Step 8: Let cool in pan 5 minutes, them loosen edges and turn out on rack and cool completely.

prompt: How do I make Classic Cream Scones?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 425f. Step 2: Lightly butter a baking sheet. in a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.   cut the butter into 1/2-inch cubes and distribute them over the flour   mixture. with a pastry blender or two knives used scissors fashion, cut in   the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Step 3: In a small bowl, stir   together the cream, egg, and vanilla. Step 4: Add the cream mixture to the flour   mixture and stir until combines. Step 5: Stir in the currents/raisins (optional). with lightly floured hands, pat the dough into a 1/2-inch thickness on a   lightly floured cutting board.", 
"using a floured 2 1/2-inch-diameter round   biscuit cutter or a glass, cut out rounds from the dough and place them on   the prepared baking sheet. gather the scraps together and repeat until all   the dough is used. Step 6: Lightly brush the tops of the scones with the egg mixture,   if desired. Step 7: Bake for 13-15 minutes, or until lightly browned. Step 8: Remove the baking sheet to a wire rack and cool for 5 minutes. Step 9: Using a   spatula, transfer the scones to the wire rack to cool. Step 10: Serve warm or cool   completely and store in an airtight container.", 
"makes about 14 scones. Step 11: Variation: add about 1 1/2 teaspoons of grated lemon peel to the dry ingredients. Step 12: My variation: classic scones 280 grams all-purpose flour 65 g granulated sugar 2 teaspoons baking powder 1/8 teaspoon salt 110 g unsalted butter, chilled 6 tablespoons milk 1 large egg 1 teaspoon vanilla sugar 125 g raisins preheat oven to 220c. Step 13: Directions as above.

prompt: How do I make Chinese Chicken?
completion: Step 1: Wash and dry chicken. Step 2: Combine the rest of the ingredients together and mix well. Step 3: Add the chicken, coat well with the marinade.  allow to stand several hours or overnight in refrigerator. Step 4: Place chicken in a baking dish and pour over marinade.  cover dish with foil. prompt: How do I make Classic Chicken and Coconut Soup?
completion:
Step 1: Bring first 3 ingredients to boil in heavy medium saucepan. Step 2: Reduce Step 3: Heat, add chicken and simmer until almost cooked through, turning occasionally, about 12 minutes. Step 4: Transfer chicken to plate; cool. Step 5: Remove chicken skin and bones. Step 6: Cut meat into 1/2-inch pieces. Step 7: Strain soup through sieve into small saucepan. Step 8: Add 1 tbsp lime juice and jalapeno to soup and simmer until reduced to 2 cups, about 20 minutes. Step 9: Add chicken and simmer just to heat through. Step 10: Taste, adding more lime juice if desired.", 
"ladle soup into bowls. Step 11: Sprinkle with fresh cilantro.

prompt: How do I make Chinese Hot and Sour Chicken Noodle Salad?
completion:
Step 1: In a 5-6 quart pan, bring about 3 quarts of water to a boil. Step 2: Add chicken, cover  and bring to a boil. Step 3: Remove from heat and let stand, covered, until meat is  white in thickest part, about 20-25 min. Step 4: Lift out chicken, let cool and reserve  water. Step 5: Remove and discard skin and bones*; tear chicken into bite-size shreds. Step 6: If made ahead, cover and chill chicken and water until next day. Step 7: Bring water to a boil and add linguine. boil, uncovered, until just tender to  bite, 6-8 min. Step 8: Drain; immerse in cold water until cool, then drain well again.", 
"remove any debris from peppercorns. Step 9: In a 6-8\" frying pan, toast peppercorns over med-low heat until fragrant, 2-3 min.; shake pan often. Step 10: Pour peppercorns into a  blender and whirl until finely ground. Step 11: Add chiles and oil to pan; cook over low heat until chiles just begin to brown,  about 3 min. Step 12: Let cool and add ground pepper, vinegar, soy sauce and cilantro. Step 13: On a shallow dish, arrange a bed of noodles; cover with cucumber and chicken. Step 14: Pour dressing evenly over salad and mix to blend.", 
"- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  notes : * i just use boneless, skinless chicken breasts to start with.

prompt: How do I make Clam - Lobster Bake?
completion:
Step 1: Prepare your favorite clam chowder as an appetizer. Step 2: Serve clambake with plenty of melted butter, lemons, and watermelon. Step 3: \"  detailed directions below. Step 4: Dig a bow-shaped pit 3 ft. in diameter and 1.5 feet deep in the center. Step 5: Using crisscross pattern, line with double thickness of heavy duty aluminum foil, then a layer of dry rocks about the size of grapefruit. note: wet rocks can explode. build a bonfire on top of rocks in the pit. use firewood and kindling. Step 6: Let the fire burn 1.5 to 2 hours or until burned down and rocks are hot. note: do not use charcoal.", 
"soak corn-on-the-cob (with silk removed) and mixed greens in cold water while fire is burning. Step 7: Wash clams and set aside. refrigerate lobster on ice. peel onions; remove ends.  oil potatoes. Step 8: Once fire has burned down, work quickly to prevent rocks from losing heat. tamp down embers. Step 9: On top of rocks, layer pit in the following order: half of the greens, strips of wet cheesecloth, potatoes, corn, onions, chicken halves, live lobsters and clams. Step 10: Cover food with remaining wet cheesecloth, then greens.", 
"cover pit with heavy duty aluminum foil. Step 11: Crimp all sides to the edges of aluminum foil used to line the pit. let food steam cook 40 to 60 minutes. Step 12: Remove foods immediately when done. cooking times will vary depending on temperature of rocks. Step 13: Peek at clams after 40 minutes.  if they are open and lobsters are bright red, dinner is ready. Step 14: Serve with melted butter and lemon.

prompt: How do I make Civil War Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Combine raisins, sugar, 1 cup of water, shortening, salt & spices in a saucepan. Step 2: Bring to a boil, simmer 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, then cool till  lukewarm, then add the other cp of water. Step 3: Dissolve soda in 2 teas. Step 4: Of water, set aside.  stir sifted & measured flour into raisin mixture & beat until smooth. Step 5: Add dissolved soda last. pur into greased floured 13x9 [am & bale 50-55 min. Step 6: At  350 degrees. Step 7: It may also be cooked in a tube pan. Step 8: Serve with whipped cream or caramel frosting.", 
"combine 3/4 cup of brown sugar 1/2 cup of water 1/2 tsp salt in a saucepan. Step 9: Cook 6 min. Step 10: Stirring often. Step 11: Cool to lukewarm and stir in 3 tbsp. Step 12: Of butter. Step 13: Then gradually stir in 21/4 cups of sifted confectionery sugar, beating until smooth. Step 14: Stir in 1 teas. Step 15: Vanilla and spread on cake. you will be surprised how good it taste with such little ingredients.

prompt: How do I make Chinese Hot and Sour Pork Soup?
completion: Step 1: Bring stock to a simmer. Step 2: Add soy sauce, pork, mushrooms and chile paste. simmer  for 10 minute. Step 3: Add pepper, vinegar, bamboo shoots, water chestnuts, fungus and  tofu. Step 4: Simmer 5 minute. Step 5: Mix cornstarch with 2 tablespoons water and add. Step 6: Bring back to simmer and pour  the eggs in a very thin stream over the surface. let stand for 10 sec. before  stirring in the sesame oil. Step 7: Serve with a garnish of chopped scallions. Step 8: Note: the pepper, chile paste and vinegar can be varied for taste. i also omit the pork and use less egg.

prompt: How do I make Citrus Glazed Barbecued Pork Loin?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: In a small saucepot add canola oil and saute onions and garlic until translucent. Step 3: Add chipotle and arbol chilies and continue to cook until chiles start to toast. Step 4: Add cracked black pepper and deglaze with worcestershire sauce and orange juice; reduce until starts to thicken. Step 5: Then add in your favorite barbecue sauce, reduce to low heat, and simmer for about 15 minutes. Step 6: Season with hot sauce, lemon juice and to taste with salt.  strain barbecue sauce and set aside.", 
"on a large sheet pan rub the pork loin with olive oil and season with salt and cracked pepper. Step 7: Roast in a 350 degree oven (basting with the citrus glaze about every 15 minutes) until the internal temperature is about 140 degrees. Step 8: Remove from oven and let meat set for about 5 minutes, slice, and enjoy!

prompt: How do I make Citrus Chicken?
completion:
Step 1: Rinse chicken; pat dry. Step 2: Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Step 3: Place chicken in plastic bag set in shallow dish. Step 4: For marinade, combine lemon, lime, and orange juices, oil,  sugar and oregano in small bowl. Step 5: Pour over chicken; seal bag. Step 6: Marinate in  refrigerator 4 to 24 hours, turning occasionally. Step 7: Drain chicken, reserving marinade. Step 8: Grill chicken on rack of uncovered grill directly over medium coals  12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink inside, turning once and brushing  occasionally with marinade during first half of cooking.", 
"or, broil on unheated rack of broiler pan 4 to 5 inches from heat 12 to 15 minutes, turning once and  brushing occasionally with marinade during first half of cooking. Step 9: Discard any remaining marinade.

prompt: How do I make Citrus Baked Halibut?
completion:
Step 1: Oven cooking: Step 2: Rinse halibut in cold water and dry using paper toweling. Step 3: Arrange  halibut in a 9\" x 13\" oven-proof baking dish. Step 4: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Step 5: In a frying pan, add butter, onion and garlic. saute until translucent. Step 6: Remove from heat; stir in parsley, orange rind, salt and pepper. Step 7: Spread mixture over  halibut steaks. Step 8: In a small bowl, mix together orange juice and lemon juice. Step 9: Sprinkle juice over steaks, but be careful not to wash away the onion/garlic  mixture.", 
"bake fish in preheated 400 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 to 22 minutes, turning over  at about 10 minutes of cooking time. Step 10: Continue cooking until time expires or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Step 11: Do not overcook fish. Step 12: Spoon hot juices  over fish. Step 13: Serve at once. Step 14: Microwave cooking: Step 15: Prepare and arrange fish and onion/garlic as above. Step 16: Reduce orange juice by 2 tablespoons. Step 17: Cover fish with a clear plastic wrap vented. Step 18: Cook on high (full power) for 4 minutes. Step 19: Turn fish over and cook for an additional 3 to 4 minutes on high (full power) or until fish flakes easily with  a fork.", 
"spoon juices over fish and serve at once. Step 20: If desired, serve with tartar sauce.

prompt: How do I make Chinese Plum Sauce?
completion:
Step 1: In large heavy saucepan, bring plums, onions, water, ginger and garlic to boil over medium heat; cover, reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until plums and onions are very tender, about 30 minutes. Step 2: Press through food mill or sieve and return to clean pan; stir in sugar, vinegar, coriander, salt, cinnamon, pepper and cloves. Step 3: Bring to boil, stirring; reduce heat to low and simmer until mixture reaches consistency of applesauce, about 45 minutes. Step 4: Fill and seal jars; process in boiling water bath for 30 minutes.", 
"makes about 4 cups

prompt: How do I make Chinese Meatballs?
completion:
Step 1: Combine pork, shrimp, water chestnuts, ginger, green onion, 1 tbsp soy sauce, wine, salt, 1/2 tsp sugar, 1 tbsp cornstarch, and egg. Step 2: Make twelve meatballs. Step 3: Heat oil in wok. Step 4: Add meatballs; cook 6-8 minutes, until browned, stirring occasionally. Step 5: Transfer meatballs to 5-qt saucepan; discard drippings. Step 6: Add chicken broth, 2 tbsp soy sauce and 1/2 tsp sugar. Step 7: Bring to a boil. Step 8: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 30 minutes. Step 9: Meanwhile, core cabbage.  cut base of leaves into 2\" squares.", 
"cut leafy tops in half. Step 10: Place over meatballs; cover and simmer 10 minutes more.  transfer meatballs and cabbage to serving platter. Step 11: Blend 2 tbsp cornstarch and 3 tbsp water, and stir into pan juices cooking until slightly thickened. Step 12: Add sesame oil and serve over meatballs.

prompt: How do I make Cinnamon Curry Rice?
completion: Step 1: Bring cinnamon to boil in 2 cups water, simmer covered until reduced to 1 cup;  strain, discard pulp, reserve broth. Step 2: Cook enough rice for 5 persons. Step 3: Heat butter in a wok, add flour and stir well to mix and thicken; then add curry powder and  stir well to mix; then add a little stock or water and mix well; return to boil, add carrot, potatoes, and apple, cover, simmer on low heat. Step 4: In a separate wok or pan, stir-fry sliced pork quickly in a little oil along with garlic. Step 5: Remove and  reserve. when carrots and potatoes are almost done, add cinnamon broth, pork and onions to the pot, return to boil, simmer for a few minutes, then serve over  rice.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Almond Scones?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Combine flour, baking  powder, sugar and salt. Step 3: Cut in  butter until it resembles course meal. Step 4: Add 2  eggs (1 egg is reserved for later use), almond extract and cream. Step 5: Stir until  soft dough forms; mix in chocolate  chips and toasted almonds. Step 6: Pat out dough until 3/4  inch thick. Step 7: Cut into diamond shape; brush  with reserved egg. Step 8: Place on baking  pan coated with cooking spray. Step 9: Bake for 10  minutes until lightly browned. Step 10: Serve warm.

prompt: How do I make Cinnamon Apple Salad?
completion: Step 1: In a bowl, dissolve candies in water (keep warm until melted).  add gelatin and stir to dissolve.  stir in the applesauce and pour half into an 9\" square pan that has been lightly coated with nonstick cooking spray. Step 2: Refrigerate until firm. Step 3: Cover and set remaining gelatin mixture aside at room temperature.  meanwhile, combine remaining ingredients and spread over chilled gelatin mixture.  carefully pour remaining gelatin mixture over cream cheese layer. Step 4: Chill overnight. yield: 9 servings this recipe was sent to reminisce magazine by lisa andis.

prompt: How do I make Chunky Tomato Cheese Pie?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Cut 4 of tomatoes into cubes; slice remaining tomato. Step 3: On a lightly floured surface roll out pastry; fit into a 9-inch pie pan; flute edges. Step 4: In a large bowl combine tomato cubes, cheese cubes, bread crumbs, flour, sugar and salt. toss until well blended. Step 5: Spoon into pie shell. Step 6: Bake 30 minutes until cheese cubes melt and tomato cubes are soft. Step 7: Remove from oven and garnish with tomato slices. Step 8: Add cheese strips. Step 9: Return to oven. Step 10: Bake 10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted and tomatoes are soft.  cut into wedges and serve.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Bread and Butter Pudding?
completion: Step 1: Cut crusts from bread. Step 2: Butter and bread, cut into triangles and layer with chocolate in a ovenproof dish. Step 3: Beat eggs, milk, sugar, sherry and vanilla together and pour over the bread. Step 4: Leave to stand for 15 minutes to fully absorb liquid. Step 5: Heat oven to 160 c. Step 6: Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set.  dust with icing sugar to serve. hope it tastes good.

prompt: How do I make Christmas Snow Punch?
completion: Step 1: In punch bowl, combine hi-c hula punch, sprite and ice cream. Step 2: Stir until well  blended and chill. Step 3: From: spartan holiday cookbook robin

prompt: How do I make Christmas Cranberry Salad?
completion: Step 1: Cover marshmallows and cranberries with sugar; chill overnight. Step 2: Add apples, grapes, walnuts, salt and whipping cream. Step 3: Chill until ready to serve.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Caramels?
completion: Step 1: In a sauce pan over medim heat, add chopped chocolate, sugar, salt, syrup and cream. Step 2: Cover and boil 5 minutes. Step 3: Uncover. Step 4: Boil slowly, stirring constantly,  to firm ball stage (248 degrees fahrenheit). Step 5: Remove from heat. Step 6: Add flavoring and stir until  well blended. Step 7: Pour quickly over nuts which have been placed in well-buttered  pan. Step 8: Allow to cool; cut into squares.

prompt: How do I make Chocolatey Raisin Chip Cookies?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375f. Step 2: Combine sugars and oil; mix thoroughly. Step 3: Add vanilla and egg whites; beat well. Step 4: Stir in water. Step 5: In separate bowl, combine flour, milk, baking soda, and cocoa powder; add to wet ingredients. Step 6: Stir in chocolate chips, raisins, and nuts. Step 7: Drop by heaping teaspoon onto lightly oiled cookie sheets. Step 8: Bake 10 to 12 minutes. Step 9: Remove from sheets immediately; cool on racks. Step 10: Makes about 60 cookies.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate-Chocolate Cupcakes?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350  degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Spray muffin cups with cooking spray. Step 3: In large bowl, combine cake mix, water, and eggs; beat with an electric mixer for 2-1/2  minutes. Step 4: Divide batter evenly into muffin cups about two-thirds full. Step 5: Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until toothpick inserted in centre comes out clean. Step 6: Let cool in  pan for 10 minutes. Step 7: Remove from pan; cool another 10 minutes. Step 8: Gently cut  each cupcake in half horizontally - a serated knife usually works best. Step 9: Using a  double boiler; mix together chocolate morsels, milk, and cocoa in top; and bring water to a boil.", 
"once boiling, reduce heat to low and cook until morsels are  melted; stirring occasionally. Step 10: Remove boiler from heat and stir in 2 cups  powdered sugar and vanilla. Step 11: Gently spread bottom half of cupcakes with 2-3  teaspoons chocolate mixture; cover with top half of cupcake. Step 12: Sprinkle lightly with remaining powdered sugar.

prompt: How do I make Crock Pot Chocolate Zucchini Nut Bread?
completion: Step 1: Cream sugar and shortening in mixer, beat in eggs one at a time, add vanilla.  add everything else and mix thoroughly. Step 2: Pour into a greased crock pot bread insert.  cook 3 hours on high, or until the bread tests done with a wooden pick. Step 3: Let stand until it's medium cool to the touch before unmolding.  serve with butter.  you can also dust the bread with powdered sugar. Step 4: Possible modifications:  no cocoa; substitute 2 tsp cinnamon and 1 tsp nutmeg for cocoa; substitute 1 cup brown sugar for the white sugar.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Cashew Spread?
completion: Step 1: In a small heavy saucepan, melt chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly  until chocolate begins to melt.  immediately remove the chocolate from heat;  stir until smooth. Step 2: Cool slightly. Step 3: Place nuts in a food processor or blender; cover and process until nuts are  finely chopped, stopping and scraping the sides as necessary. Step 4: Add butter;  process until nearly smooth. Step 5: Transfer mixture to a bowl; stir in melted  chocolate.  serve at room temperature.  use spread on croissants, muffins or  biscuits.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Chip Cheesecake Dip?
completion: Step 1: Mix the raisins and brandy until raisins are coated and soak for 15 minutes. Step 2: In another bowl, beat the cream cheese and whipping cream until well  blended and smooth. Step 3: Add the vanilla, mixing well. Step 4: Blend in the brown sugar and cinnamon. Step 5: Mix in the drunken raisins and chocolate chips, blending well. Step 6: Garnish with a light dusting of cinnamon. Step 7: Serve at room temperature. Step 8: About 3 -3/4 cups dip.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Chip Cookie Pizza?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Coat a nonstick 12\" pizza pan with non-stick cooking  spray. Step 3: Spread cookie dough out evenly in prepared pan, pressing with fingers to  flatten. Step 4: Bake for 17 minutes or until cookie dough is lightly browned. Step 5: Let cookie pizza cool completely in pizza pan on a wire rack. Step 6: To decorate: Step 7: Spread raspberry preserves evenly over cookie pizza to within 1\" of edge. Step 8: Sprinkle chocolate candy, peanuts and coconut evenly over the preserves. Step 9: Cut into 12 pizza-shaped  slices.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Zucchini Cake?
completion:
Step 1: In a large bowl, beat eggs until fluffy. Step 2: Add sugar gradually, beating until mixture is thick and lemon-colored. Step 3: Beat in vanilla and butter. Step 4: Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, soda and salt; add alternately with buttermilk. Step 5: Beat until smooth. Step 6: Fold in zucchini and walnuts. Step 7: Divide batter into four greased and floured 8 or 9-in. round pans. Step 8: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 25 to 30 minutes or until top springs back when gently pressed. Step 9: Cool in pans 10 minutes; remove to wire wracks and cool completely.", 
"for frosting, beat all ingredients in a large bowl until creamy. Step 10: Frost between layers and on sides and top of cake.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Zucchini Bread?
completion: Step 1: In a mixing bowl, beat eggs, oil, sugar and vanilla. Step 2: Stir in zucchini. Step 3: Combine dry ingredients; add to zucchini mixture and mix well. Step 4: Pour into two greased 8x4x3-inch loaf pans. Step 5: Bake at 350°f for 1 hour or until bread tests done.  makes 2 loaves.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Chip Muffins?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Butter 12 large muffin pans well or line with  paper muffin cups. Step 3: Sift together all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, and baking powder. reserve. Step 4: Combine mashed banana with brown sugar until smooth. Step 5: Beat in eggs, milk and melted butter. Step 6: Stir in dry ingredients only until blended. Step 7: Quickly stir in chocolate chips. do not overbeat. Step 8: Spoon mixture into prepared muffin cups. an ice cream scoop  works  well for this. Step 9: Bake 25 minutes or until browned slightly.", 
"cool on  racks. Step 10: Preparation time 15 minutes, cooking time 25 minutes, yield 12 large muffins. Step 11: Rj's note: tested recipe august 31, 1999. Step 12: I substituted 1/3 cup canola oil instead of butter. Step 13: The banana and chocolate chips give the muffin a nice flavour and it is not overly sweet.  tastes almost healthy :-).

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Triumph of Gluttony Cake?
completion:
Step 1: In a medium mixing bowl, whisk the yolks with the vanilla extract.  whisk in half the sugar and continue to beat until very light and  frothy, about 5 minutes. Step 2: Combine the flour and cornstarch and sift  once to aerate. in a clean, dry bowl, beat the egg whites with the  salt until they hold a very soft peak. Step 3: Beating faster, add the  remaining sugar in a very slow stream, beating until the egg whites  hold a firm peak. Step 4: Fold the yolks into the whites. Step 5: Sift the flour and  cornstarch over the eggs in 3 additions, folding them in gradually.", 
"do not over-mix the batter. Step 6: Pour the batter into a buttered and  paper-lined 9- or 10-inch round pan, 2-inches deep and smooth the  top. Step 7: Bake the pan di spagna at 350 degrees, 30 to 40 minutes,  until it is well risen and feels firm when pressed gently with the  palm of the hand. Step 8: Immediately loosen the layer from the side of the  pan with a small knife or spatula. Step 9: Invert the layer and leave the  paper stuck to it. turn the layer right side up and cool it on a rack. Step 10: Double-wrap the layer in plastic and keep it in the refrigerator up to  5 days or freeze it. variations: flavor the batter with a grated  orange or lemon zest or a tablespoon of anisette.", 
"for the chocolate filling, bring the cream to a boil and remove the  heat. Step 11: Add finely cut chocolate, stir once and let stand for 3  minutes. Step 12: Whisk smooth, pour into a bowl and cool until set, several  hours at a cool room temperature. Step 13: Set aside. Step 14: For the syrup, bring  sugar and water to a boil in a small pan. Step 15: Cool and stir in  maraschino. Step 16: For the pistachios, place in a pan and cover with  water. Step 17: Bring to a boil, drain and rub in a towel to loosen skins. Step 18: Go over pistachios to separate from skins.", 
"place pistachios on a jelly  roll pan and dry out at 325 degrees about 5 minutes. Step 19: Cool and  chop coarsely. Step 20: To prepare the layers, cut the pan di spagna into 5  thin horizontal slices. Step 21: Reserve 2 of the slices, then cut the other  slices into smaller disks, each 1-inch smaller in diameter then the  reserved 2, to make a 9, 8-, and 7-inch disk. Step 22: Reserve scraps. Step 23: To  finish the filling, beat the butter by machine until soft and light, then  beat in the cooled chocolate mixture all at once. beat again until  light, then beat in the maraschino.", 
"stir in half of the chopped  pistachios. Step 24: To assemble, place one of the 10-inch layers on a  platter or cardboard and moisten with the syrup. Step 25: Spread the filling. Step 26: Continue with the remaining layers. Step 27: After spreading the 7-inch layer  with the filling, form a 6-inch layer with the scraps on top of it. Step 28: Moisten the 6-inch layer and spread the entire outside of the cake  with the filling. Step 29: Cut a slash from the center to the edge of the  reserved 10-inch layer and cover the entire outside of the cake with  it.", 
"moisten with the remaining syrup and spread with the remaining  filling. Step 30: Press the reserved pistachios all over the outside of the  cake. Step 31: Dust lightly with the confectioners' sugar.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Chip Squares?
completion: Step 1: Mix the butter, brown sugar, flour, baking powder, vanilla, milk, and egg yolks together until it forms a stiff dough. Step 2: Press dough into the bottom of a 9 x 9 inch pan. Step 3: Sprinkle chocolate chips over dough. Step 4: Make a meringue by whipping together the egg whites and brown sugar. Step 5: Pour meringue over dough and chocolate chips. Step 6: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for about 30 minutes. Step 7: Notes : i usually cut down on the brown sugar in the meringue by about 1/4 of a cup. the squares are rich enough that they don't miss it. i also use margarine instead of butter.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Tapioca Pudding?
completion: Step 1: Combine sugar, tapioca, and salt in a saucepan; stir in milk and egg. Step 2: Let stand 5  minutes. Step 3: Add chopped chocolate squares and instant coffee. Step 4: Cook, stirring over medium heat, until mixture comes to a full boil and chocolate is blended, about 15 minutes. Step 5: Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Step 6: Cool for 20 minutes; stir and chill. Step 7: Serve  with whipped topping if desired.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Chip Shortbread?
completion: Step 1: Cream butter, sugar, and vanilla until blended. Step 2: On low speed, beat in flour. Step 3: Stir in 1/2 cup chocolate chips. Step 4: Cover and chill until firm, but not too firm. Step 5: Shape heaping tablespoonfuls into 3\" long x 1/2\" thick logs. Step 6: Place cookies on lightly greased cookie sheets. Step 7: Bake in 350 degree fahreneheit oven for 8 minutes or until golden brown. Step 8: Cool. Step 9: Melt remaining 1/2 cup chocolate chips and oil. Step 10: Dip 3/4\" of one end of  each cookie into the melted chocolate. Step 11: Place cookies on a wire rack to set.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Chunk and Walnut Brownies?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Line a 13 by 9-1/2 inch baking pan with two layers of aluminum foil, allowing an overhang on each end. grease the foil with butter. Step 3: Stir together the flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt. Step 4: Place the chopped semi-sweet chocolate in a larger bowl. Step 5: In a saucepan, heat the granulated sugar, unsalted butter, corn syrup and water until the butter melts and the sugar is dissolved. Step 6: Remove the pan from the heat once it reaches a boil. Step 7: Pour the hot syrup over the semi-sweet chocolate, allowing it to stand momentarily. stir until smooth.", 
"whisk the eggs in one at  a time. Step 8: Whisk in the vanilla and the flour mixture until smooth. Step 9: Fold in the walnuts and the chopped swiss chocolate. Step 10: Scrape the batter into the prepared pan. Step 11: Bake for 50 minutes to 1 hour, or until a cake tester comes out clean. Step 12: Cool the brownies in the pan on a wire rack for at least 6 hours. Step 13: Carefully invert the brownies onto a large cutting board or platter and peel off the foil. Step 14: Invert the brownies again and cut into 24 squares.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Pudding?
completion: Step 1: Mix the dry milk powder, sugar, cornstarch, salt, and cocoa together until well blended. Step 2: It can be stored in a big airtight container or glass jar until you need it. Step 3: To use, stir mix before using to redistribute ingredients. Step 4: Measure out 2/3 cup of the pudding mix into a medium saucepan. Step 5: Add milk, vanilla and butter and cook over low heat, stirring constantly until mixture comes to a boil. Step 6: Continue cooking and stirring for another minute. Step 7: Remove from heat and let cool.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Coffee?
completion: Step 1: Bring chocolate and half and half to a boil in a large saucepan over medium heat stirring constantly; stir in coffee. Step 2: Remove from heat; stir in liqueur. Step 3: Serve  with sweetened whipped cream.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Pudding II?
completion: Step 1: Combine sugar, cornstarch, and salt in medium saucepan; gradually stir in milk  and egg yolks. Step 2: Add baking chocolate, broken into pieces; cook and stir over  medium heat until mixture boils. Step 3: Boil and stir for 1 minute; remove from heat.  add butter and vanilla; pour into individual serving dishes. Step 4: Chill. Step 5: Serve with whipped cream.

prompt: How do I make Fudgy Chocolate Crinkle Cookies?
completion: Step 1: Mix oil, chocolate, sugar; blend in eggs. Step 2: Add vanilla, salt, baking powder and flour. Step 3: Cover and chill several hours or overnight. Step 4: Preheat oven to 350f and grease your cookie sheets. Step 5: Roll 1 tbsp dough into a ball and roll around in powdered sugar to coat. Step 6: Place on greased cookie sheet and bake for 10 to 12  minutes. Step 7: Remove from baking sheet and cool.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Cream Puffs?
completion:
Step 1: Combine water, butter, sugar and salt in a medium size saucepan. Step 2: Place over  medium low heat to melt butter. Step 3: Add flour and cocoa powder all at once; stir  vigorously until mixture pulls away from side of pan. Step 4: Remove from heat. heat  oven to 400. Step 5: Lightly coat baking sheet with cooking spray. Step 6: With the saucepan  off heat, add eggs one at a time, to batter in saucepan, beating well after each addition. Step 7: With a 1/4 cup drop mixture onto baking sheet, spacing 2\" apart. bake for 40 minutes until puffed and firm.", 
"cool slightly. Step 8: Cut off top third of each puff; scoop out soft center from bases. Step 9: Cool bases and top on wire rack. Step 10: Fill  puffs with ice cream of your choice; cover with tops. Step 11: Freeze on baking sheets  until firm. Step 12: Transfer to an airtight container. Step 13: Freeze for up to 1 week. Step 14: Place puff on plates. Step 15: Let stand 15 minutes. Step 16: Top with sauce of your choice.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Cream Meringue Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Filling: Step 2: Combine sugar, flour, cocoa, and salt in medium saucepan; stir in milk. Step 3: Cook  over medium heat, stirring constantly until mixture boils; remove from heat. Step 4: Stir half of the mixture into beaten egg yolks; return egg mixture to saucepan. Step 5: Continue cooking and stirring over medium heat until mixture boils; boil and  stir for 1 minute. Step 6: Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla. Step 7: Cool for  10 minutes. Step 8: Pour into pre-baked pie shell. Step 9: Meringue topping: Step 10: Heat oven to 350°f.", 
"in small mixing bowl, beat egg whites and cream of tartar until foamy. Step 11: Gradually add sugar and beat until stiff peaks form. Step 12: Spread this on warm pie  filling, carefully sealing to the edges of crust. Step 13: Bake 5 to 8 minutes or just  until meringue is lightly browned. Step 14: Cool to room temperature; chill for several  hours.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Cream Easter Eggs?
completion: Step 1: Combine frosting mix with soft butter, water and if desired chopped fruits or  nuts. Step 2: Knead 20-30 times on board lightly dusted with confectioners sugar. Step 3: Divide and shape into 8 eggs; chill. Step 4: Coat eggs with chocolate fudge frosting  mix by dipping egg into frosting, ending with a swirl on top. Step 5: Keep frosting mix over hot water while dipping the eggs. Step 6: Decorated with white frosting mix tinted with pastel colors.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Cream Cheese Pie?
completion: Step 1: Melt chocolate bar in milk over low heat. Step 2: Cream together cream cheese and sugar. add chocolate, then fold in cool whip. Step 3: Put into pie crust. Step 4: Freeze.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Cream Brulee?
completion: Step 1: Beat the chestnut puree to lighten it. Step 2: Whip the cream (not stiffly); fold in  cinnamon, chestnut puree and chocolate. Step 3: Divide among 4 heat-proof ramekins and smooth level. Step 4: Chill 1 hour. Step 5: Preheat broiler. Step 6: Sprinkle sugar on the brulee evenly; broil until bubbly. Step 7: Serve immediately.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Curry II?
completion:
Step 1: The day before, place whole chicken in a large saucepan. Step 2: Cover chicken with water; bring to a boil; lower heat and simmer for about one hour or until chicken is  starting to fall off the bones. Step 3: Remove chicken and put aside to cool. Step 4: Pour stock into a large bowl; place in the refrigerator. Step 5: The next day the fat will have set. remove the fat and throw it away. Step 6: Meanwhile, remove chicken from bones and cut into bite size pieces. Step 7: Put in refrigerator until needed. Step 8: (ingredients do not need to be precise.) place butter and onions in saucepan over a medium to high  heat and fry until soft.", 
"add one teaspoon of salt. Step 9: Add extra butter to saucepan if needed as you are about to add flour, curry powder, ginger, and a good few  shakes of pepper (about 1/2 teaspoon). Step 10: You need the melted butter to combine it all to a thick paste. Step 11: Stir out any lumps. Step 12: Add chicken stock one cupful at a time; stir well to smooth paste. Step 13: Bring to boil after each cupful is added. Step 14: Continue with this process until sauce is the thickness you like. (i like it fairly thick). Step 15: Add chopped chicken.", 
"reheat until chicken is hot. Step 16: Serve with rice. (tastes better if cooked the day before). Step 17: Leftover curry can be frozen. don't freeze the rice.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Giblets or Livers?
completion: Step 1: Fry the giblets and/or livers in the olive oil until brown. Step 2: Add the spices and seasonings and stir well. Step 3: Add the chopped onion and garlic.  fry for 5 minutes. Step 4: Add wine and simmer gently until cooked. Step 5: If you are cooking giblets only, a little water may be added if necessary.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Fried Brown Rice?
completion: Step 1: Heat large nonstick skillet over medium heat. add 1 tablespoon oil. Step 2: Add chicken, red  pepper, and green onion. Step 3: Cook 5 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Step 4: Remove  to plate. Step 5: Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in skillet. Step 6: Add cooked rice; cook 1 minute. Step 7: Stir in soy sauce, vinegar, and peas; cook 1 minute. Step 8: Stir in chicken and vegetable mixture. Step 9: *note: simmer, covered, 1 cup brown rice in 2-1/2 cups water for 45 minutes.

prompt: How do I make "any" Muffins?
completion:
Step 1: Bake 15 to 20 minutes in a 400 oven. Step 2: For the muffins: grain:  use 2 to 2 1/2 cup of white flour. Step 3: Or -- Step 4: Substitute oatmeal,  cornmeal, whole wheat flour, rye flour, or flake cereal for 1 cup of the white  flour. Step 5: Or -- Step 6: Substitute 1 cup leftover cooked oatmeal, rice or cornmeal for  1/2 cup of the white flour and decrease liquid to 1/2 cup. Step 7: Milk:  use 1 cup. Step 8: Or -- Step 9: Substitute buttermilk or sour milk. Step 10: Or substitute fruit juice for part  or all of the milk. Step 11: Fat:  use 1/4 cup vegetable oil or 4 tbsp melted butter or  margarine.  or  substitute regular or crunch peanut butter for part or all of  the fat.  the fat can be reduced or omitted with fair results if using a \"wet  addition.\"  egg:  use 1 egg.", 
"or -- Step 12: Substitute 1 heaping tbsp of soy flour and 1 tbsp of water. Step 13: If using a cooked grain, separate the egg, add the yolk to the batter, beat white until stiff, and fold into the batter. Step 14: Sweetener:  use  between 2 tbsp and 1/2 cup sugar. Step 15: Or -- Step 16: Substitute up to 3/4 cup brown sugar. Step 17: Or -- substitute up to 1/2 cup honey or molasses and decrease milk to 3/4 cup. Step 18: Baking powder:  use 2 teaspoons. Step 19: If using whole or cooked grains or more than 1 cup  additions, increase to 3 teaspoons.", 
"if using buttermilk or sour milk, decrease to 1  tsp and add 1/2 tsp baking soda. Step 20: Salt:  use 1/2 tsp, or omit if you have a  salt-restricted diet.  optional ingredients: the following ingredients are optional. Step 21: Additions can be  used in any combination, up to 1 1/2 cups total. Step 22: If using more than 1 cup of  wet additions, decrease the milk to 1/2 cup. Step 23: Dry additions:  nuts, sunflower seeds, raisins, coconut, and so on. Step 24: Moist additons:  blueberries, chopped apple, shredded zucchini, shredded carrot, and so on.", 
"wet additions:  pumpkin puree, applesauce, mashed potato, mashed bananas, mashed carrot, and so on. Step 25: If using 1/2 cup drained canned fruit or thawed shredded  zucchini, substitute the syrup or zucchini liquid for all or part of the milk. Step 26: Spices:  use spices that complement the additions, such as 1 tsp cinnamon with 1/4 tsp nutmeg or cloves. Step 27: Try 2 tsp grated orange or lemon peel. Step 28: Jellies and jam:  fill cups half full with a plain batter. Step 29: Add 1 tsp jam or  jelly and top with 2 more tbsp batter.", 
"nonsweet combinations:  use only 2 tbsp sugar and no fruit.  add combinations of the following:  1/2 cup shredded cheese, 2 strips fried and crumbled bacon, 2  tbsp grated onion, 1/2 cup shredded zucchini, 2 tbsp parmesan cheese.  spices  could include parsley, marjoram, rosemary -- Step 30: Alena kibbler's additions: hawaiian muffins:  use 1/2 cup mashed banana, 1/2 cup drained crushed pineapple, and 1/2 cup flake coconut, and 1 tbsp vanilla or rum flavoring. Step 31: Use the  pineapple juice instead of milk.", 
"cherry vanilla chip muffins:  3/4 cup pitted chopped cherries, 3/4 cup vanilla  chips, 1 tsp vanilla. Step 32: Elvis muffins:  use about 3/4 to 1 cup mashed banana, 1/2 cup chopped peanuts or walnuts (any nut).  and substitute 1/4 peanut butter for the oil.

prompt: How do I make Amber and Zach's Kisses?
completion: Step 1: Beat egg whites until they are very stiff. Step 2: Add the sugar slowly while beating the stiff egg whites. Step 3: Drop by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper lined cookie sheet. Step 4: Bake at 275 degrees fahrenheit for 50 minutes. Step 5: Adds a wonderful decoration to anything edible or eat them by themselves. Step 6: For a colorful variation, separate into small bowls and add small drops of food coloring to a more colorful decoration. Step 7: Experiment with  them. Step 8: Use your imagination to make all kinds of food art; flowers, smiley faces, animals, etc.

prompt: How do I make Swiss Crab Melt?
completion: Step 1: Split english muffins and broil until lightly browned. Step 2: Top each half  with a fourth of the crab meat. Step 3: Place a slice of tomato on each. Step 4: Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Step 5: Top with swiss cheese. Step 6: Put back under the broiler briefly until cheese melts. Step 7: Serve while hot.

prompt: How do I make Lee's Hot Crab Dip?
completion: Step 1: Remove cartilage from crab meat. Step 2: In a large bowl, mix cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, and garlic salt until smooth. Step 3: Add enough milk to make mixture creamy. Step 4: Stir in 2 tablespoons of the grated cheese. Step 5: Fold crab meat into cream cheese mixture. Step 6: Pour into greased 1-quart casserole. Step 7: Top with remaining cheese and paprika. Step 8: Bake at 325 degrees fahrenheit until mixture is bubbly and browned on top, about 30 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Grilled Avocado Toast?
completion: Step 1: Combine olive oil and garlic. Step 2: Cut bread diagonally into 1/2 inch slices. Step 3: Brush  each slice with oil. Step 4: Place on a cookie sheet; broil or grill until golden, approximately 5 minutes. Step 5: Top each slice with tomato, onion, avocado and cheese. Step 6: Return  to broiler for 5 to 10 minutes until avocados begin to blister and brown.

prompt: How do I make Mustard Dill Sauce I?
completion: Step 1: Whisk first 4 ingredients in bowl. Step 2: Gradually whisk in oil. Step 3: Stir in dill. Step 4: Cover and chill.

prompt: How do I make Cucumber Pita Wedges?
completion: Step 1: In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and salad dressing mix until combined. Step 2: Split pita breads in half, forming two circles. Step 3: Spread cream cheese mixture over pita circles; cut each into six wedges. Step 4: Top with cucumbers. Step 5: Sprinkle with lemon-pepper.

prompt: How do I make Thai Chicken Curry?
completion: Step 1: Combine cocnut milk, potatoes, nam pla, curry powder, and cloves. Step 2: Simmer 15 minutes. Step 3: Add chicken; cover, increase heat and cook until chicken and potatoes are tender, about 8 minutes. Step 4: Stir  occasionally. Step 5: Serve with rice.

prompt: How do I make Thai Chicken Noodles?
completion:
Step 1: Marinate chicken in wine 30 minutes. Step 2: In a small skillet, saute garlic and shallots in 3 tablespoons oil until crisp; drain, reserving oil. Step 3: Boil rice vermicelli noodles 2 minutes; drain; toss with garlic oil. Step 4: Grind red chilies. Step 5: In a wok, heat 1 tablespoon oil and fry chilies 1 minute, until aroma mellows. Step 6: Add chicken and wine, and sliced chinese mushrooms; stir-fry 3 minutes. Step 7: Add shrimp; heat through; add tomato paste, 2 tablespoons sugar, and nam pla. Step 8: Add bean sprouts and basil; stir 2 minutes.", 
"add noodles; toss. Step 9: Garnish with garlic, shallots, and peanuts.

prompt: How do I make Sorrel Tarragon Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Mix all ingredients in medium bowl. Step 2: Season with salt and pepper. Step 3: Cover and chill at least 4 hours. Step 4: (can be prepared 1 day ahead. keep refrigerated.)

prompt: How do I make Thai Cucumber Salad?
completion: Step 1: Seed and finely chop cucumbers; pat dry. Step 2: Mix together with onion and shrimp;  sprinkle with sugar. Step 3: Season with nam pla and lime juice. Step 4: Sprinkle with peanuts and optional chilies.

prompt: How do I make Lime Pistachio Bars?
completion:
Step 1: To prepare crust: preheat oven to 350°. Step 2: Coat bottom of 8-inch square baking pan with cooking spray. Step 3: Place flour and powdered sugar in bowl of food processor. Step 4: Add butter. Step 5: Pulse machine on and off until mixture resembles coarse meal. Step 6: (by hand, place flour and sugar in mixing bowl; add butter. Step 7: Cut butter into dry ingredients using pastry blender or 2 table knives.) remove mixture from processor; knead gently until dough holds together and forms solid mass. Step 8: Press dough evenly into prepared pan.", 
"bake on center rack until crust is lightly colored, 15-18 minutes. Step 9: Remove from oven; retain oven temperature. to prepare filling: beat eggs in mixer on medium speed 1 to 2 minutes. Step 10: Add sugar, flour and baking powder; beat 1 minute at high speed. Step 11: Stir in lime zest and juice. pour mixture over baked crust and spread evenly with spatula. Step 12: Return pan to oven and bake until top is light brown and center is set, 20-25 minutes. Step 13: Sprinkle pistachios over top, pressing them down so they adhere well.", 
"let cool completely in pan. Step 14: Using long, heavy, sharp knife, cut into 16 squares. Step 15: If not using immediately, arrange squares on plate and cover with plastic wrap. Step 16: (bars can be prepared 1 day ahead). Step 17: Serve bars cold or at room temperature.

prompt: How do I make London Bars?
completion:
Step 1: Cream butter in a large mixing bowl; gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Step 2: Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating well  after each addition. Step 3: Stir in flour, blending well. Step 4: Press mixture into a lightly greased 15 x 10 x 1\" jelly-roll pan. Step 5: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Step 6: Remove from oven; cool in pan. Step 7: Spread raspberry  preserves over baked crust. Step 8: Beat egg whites (at room temperature) in a  medium mixing bowl until foamy.", 
"gradually add remaining sugar, 1  tablespoon  at a time, beating until stiff peaks form. Step 9: Fold in vanilla. Step 10: Spread meringue over preserves. Step 11: Sprinkle with pecans. Step 12: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 15 minutes or until  lightly browned. Step 13: Cool slightly; cut into 2 x 1-inch bars with a warm knife. Step 14: Remove to wire racks to cool completely. Step 15: Store in airtight containers.

prompt: How do I make Stewed Jimmy Crabs?
completion: Step 1: Remove all traces of mud from crabs. Step 2: Pull off back shell and innards. Step 3: Set a 10 quart pot on the burner. Step 4: Lay 4 strips of bacon on the bottom of the pan and fry. Step 5: Set aside bacon. Step 6: To the bacon grease add 2 tablespoons of flour. Step 7: Brown the flour in the grease, then add 1 quart of water to the pot. add the diced onion, the cleaned crabs, and the salt and pepper. Step 8: Cook over medium heat for 25 minutes, then add potatoes. Step 9: When potatoes are cooked through, remove the stew from the heat and serve hot. for hearty crab eaters, allow 4 crabs per serving.

prompt: How do I make Ann's Blooming Lovely Chocolate Cheesecake?
completion:
Step 1: To make the base: Step 2: Melt the margarine gently in a saucepan. Step 3: Crush  the digestive biscuits until they resemble fine breadcrumbs. Step 4: Take  the margarine off the heat and mix in the biscuit crumbs. Step 5: Press this mixture into an 11\" flan tin. Step 6: To make the topping: Step 7: Mix the tofu, orange juice, orange rind or  banana, cocoa powder, oil and sugar well, preferably in a food  processor. Step 8: Ensure a smooth consistency. Step 9: If it doesn't mix well, add  a few tablespoons of soya milk. Step 10: Place over the base and smooth the top.", 
"cook for 30-40 minutes at 175 degrees celsius. Step 11: Remove from oven. Step 12: Cool. chill in the refrigerator overnight. Step 13: Add a topping of your choice such as slices of fresh orange or grated chocolate.

prompt: How do I make Chinese Style Sauteed Firm Tofu?
completion: Step 1: Cut tofu crosswise into pieces the shape of french-fried potatoes. Step 2: Heat a wok, coat with oil and sprinkle on the salt. Step 3: Add onion then mushrooms, stir-frying each over high heat for about 30 seconds. Step 4: Reduce heat to medium-low. Step 5: Add carrot, green pepper and tofu in that order, sauteing each for about 1 minute. Step 6: Reduce heat to low and add sake, soy sauce, ginger, sugar and water. Step 7: Simmer for 3 to 4 minutes. Step 8: Stir in dissolved cornstarch and simmer 30 seconds more.

prompt: How do I make Chesapeake Bay Crab Salad?
completion: Step 1: Remove cartilage from crab meat. Step 2: In a bowl, mix mayonnaise, pimiento, mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, hot pepper sauce, lemon juice, and celery. Step 3: Blend well. Step 4: Pour over crab meat and toss lightly but evenly. Step 5: Refrigerate. Step 6: Serve in bowl lined with lettuce leaves. Step 7: Garnish with lemon  slices and sprinkle with paprika.

prompt: How do I make Crab Bisque Chincoteague?
completion: Step 1: Melt butter in a heavy 4-quart saucepan over medium heat. stir in flour to make a roux. Step 2: Slowly add milk until it is well blended. Step 3: Stirring constantly, add cheese and cook until mixture thickens. Step 4: Reduce heat and add seasonings, sherry, cream, and parsley. Step 5: When mixture is thoroughly heated, add crab meat, stirring gently to keep lumps intact. serve immediately in warm bowls and garnish with parsley.

prompt: How do I make Maryland Pavilion Crab Cakes?
completion: Step 1: In a bowl, combine crab meat, eggs, mayonnaise, horseradish mustard,  chopped parsley, salt, pepper, and hot-pepper sauce. mix lightly. Step 2: Separate  and form into 12 to 16 small cakes; do not pack firmly. Step 3: Roll crackers into  fine crumbs. Step 4: Pat the cracker crumbs lightly onto the crab cakes. Step 5: Heat oil  to a depth of about 1/4 inch in a large skillet, or heat the oil in a deep  fryer. Step 6: Fry crab cakes until golden brown, turning once. drain on paper  toweling. Step 7: Serves 6. Step 8: \"this recipe came from the maryland pavilion at the 1964-65 new york  world's fair.\

prompt: How do I make Crabapple Jelly?
completion:
Step 1: Wash apples; remove stem and blossom ends. Step 2: Cover with a water in a  large stainless steel or ceramic pot. Step 3: Add washed sprigs of cinnamon or lemon basil. Step 4: Simmer until apples are soft. Step 5: Drain juice over pan; through jelly bag or clean dish towel. Step 6: Bring 4 cups of drained juice (add water to make 4 cups if necessary), to a boil in a very large stainless steel or ceramic pot. Step 7: Add sugar and boil to sheeting stage. (when the drips sheet together on the side of a stainless steel spoon). skim.", 
"pour into sterilized jelly jars. Step 8: Skim again and seal with two thin layers of paraffin, making certain the 2nd one seals the jar to glass edges. Step 9: Yield - about 5 cups of bright red jelly.

prompt: How do I make Trifle?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: Beat the egg white substitutes until stiff  with an electric mixer. Step 3: Fold in the sugar, milk, and lemon juice and beat again. Step 4: Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a small mixing bowl. Step 5: Sprinkle into  the egg white mixture, a bit at a time, beating in each time with the mixer  until velvety smooth. Step 6: Pour into a lightly oiled, 9- by 13-inch baking pan. Step 7: Bake  for 25 minutes, or until the top is golden and a knife inserted into the center  tests clean.", 
"this cake may be made well ahead of time; let it cool completely,  then store in an airtight container or proceed with the remaining steps. Step 8: For  the custard, combine the cornstarch and sugar in a heavy saucepan. Step 9: Pour in  enough soy milk to dissolve them. Step 10: Whisk in the remaining milk. Step 11: Place over  moderate heat and bring to a simmer, whisking almost continuously, so that the  cornstarch does not lump on the bottom. Step 12: Let the mixture simmer gently, whisking  frequently, until thick. Step 13: Remove from the heat. stir in the vanilla and lemon  juice. let the custard cool to room temperature.  before assembling the trifle, cut the cake base into 4 to 6 sections, then  carefully split the sections in half through the center so that they are half  the thickness.", 
"spread the bottom halves with the raspberry preserves , then  cover with the tops. Step 14: Cut the sandwiched cake into approximately 1- by 2-inch  fingers. Step 15: Assemble the trifle in a trifle dish or a io-inch round, preferably  clear-glass casserole dish at least 3 to 4 inches deep: half the cake fingers,  sprinkled with half of the sherry or port, half of the custard, the pear s  lices, the remaining cake fingers, the remaining sherry or port, the remaining  custard. Step 16: Sprinkle the top with the sliced almonds and decorate with small dots  of raspberry jam, either in an irregular or regular pattern.", 
"chill thoroughly  before serving.

prompt: How do I make Suffolk Trifle (English)?
completion:
Step 1: Put the macaroons in a glass bowl and pour over the wine and brandy. Step 2: Leave macaroons to soak, adding extra wine or brandy if they appear   dry. Step 3: Pour the single cream into a pan and warm gently until just on   the point of boiling. Step 4: Beat together the egg, egg yolk and cornflour   in a bowl, pour on the cream and whisk iightly. Step 5: Return to a clean   saucepan and cook gently, without boiling, until custard has   thickened, stirring continuously. Step 6: Stir in the sugar and allow the   custard to cool a little. pour over the soaked macaroons and set in   a cool place. carefully smooth the jam over the custard,  then    sprinkle  with  almonds  and candied peel.", 
"whip the double cream   until it stands in soft peaks and pipe or pile on top of trifle.   serve decorated with extra blanched almonds and candied peel, if   desired.

prompt: How do I make Twice-Baked Potatoes (Microwave)?
completion:
Step 1: Pierce well-scrubbed potatoes twice. Step 2: Place 1 inch apart on paper towel in microwave oven. Step 3: Microwave at high 10-1/2 to 12-1/2 minutes, or until  just softened, rearranging and turning over after half the cooking  time. Step 4: Let stand, covered with a bowl, for 5 minutes. Step 5: Place bacon on paper towel lined plate. cover with paper towel. Step 6: Microwave at high 5 to 6 minutes, or until crisp. Step 7: Drain bacon on paper towel; crumble. Step 8: Place butter and green onion in 2 quart casserole; cover. Step 9: Microwave at high 1-1/2 to 2 minutes, or until butter is melted and onion is tender.", 
"cut potatoes in half lengthwise. Step 10: Scoop out center; place in casserole with onion-butter and bacon. Step 11: Add milk, salt and pepper; mash until fluffy. Step 12: Spoon into potato shells. Step 13: Arrange on paper towel-lined microwaveable baking sheet. Step 14: Sprinkle with paprika. Step 15: Microwave at high 3 to 7 minutes, or until heated, rotating 1/2 turn. Step 16: Garnish with additional chopped green onion, if desired.

prompt: How do I make Twice Baked Potatoes?
completion:
Step 1: Heat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Scrub potatoes; prick several times with a fork. Step 3: Place in oven; bake 50 to 60 minutes until potatoes feel soft when squeezed. Step 4: Remove and cool 15 minutes; half potatoes length wise (carefully). Step 5: Using a small spoon scoop out pulp into a large bowl, leaving a 1/4 inch thick shell. Step 6: Save the best 8 shells. Step 7: Freeze the remaining shells for french fries or stuffed potato skins. Step 8: Simmer milk and butter until butter melts. Step 9: Pour over potato pulp and mash or beat until almost smooth.", 
"add egg, half of cheese,salt, pepper and nutmeg. Step 10: Mash until almost smooth. Step 11: Fill shells using about 1/3 cup mixture per shell. Step 12: Sprinkle with chives or green onion, remaining cheese and a little paprika. Step 13: Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 14: Place shells on cookie sheet. Step 15: Bake for 30 minutes until puffed and brown.

prompt: How do I make Spiced Pear Butter?
completion:
Step 1: Combine pears and apple juice in a large dutch oven. Step 2: Tie broken cinnamon  spices, gingerroot, allspice and cloves in a piece of cheese cloth; add  to pear mixture. bring to a boil; cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 45  minutes to 1 hour or until pears are tender. Step 3: Drain pears, and discard  spice bag. Step 4: Mash pears or process in food processor until smooth. Step 5: Return  pear puree to dutch oven, and add sugar. Step 6: Cook, uncovered, over medium  heat for 30 to 40 minutes or until mixture thickens, stirring frequently.", 
"remove from heat, and quickly pour hot pear mixture into hot sterilized  jars, leaving 1/4-inch headspace; wipe jar rims. Step 7: Cover at once with  metal lids, and screw on bands. Step 8: Process in boiling water bath for 5  minutes.

prompt: How do I make Lemon Curried Lamb Chops?
completion: Step 1: Combine lemon juice, curry powder, salt and sugar. Step 2: Brush mixture over the chops and let stand for 2 hours to absorb the flavors. Step 3: Heat the  butter in a frying pan, cook until golden brown on both sides.

prompt: How do I make Lemon Mint Lamb Chops?
completion: Step 1: Grill chops until tender. Step 2: While chops are under the grill, prepare the sauce: Step 3: Melt butter in pan; add finely chopped onion, saute until tender. Step 4: Add lemon rind, lemon juice, sugar and mint, heat gently. Step 5: Spoon over hot chops. Step 6: Cheers, doreen doreen randal, wanganui, new zealand.

prompt: How do I make Winter Pear Butter?
completion:
Step 1: Peel, quarter and core the pears; chop in 1/2-inch pieces. Step 2: Put all the ingredients in a large heavy pot; bring to a boil. Step 3: Reduce the heat and cook, stirring often, for 15 minutes, or until the  pears are soft. Step 4: Puree the mixture in a food processor or blender. Step 5: Return the  puree to the pot. Step 6: Cook uncovered over very low heat, stirring often, for 1 to 1-1/2 hours, or until the pear butter is very thick. Step 7: Be careful not  to let it scorch. Step 8: Remove from the heat. Step 9: Stir the hot pear butter for a minute or two to release more heat.", 
"spoon into clean hot jars, leaving 1/4 inch of space at the top of  each jar. Step 10: Wipe the rim of each jar. Step 11: Cover and allow to come to room  temperature. (you'll notice that the pear butter is a rather gray-green  color; this is the correct color.) Step 12: Label the jars and refrigerate for up to three weeks. Step 13: (remember: the label should include the name of the recipe and the  date by which it should be eaten. be sure the recipient stores the pear butter in the refrigerator.).

prompt: How do I make Meatballs in Cheese Pastry?
completion:
Step 1: Process flour, pepper and butter until combined. Step 2: Add cheese, process until mixture forms a ball. Step 3: Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth; cover and refrigerate 30 minutes. Step 4: Roll pastry between sheets of greaseproof paper until 2mm thick. Step 5: Cut into 4cm rounds, top each with a meatball. Step 6: Fold pastry to enclose meatballs completely, roll into balls. Step 7: Brush top with egg, sprinkle with seeds, place about 3cm apart on greased oven trays. Step 8: Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes.", 
"bake in a moderately hot oven about 15 minutes or until lightly browned; cool before serving. Step 9: Meatballs:- combine all ingredients in a bowl; mix well. Step 10: Roll level teaspoons of mixture into balls. Step 11: You can make three hours ahead of time and cooked balls freeze well.

prompt: How do I make Basic Habanero Sauce?
completion:
Step 1: Saute onion and garlic until soft. Step 2: Add carrots with a small amount of water. Step 3: Bring  to a boil, reduce heat and simmer until carrots are soft. Step 4: Place in a blender with the peppers; puree until smooth. Step 5: Mix puree with vinegar and lime juice and simmer for 5 minutes. Step 6: Seal in sterilized bottles/jars.  makes 2 cups. Step 7: You can also try: my recipe. Step 8: I'm allergic to onions, so i make mine somewhat differently Step 9: 24-30 habenero peppers, stemmed and chopped, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 pound shredded carrots, 2 heaping tbsp of chopped garlic (i get this at the market in a jar. i prefer  to use the water pack, but the garlic packed in oil works just as well), 1 cup apple cider vinegar, 1/2 to 3/4 cup key lime juice.", 
"saute garlic in oil until soft. Step 10: Add carrots and stir-fry for a minute or two to  distribute the garlic well. Step 11: Add enough water to come just short of covering the  carrots. Step 12: Bring to a boil, and simmer until carrots are soft, and liquid is  reduced to about 1/2 of what you started with. Step 13: Put carrot mixture and peppers into food processor and process until relatively smooth, adding vinegar and lime juice. Step 14: Return to the stove and simmer 5 to 7 minutes. Step 15: For smooth tabasco style sauce, strain through cheesecloth (pressing out  all the liquid) and bottle in sterilized bottles.", 
"for a thicker basting type sauce, bottle as is. Step 16: Makes 8 or 9 ( 4 oz) canning jars.

prompt: How do I make Greek Phyllo Seafood Rolls?
completion:
Step 1: Squeeze the spinach with your hands to remove excess liquid. Step 2: Put the spinach in  a large bowl with ricotta, feta, lemon zest, dill weed and pepper. Step 3: Stir to mix  well. Step 4: Heat the olive oil in a medium frying pan over medium heat. Step 5: Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until the onion is tender, 3 to 4 minutes. Step 6: Add  the garlic and stir 20 to 30 seconds. Step 7: Add the onion-garlic mixture to the bowl with the spinach; stir until well mixed. Step 8: Stir in the shrimp and set aside.", 
"preheat the oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Step 9: Separate 1 sheet of the phyllo dough; lay it on the work surface with the long side toward you. Step 10: (keep the stack of remaining dough covered with plastic wrap to prevent it from drying.). Step 11: Lightly brush the sheet with a little of the melted butter; lay another sheet evenly on top. Step 12: Lightly brush half of the top sheet with more butter; fold the other half over to make a rectangle 8 x 11 inches. Step 13: Lightly brush with a little more melted  butter.", 
"spoon a generous 1/4 cup of the filling along the bottom edge, leaving 1 inch of phyllo clear on all sides. Step 14: Lift the bottom end of the sheet and fold it over the filling. Step 15: Fold the sides over and press lightly; gently roll up. Step 16: Set the roll seam-side down on a lightly greased baking sheet (you will need 2  baking sheets). Step 17: Repeat to use the remaining filling and phyllo. Step 18: Brush the tops  of the rolls with melted butter. Step 19: Bake until golden, 25 to 30 minutes. Step 20: Serve  hot or warm.

prompt: How do I make Ouzo-Marinated Greek Cheese?
completion:
Step 1: Cut cheese lengthwise into four 1/2-inch thick pieces. Step 2: Arrange in single layer in shallow dish. Step 3: Mix ouzo, olive oil, parsley, thyme and pepper in small bowl. Step 4: Pour over cheese. Step 5: Marinate at least 4 hours and up to 8 hours, turning once. Step 6: Preheat broiler. Step 7: Remove cheese from marinade; transfer to 4 small broiler proof gratin dishes. Step 8: Drizzle 2 teaspoons marinade over each piece of cheese. Step 9: Broil until cheese is soft and just begins to melt, about 4 minutes. Step 10: Serve with bread.", 
"notes: this starter is an easy version of the fried cheese dish, saganaki, which is traditionally paired with a glass of ouzo. Step 11: Serve with freshly grilled pita bread.

prompt: How do I make Greek Spinach Triangles?
completion:
Step 1: * to cut calories, you can use butter-flavored cooking spray in place of the  butter. Step 2: Cook spinach according to directions; drain well. Step 3: Mix spinach, eggs, onion, cream cheese, pepper and feta cheese together. Step 4: Refrigerate mixture at least 1 hour. Step 5: Open package of phyllo pastry; cut a strip 2\" wide, cutting through all layers. Step 6: Cover remaining dough with a damp cloth to prevent cracking. Step 7: Separate dough so that you have 2 sheets for each triangle. Step 8: Brush the dough with melted butter.", 
"put 1 rounded teaspoon of spinach mixture at the top of the strip. Step 9: Fold pastry over like folding a flag. Step 10: Place on well-buttered baking sheet; brush top with butter. Step 11: Bake at 375 degrees fahrenheit  for 20 minutes. Step 12: Serve warm. Step 13: To freeze the triangles before cooking, butter both sides of triangle and wrap well. Step 14: Bake when needed.

prompt: How do I make Grand Marnier Cake?
completion: Step 1: Cream sugar and butter. Step 2: Add egg yolks and 1 teaspoon  grand marnier. Step 3: Continue to beat. sift flour, baking soda and  baking powder. Step 4: Add flour to mixture with sour cream, beginning  and ending with dry ingredients. Step 5: Add orange rind, walnuts and  stiff beaten egg whites. Step 6: Butter and flour an angle food cake  pan. Step 7: Bake at 350 degrees for 55 minutes. Step 8: Spoon topping over baked  cake while still in hot pan. Step 9: Cool and invert onto serving  plate.

prompt: How do I make Spanish Potato Omelet (Tortilla a la Espanola)?
completion:
Step 1: Heat the oil in a 8-9 inch skillet. add the slices of potato one at a time to avoid sticking together. Step 2: Alternate layers of potatoes with layers of onions. Step 3: Cook slowly over medium heat, turning the potatoes until tender, not brown. Step 4: Drain potatoes in a colander, save oil. Step 5: Make sure skillet is very clean for later use.  in a bowl, beat eggs with a fork until slightly foamy. prompt: How do I make Salt Cod Chowder?

prompt: How do I make Thai Fried Bananas?

prompt: How do I make Thai Beef Salad?

prompt: How do I make Feijoada (Brazilian Bean Soup)?

prompt: How do I make Crisp Sauteed Cucumbers With Lemon?

prompt: How do I make Homemade Butter?
