Step 7: Check baking squash with a fork to see if  it glides through the flesh.", 
"stuff with vegetable mixture, top with equal  amounts of grated cheese and return to oven for about 5 minutes. Step 8: Notes : baked acorn squash halves stuffed with sautéed broccoli, cheese and  walnuts.

prompt: How do I make Acorn, Butternut Squash and Parsnips Gratin?
completion: Step 1: Combine breadcrumbs, parsley, salt, oregano, thyme and pepper  in a large bowl; stir well. Step 2: Add acorn squash, butternut squash, parsnips, and olive oil, tossing to coat. Step 3: Spoon squash mixture into a 2 quart casserole coated with cooking spray. Step 4: Cover and bake at 325 degrees fahrenheit for 1-1/2  hours. Step 5: Sprinkle with cheese. Step 6: Bake, uncovered, an additional 15 minutes. Step 7: Garnish with oregano, if desired. Step 8: Notes : use any combination of winter squash to equal 6 cups, if desired.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Caesar Wraps?
completion:
Step 1: In a large self-closing plastic bag combine olive oil, lemon pepper, garlic, and italian seasoning. Step 2: Add chicken to bag and seal tightly. Step 3: Turn bag gently to distribute marinade. refrigerate 15  minutes. Step 4: Preheat grill to medium heat. Step 5: Remove the chicken from the marinade and arrange on the grill rack. Step 6: Grill 10 to 14 minutes, turning occasionally. Step 7: Remove chicken and cut into strips. Step 8: In a small bowl combine sour cream, milk, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, pepper and garlic for the dressing.", 
"place romaine lettuce and sliced chicken in a warmed tortilla. Step 9: Top with dressing. Step 10: Fold tortilla. Step 11: Notes : i slice chicken and then place in marinade. i also cook on the stovetop.

prompt: How do I make Spicy Acorn Squash Soup?
completion: Step 1: Place 1/4 cup chicken broth in a large saucepan; bring to a boil. Step 2: Add onion and  crushed red pepper; cook 5 minutes or until tender. Step 3: Add remaining 2-3/4 cups  broth, squash, salt, and water; bring to a boil. Step 4: Cover, reduce heat, and simmer  for 20 minutes. Step 5: Add rice; cover and simmer 20 minutes or until squash and rice  are tender. Step 6: Place peanut butter and half of soup in a blender; cover and process until  smooth. Step 7: Pour puree into a bowl. Step 8: Repeat with remaining soup, and add to bowl,  stirring well.

prompt: How do I make Ken's White Chili?
completion:
Step 1: Soak beans overnight. Step 2: Combine beans, chicken broth, onions and garlic in large pot. Step 3: Cook (boil, then simmer) for 1 to 2 hours until beans are done. (do not stir  too much or the beans will fall apart). Step 4: When beans are done, add chicken, cumin, oregano, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, lemon juice, and chilies. Step 5: Simmer for approximately 1 hour. Step 6: Add grated cheese last. simmer until cheese is melted; stir or cheese will sink to the bottom  and scorch. Step 7: Notes. Step 8: Cooking times are approximate. basically cook until the beans are  done and spices have \"soaked in\" then cook until cheese melts.", 
"sometimes not all of the chicken broth is necessary. Step 9: You don't want it too soupy, so i  usually add about 4 cans of chicken broth and add the last can as needed. Step 10: This will make a large pot. Step 11: Serve with a salad and garlic bread and enjoy!

prompt: How do I make White Chili?
completion: Step 1: Brown chicken breast pieces in a little oil or pam. Step 2: Add beans, salsa, cumin  and a little chicken broth and simmer for 30 minutes. Step 3: Add cheese and simmer  until completely melted. Step 4: Add chicken broth as needed to thicken to desired  consistency.

prompt: How do I make Light Easy Crisp?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350f. Step 2: Peel and core apples, if using. Step 3: Cut peaches or apples into  1/2-inch wedges and place in a bowl. Step 4: Sprinkle with cinnamon and toss until  evenly coated. Step 5: If using peaches, mix in berries. Step 6: (blueberries will turn the  apples gray.) press down firmly in a 9-inch pie plate.  in a medium-sized bowl, stir flour with rolled oats and brown sugar.slowly add  butter, working in with a fork. Step 7: Carefully mound on top of fruit and gently press  into surface. bake in centre of preheated oven for 60-70 minutes or until fruit  is tender when pierced with a skewer.", 
"this crisp is wonderful served warm with  ice cream or yoghurt cheese

prompt: How do I make Giant Baked Hero?
completion:
Step 1: Pat loaves together. Step 2: On a lightly floured board, roll dough into a 12\" x18\"  rectangle. Step 3: Garlic oil: combine 3 tablespoons olive oil with 2 cloves garlic, minced or  pressed and 1/2 teaspoon each dry basil leaves, dry oregano leaves and dry thyme  leaves. brush surface with 2 tablespoons garlic oil. Step 4: Cover half dough lengthwise with overlapping layers of salami, ham, coppa, cheese, onions and  peppers. Step 5: Lift plain half of dough over filling (if dough sticks, loosen with a  spatula). press edges firmly together to seal.", 
"using 2 wide spatulas, transfer  packet to an oiled 12\" x17\" baking sheet; tuck ends of dough under. Step 6: Brush with remaining oil. Step 7: Let rise in a warm place until puffy, about 20 minutes. Step 8: Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit until richly browned, 15 to 20 minutes. Step 9: Cut sandwich lengthwise in half then  crosswise into 3\" slices. Step 10: Grilled onion: in an 8-10\" frying pan over medium high heat, combine 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 tablespoons balsamic or red wine vinegar and 1 large onion, sliced. stir often, until onion begins to brown, 8 to 10 minutes; set aside.

prompt: How do I make Brown Sugar Shortbread?
completion: Step 1: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar. Step 2: Gradually stir in the flour. Step 3: Turn onto  a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth, about 3 minutes. Step 4: Pat into a 1/3\"  thick rectangle measuring 11\" x8\". Step 5: Cut into 2\" x1\" strips. Step 6: Place 1\" apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Step 7: Prick with a fork. Step 8: Bake at 300 degrees fahrenheit for 25 minutes or until bottom begins to brown. Step 9: Cool for 5 minutes. Step 10: Remove to a wire rack to cool completely.

prompt: How do I make Pork Sate With Peanut Dipping Sauce?
completion:
Step 1: Mix 1 tbsp lemon grass, 1 tbsp lime juice, 1 tbsp dark brown sugar, soy sauce, and garlic in large bowl. Step 2: Add pork; toss to coat with marinade. Step 3: Note: pork tenderloins should be trimmed, cut into 3-inch long, 1/2-inch wide, 1/4-inch-thick slices. Step 4: Let stand 30 minutes to 1 hour. Step 5: Meanwhile, mix remaining 1/3 cup lemon grass, remaining 2 tbsp lime juice, remaining 1 tbsp sugar, 1 cup chicken broth, peanut butter, onion, coriander and jalapeno in heavy medium saucepan. Step 6: Bring to boil, whisking frequently.", 
"transfer mixture to blender and puree. Step 7: Strain into heavy small saucepan, pressing on solids with back of spoon; discard solids. Step 8: Simmer until reduced to thick sauce consistency, stirring frequently, about 6 minutes. (can be prepared 1 day ahead. cover and refrigerate. reheat before using, thinning with more chicken broth if necessary.) Step 9: Preheat broiler. Step 10: Thread 3 pork strips on each skewer. Step 11: Broil until cooked through, about 3 minutes per side. Step 12: Pour sauce into bowl; set in center of platter.", 
"sprinkle with green onion. Step 13: Surround with pork skewers and serve. Step 14: Serves 6 as an appetizer.

prompt: How do I make Eight Layer Shortbread Slices?
completion:
Step 1: Sift together flour and cornstarch onto a sheet of waxed paper. set aside. Step 2: Beat butter and confectioners' sugar in a medium bowl until blended. Step 3: Stir in vanilla. Step 4: Gradually beat in flour mixture to make soft dough. Step 5: Divide dough in half. Step 6: Knead cocoa  powder into 1/2 of dough in bowl. Step 7: Flatten both doughs; wrap separately in plastic wrap or waxed paper. Step 8: Chill 1 hour or until easy to handle. Step 9: Roll each  batch of dough between 2 sheets of wax paper into 10\" square. Step 10: Push sides in to  make absolutely even, using ruler or long-bladed knife.", 
"if dough becomes too  soft or sticky, refrigerate on cookie sheet. Step 11: Remove top sheet of wax paper from nonchocolate dough; brush top with egg white. Step 12: Remove paper from top of chocolate dough; invert onto nonchocolate dough, matching sides up exactly. Step 13: Peel off  remaining sheet of wax paper. Step 14: Cut into 4 equal strips, each 10 x 2 1/3\". Step 15: Brush  lightly with egg white. Step 16: Stack dough strips neatly to make 8 alternating layers. Step 17: Wrap stack in plastic wrap. Step 18: Chill several hours or overnight.", 
"dough can be  refrigerated for up to 1 week. Step 19: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Step 20: Cut dough crosswise into slices slightly less than 1/4\"  thick. Step 21: Place slices on cookie sheets 1\" apart. Step 22: Bake 10 minutes. Step 23: Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool completely. Step 24: Store cookies in  tightly covered containers in cool, dry place.

prompt: How do I make Oktoberfest Spinach Strudel?
completion:
Step 1: Simmer onion and parsley in stock until tender; set aside. Step 2: Cook spinach  according to package directions. drain, squeezing out excess liquid. Step 3: Add onion  mixture, bread crumbs, egg white, parmesan, nutmeg and pepper; mix well. Step 4: Place  two phyllo sheets on a damp towel on work surface. Step 5: Work quickly so that phyllo does not dry out. Step 6: Spread half of spinach mixture along (about 1-inch inside) narrow edge of phyllo and roll up jelly-roll-style. Step 7: Brush top and sides with skim milk. Step 8: With sharp knife, cut several slits on top to vent steam.", 
"place on baking sheet prepared with nonstick spray. Step 9: Cover with another damp towel while repeating process with last two phyllo sheets and remaining spinach mixture. Step 10: Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 25 to 30 minutes until golden brown. Step 11: Cut each roll into six pieces.

prompt: How do I make Thai Fish Curry?
completion:
Step 1: Blend onion, cilantro, lemongrass, turmeric, ginger, cumin, garlic, and dried red peppers in a food processor to dry paste, stopping frequently to scrape down sides of work bowl. (paste can be prepared  3 days ahead. cover and chill.) Step 2: Heat vegetable oil in a medium non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3: Add 2  rounded tablespoons spice paste; stir 1 minute. Step 4: Add fish and cook 2  minutes, turning occasionally with tongs. Step 5: Add coconut milk and clam  juice; simmer until fish is cooked through, turning occasionally, about 6 minutes.", 
"transfer fish to plate. Step 6: Boil liquid until reduced to thick sauce, about 8 minutes. Step 7: Season with salt. Step 8: Return fish to sauce and heat through. Step 9: Sprinkle with cilantro. Step 10: Serve over rice. Step 11: The mild spice paste is also great used as a base for chicken and  shrimp curries.

prompt: How do I make Spinach Phyllo Casserole?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 f (190 c). saute onions in chicken broth until broth has  evaporated. Step 2: Stir flour into milk until dissolved. Step 3: Add to onions and stir  constantly over medium heat until thickened. Step 4: Blend in cheese until melted. Step 5: Remove from heat and stir in spinach. Step 6: Beat 6 egg whites until frothy and blend  into cheese mixture. pour into a deep casserole dish brushed with olive oil. Step 7: Whisk together remaining egg white and the olive oil. Step 8: Blend well. Step 9: Cut sheets of  phyllo pastry in half.", 
"top the casserole with one piece of phyllo pastry. Step 10: Brush  with egg white mixture. continue layering phyllo sheets, brushing each with the  mixture. bake for 35 to 45 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Mango Salsa?
completion: Step 1: Mix together all ingredients in a bowl, makes about 2 cups Step 2: From: salsa by reed hearon

prompt: How do I make Grilled Pineapple Salsa?
completion: Step 1: In a bowl, toss pineapple, anaheim and jalapeno chilies, and onion slices together in the olive oil. Step 2: Grill until soft and browned, about 10 minutes. Step 3: Pull tops off chiles. Step 4: Puree all ingredients in a food processor or  blender.

prompt: How do I make Country Fried Yellow Squash?
completion: Step 1: Wash tender yellow squash; remove stem and blossom ends. Step 2: Cut into 1/2-inch rounds. Step 3: Place squash, butter, onions and salt into heavy skillet. Step 4: Add water. Step 5: Cover and cook on medium low heat until water is absorbed and squash is tender. Step 6: Lightly mash with a fork. Step 7: Add sugar and cream. Step 8: Let it cook slowly until mixture is fairly dry and flavors develop, being careful not to let it scorch.

prompt: How do I make Tangy Marinated Yellow Squash (No Cooking)?
completion: Step 1: Toss yellow squash, green onion, green pepper, and celery together. Step 2: Mix the marinade ingredients together. Step 3: Pour marinade over squash mixture. Step 4: Refrigerate for at least 12 hours.

prompt: How do I make Secret Salsa?
completion:
Step 1: Get out the blender. Step 2: Assemble the ingredients: at this point you should  barely have enough room to put  the lid on the blender. Step 3: Now the trick is to turn the blender on and off  quickly on \"chop\" speed if you have one with variable speeds. Step 4: That is  real slow. Step 5: Best if you got one with a pulse button. Step 6: This is one ya really  don't want all over the kitchen. Step 7: You can do this with a blender that has  only on/off by not leaving it on till you got spicy tomato soup. Step 8: However,  a good stiff shove to the bottom with a wooden spoon of the tomatoes  that are floatin to the top tryin to get away from the jalapenos will help  things along quite nicely.", 
"all you wanna do is get them broken into large  pieces and mixed thoroughly. Step 9: No more than fifteen seconds on total. Step 10: This should be about a quart and a half. Step 11: I would recommend you put this  gem in glass jars and lid/ring them and refrigerate for a while but it is  ready right now just gets better after sittin a spell. Step 12: It'll keep a week or so  in the icebox, most likely won't last that long anyhow. Step 13: Only problem,  which i have a solution to, is that after a period of time there is so much  acid in this it starts attacking the metal lid/ring.", 
"solution: i have recently  come across some rather sturdy white plastic screw on lids by \"ball\"  (r) that work very well.

prompt: How do I make Mashed Sweet Potato Pie?
completion: Step 1: Bake sweet potatoes until tender; peel and mash. make sure all lumps are  removed, straining if necessary. Step 2: Mix mashed sweet potatoes, eggs, sugar, salt, ginger, nutmeg, vanilla, cream or evaporated milk and melted butter together. Step 3: Pour into unbaked pie shell. Step 4: Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 50 minutes or until knife inserted one inch from edges of pie comes out clean.

prompt: How do I make Potatoes Tapas in Garlic Mayonnaise (Potatoes Aioli)?
completion: Step 1: Boil potatoes in salt water until tender; peel and cut into 3/4 inch  chunks. Step 2: In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, garlic, and parsley.  (mayonnaise should be a little thin, dilute with lemon juice or soft vinegar if necessary.). Step 3: Fold the potatoes into the sauce gently, season with salt to taste, serve  at room temperature.

prompt: How do I make Roasted Tomato and Mint Salsa?
completion: Step 1: With a comal or black iron skillet over medium-high heat, cook the tomatoes until blackened all over. Step 2: While still warm, pulse tomatoes with the garlic in a food processor until roughly chopped. Step 3: Cool to room temperature. Step 4: Add lime juice, olive oil, peppers, cilantro, spearmint, lime zest, orange zest, and salt. Step 5: Mix together and let stand at least 30 minutes before using. Step 6: Mark miller writes: \"ripe red tomatoes roasted on a hot steel comal until the skins blacken are a basic element of many mexican salsas. the smoky flavor adds a complexity to the taste of ripe tomatoes.\".

prompt: How do I make Raspberry Tapioca With Vanilla Sauce?
completion:
Step 1: In a medium-size saucepan combine raspberries, sugar, lemon peel and  water. Step 2: Bring to a boil while stirring. Step 3: Simmer for about 10 minutes. Step 4: Stir  in tapioca, bring back to boiling, reduce heat, cook stirring constantly  until mixture becomes thick and translucent. pour into a glass mold or  individual dessert dishes. Step 5: Refrigerate until chilled (about 2 hours).  serve with vanilla sauce or whipped cream. Step 6: Vanilla sauce: mix the cornstarch with the water, add sugar, vanilla flavor and salt.", 
"in medium sized saucepan boil the milk, take saucepan off the heat. Step 7: Add  cornstarch mixture, stirring constantly. Step 8: Return to heat, stir in the egg yolk/water, and cook on low heat, stirring constantly, until sauce thickens. Step 9: Serve cold.

prompt: How do I make Spaetzle - Basic Recipe - Art Culinaire Issue?
completion: Step 1: Bring a saucepan of salted water it a boil, reduce the heat, and  maintain a simmer. Step 2: In a bowl, stir all the ingredients together. Step 3: Place a  colander over the pan, pour about 1/4 of the batter into the colander,  and press through the holes with a plastic spatula into the  hot water. Step 4: When the spaetzle starts to float to the surface, cover the  pan and keep covered until the spaetzle appears to swell and is fluffy. Step 5: Remove the dumplings and repeat the procedure with the remaining batter.

prompt: How do I make Home-Style Meatballs (Albondigas Caseras)?
completion: Step 1: In a bowl, combine the beef, veal, and pork with bread crumbs, 4 cloves of  garlic, the eggs, nutmeg, salt, and pepper. Step 2: Form into cocktail-size  meatballs. dust with flour. Step 3: Saute the meatballs in a casserole with olive oil until well browned on all sides. Step 4: Add onion, remaining clove of  garlic, and green pepper. Step 5: Cook until onion is wilted. Step 6: Add the tomato, wine, broth, salt and pepper. Step 7: Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Banana Orange Ice Cream?
completion: Step 1: Peel and mash bananas. Step 2: Combine with lemon juice, salt, sugar and fresh orange juice. Step 3: Fold confectioners' sugar into lightly whipped heavy cream. Step 4: Add to banana  mixture. Step 5: Churn-freeze.

prompt: How do I make Kahlua?
completion: Step 1: Bring water and sugar to a rolling boil. Step 2: Remove from heat. Step 3: Add instant coffee. stir well to dissolve completely. Step 4: Let cool until lukewarm. Step 5: Add vodka and vanilla. Step 6: Stir well; bottle in brown bottles. Step 7: Let stand for 2 weeks.

prompt: How do I make Apple Crisp?
completion: Step 1: Fill a 6\" x 10\" (i use a 9\" x 13\") baking pan with sliced apples. Step 2: Mix the flour, salt, sugar, egg, baking powder together with two knives or pastry blender until crumbly; spread over the apples. Step 3: Pour 1/2 cup melted butter (real butter please) over top and sprinkle with cinnamon. Step 4: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 30 minutes or until apples are done and topping is crisp.

prompt: How do I make Apple Crisp II?
completion:
Step 1: With pastry cutter or steel blade in food processor add flour, brown sugar, oatmeal, baking powder, salt and butter. Step 2: Process until mixture no longer looks \"floury\". Step 3: Add walnuts and process just a second. set aside. Step 4: Half and core apples, peeling is up to you. Step 5: Slice apples. Step 6: Arrange apple slices in a buttered 9x13 baking dish. Step 7: Combine sugar (adjust to tartness) and cinnamon. Step 8: Spread over apples. Step 9: Sprinkle with lemon juice. Step 10: Distribute topping over apples. Step 11: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes.", 
"serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream.

prompt: How do I make Fruit-Filled Acorn Squash?
completion: Step 1: Cut squash in half lengthwise; discard seeds and membrane. Step 2: Place squash, cut side down, in a vegetable steamer; arrange apricots around squash. Step 3: Place steamer over boiling water in a dutch oven. Step 4: Cover and steam 15 minutes or  until squash is crisp-tender. Step 5: Coarsely chop apricots. Step 6: Combine chopped apricots, raisins, apricot preserves, water, and salt. Step 7: Spoon evenly into each squash half. Step 8: Cover and steam 5 minutes or until squash is  tender. Step 9: Sprinkle with toasted almonds.

prompt: How do I make Killer Kahlua?
completion: Step 1: Bring to boil water and sugar. Step 2: Remove from heat and add instant Step 3: Coffee. bring to boil again. Step 4: Remove from heat and add vanilla extract   (very important you use pure extract not imitation). cool before   adding rum. Step 5: Put in bottles and cork. Step 6: Makes about 3 fifths. Step 7: Note:   since this is made with 151 rum, it has a lot more alcohol (75.5%).

prompt: How do I make Baked Zucchini Frittatas?
completion: Step 1: Heat oven to 400°f. Step 2: Grease two 10-oz.  custard cups or individual baking dishes. Step 3: In 8-inch skillet over medium low heat, sauté zucchini, onion, red pepper and garlic in margarine until tender; let cool slightly. Step 4: In medium bowl, beat eggs, half-and-half and seasonings until combined. Step 5: Stir in zucchini mixture. pour into prepared custard cups or baking dishes. Step 6: Sprinkle with cheeses. Step 7: Bake, uncovered, at 400°f for 14 to 17 minutes or until top is puffy and light golden brown. Step 8: Let stand 5 minutes before serving.

prompt: How do I make Fat-Free Fettuccine Alfredo?
completion: Step 1: Mix 1 teaspoon cornstarch and 1 teaspoon skim milk in a saucepan. Step 2: Add the rest  of the skim milk and bring to a boil. Step 3: Lower heat to medium and slowly add the  cream cheese, stirring constantly. Step 4: Simmer mixture until thick. Step 5: Add salt and pepper. Step 6: Saute mushrooms and scallions in a nonstick skillet sprayed with cooking spray. Step 7: Cook fettucini according to package directions. Step 8: Toss cooked noodles with sauce.   - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -.

prompt: How do I make Lemon Chicken?
completion:
Step 1: Place chicken in bowl or casserole. cover with lemon juice and marinate in  refrigerator for several hours or overnight, turning chicken periodically. Step 2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 3: Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika in plastic bag. Step 4: Remove chicken from marinade and coat each with flour by shaking it in bag. Step 5: Place chicken in baking pan in a single layer. Step 6: Either peel the zest from a lemon and chop it fine in your food processor, or  grate the zest with a hand grater. Step 7: Mix grated peel with brown sugar.", 
"sprinkle the lemon zest mixture evenly over the chicken breasts. Step 8: Combine lemon  juice and water and sprinkle evenly over chicken. Step 9: Put 1 lemon slice on each chicken breast and bake for 35-40 min.  or until cooked through. Step 10: To make sure chicken is cooked, cut one of them in the middle and make sure that it is not red or pink, then, if it is, cook it a little bit more.

prompt: How do I make Hawaiian Ham Salad?
completion: Step 1: Combine ham, pineapple, celery, and olives. Step 2: Mix Step 3: Mayonnaise and lemon juice; stir into ham mix. Step 4: Chill  at least an hour. Step 5: Stir in peanuts before serving. Step 6: -----

prompt: How do I make Zucchini Frittatas II?
completion:
Step 1: Heat 1/2 tbsp. oil in a 10-inch, heavy-bottomed, oven-proof skillet. add onion  and saute until tender and translucent. stir in garlic and zucchini and continue sauteing until squash is just tender. Step 2: Season with salt and pepper and remove  from heat. in a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, basil and parsley. Step 3: Stir in  sauteed vegetables. Step 4: Add remaining 1/2 tablespoon oil to same skillet over medium heat, tilting pan to coat bottom and sides. Step 5: Add egg-vegetable mixture, spreading evenly.", 
"reduce heat to low and cover pan. Step 6: Cook 10 to 15 minutes, until set.  preheat broiler. Step 7: Sprinkle grated cheese on top of frittata if desired and broil  briefly until lightly browned. Step 8: Cut into 3 wedges. Step 9: Serve immediately from the pan or transfer to a large round plate or platter.

prompt: How do I make Mom's First Place Turkey Fruit Salad?
completion: Step 1: Combine mayonnaise, honey, and ginger; mix well. Step 2: Add mandarin oranges, turkey, apple, grapes, and pineapple chunks. Step 3: Season with salt and pepper (if desired). Step 4: Chill. Step 5: Stir in toasted pecans just before serving.

prompt: How do I make Jarrett House Vinegar Pie?
completion: Step 1: Beat sugar, melted butter, eggs, flour, and vinegar together on high for 1 minute until smooth. stir in vanilla. pour mixture into pie shell. Step 2: Bake at 300 degrees fahrenheit for 50 minutes or until top forms a pale golden crust (inside will be slightly liquid). Step 3: Cool and serve at room temperature.

prompt: How do I make Vinegar Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Combine sugar, flour, and lemon zest in a saucepan; stir together until thoroughly blended. Step 3: Add cider vinegar while stirring or whisking  constantly; add the water. Step 4: Place over medium heat; bring the mixture to a boil and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Step 5: Remove from heat and stir a little of the hot mixture into the eggs; stir the warmed egg mixture into the remaining hot mixture. Step 6: Stir in the butter. Step 7: Pour the mixture into the prepared pie shell.", 
"bake for 10 minutes at 425 degrees fahrenheit. Step 8: Reduce heat to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 9: Continue baking for 30 minutes more. Step 10: Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely before serving. Step 11: (the  filling will seem quite liquid, but will firm as the pie cools.) Step 12: This pie has pretty much the same ingredients as the one above, but the  method is different and therefore you end up with a slightly different pie.

prompt: How do I make Ham and Cheese Pockets?
completion: Step 1: Cut pita breads in half. Step 2: Open. Step 3: Spread with sauce. fill with boiled ham slices,  swiss cheese and pickle slices. Step 4: Bake at 350 degrees for about 10 min. Step 5: Sauce: combine mayonnaise, mustard and milk. Step 6: Stir slowly over low heat until  warm. Step 7: Spoon into sandwiches.

prompt: How do I make Super Sandwich?
completion: Step 1: In a bowl combine cucumber, tomato, onion, olives and salad dressing; set aside. Step 2: Cut 1\" off top of bread; set aside. Step 3: Carefully hollow out top and bottom of  bread, leaving a 1/2\" shell. (discard bread or save for something else). Step 4: Layer 1/4 of the ham, salami, pork and cheeses inside the shell. Step 5: Top with 1/3 of the vegetable mixture. Step 6: Repeat layers, ending with meat and cheeses, gently  pressing down to flatten as needed. Step 7: Replace bread top; wrap tightly in plastic  wrap. Step 8: Refrigerate until serving.

prompt: How do I make Tiramisu?
completion:
Step 1: Prepare cream mixture: Step 2: In an electric mixer, prepare cream mixture by whipping sugar and egg yolks on high speed until pale yellow and thick. Step 3: With mixer on medium speed, add cream cheese and whip until smooth. Step 4: Add mascarpone and  marsala. Step 5: Mix until incorporated. Step 6: Fold in whipped cream. Step 7: Refrigerate. Step 8: Prepare espresso mixture: Step 9: To prepare espresso mixture, combine espresso, additional marsala, sugar, and warm water. Step 10: To assemble, dip ladyfingers in espresso mixture. Step 11: Place one layer of dipped ladyfingers on bottom of serving platter.", 
"top with one layer of cream mixture. Step 12: Add another layer of dipped ladyfingers, topped with a second layer of cream mixture. Step 13: Sift cocoa over top.

prompt: How do I make Hazelnut Shortbread Cookies?
completion: Step 1: Combine flour and hazelnuts. Step 2: In a large bowl, cream the butter and brown sugar. Step 3: Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Step 4: Cover and chill for 8 hours or  overnight. Step 5: Preheat oven to 300 degrees fahrenheit. Step 6: Lightly grease cookie sheets. Step 7: On a  floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of 1/4\". Step 8: Using cookie  cutters, cut out the shapes and place on prepared cookie sheets 1-1/2\" apart. Step 9: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes until lightly colored. Step 10: Transfer to wire racks to cool.

prompt: How do I make Pecan Shortbread?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Combine flour and pecans. Step 3: In a large bowl, cream  the butter and brown sugar. Step 4: Beat in the vanilla extract. Step 5: Gradually stir in the dry ingredients. the dough will be stiff. Step 6: Pinch off walnut size pieces of dough and roll into small balls. Step 7: Place the balls 1-1/2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Step 8: Flatten the cookies with the back of a spoon dipped in flour. Step 9: Back for 10 to 12 minutes until lightly colored. Step 10: Transfer onto wire racks to  cool.

prompt: How do I make Tiramisu - Balducci's in New York City?
completion:
Step 1: Arrange the ladyfingers on a plate and lightly soak them with the cooled espresso. Step 2: Put half of the soaked ladyfingers in one layer in a rectangular  serving dish. Step 3: While the ladyfingers are soaking, beat the egg yolks with the  sugar until the yolks turn pale in color. Step 4: Add the mascarpone, the liquors, and  the extract, and stir gently. Step 5: In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites with a  wire whisk until they are stiff. Step 6: Gently fold the whites into the mascarpone  mixture. use half of this mixture to make a layer on top of the ladyfingers in  the serving dish.", 
"sprinkle with half of the chopped chocolate. repeat the  procedure with another layer of soaked ladyfingers, the mascarpone mixture, and  chocolate. cover with tin foil and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before  serving.

prompt: How do I make Sweet Potato Pecan Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: With mixer, beat hot yams and butter until smooth. Step 3: Add condensed milk, cinnamon, orange rind, vanilla extract, nutmeg, salt, and egg; mix well. Step 4: Pour mixture into crust. Step 5: Bake 20 minutes. Step 6: Meanwhile, make pecan topping: beat together egg, corn syrup, brown sugar, melted butter and maple flavoring. stir in chopped pecans. Step 7: Remove pie from oven; reduce oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 8: Spoon pecan topping on pie. Step 9: Bake 25 minutes longer or until set.", 
"cool. Step 10: Serve warm or at room temperature. Step 11: Garnish with orange zest twist, if  desired. Step 12: Refrigerate any leftovers.

prompt: How do I make Yellow Squash Frittata?

Step 3: Beat eggs with the grated cheese, italian seasoning,  salt and pepper. Step 4: Pour egg mixture over squash. Step 5: Cook until eggs are cooked and puffy.

prompt: How do I make Yellow Squash Puffs?

Step 4: Drop squash  mixture by level tablespoonful into hot oil. Step 5: Cook until golden  brown, turning once. drain well on paper towels.

prompt: How do I make Sun-Dried Tomato Pesto?

prompt: How do I make Sweet Potato-Pecan Pie?

Step 3: Add mashed cooked sweet potatoes, sugar, butter, vanilla extract, salt, cinnamon, allspice, and nutmeg; beat at medium speed until the mixture is smooth, about 2 minutes. Step 4: Make  pecan topping: in medium bowl, with mixer, beat eggs until frothy. Step 5: Add sugar, corn syrup, melted butter, vanilla and cinnamon. Step 6: Beat at low speed just until mixture is well blended, about 1 minute.", 
"stir in pecans. Step 7: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 8: To assemble:  turn sweet potato filling into unbaked pie shell, spreading evenly. Step 9: Pour pecan  topping over top. Step 10: Bake 60 to 70 minutes until set, and knife inserted in center comes  out clean. Step 11: Remove pie to rack to cool. Step 12: Just before serving decorate with whipped cream.

prompt: How do I make Corn Salsa?
completion: Step 1: Combine all ingredients in a  large bowl. Step 2: Cover and chill for several hours.

prompt: How do I make Sweet Potato Custard Pie?

prompt: How do I make Zesty Sweet Potato Pie?

Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Line a pie pan with rolled out dough; prick all over with fork; press a piece of heavy-duty foil directly into the pie shell. Step 3: Bake for 6 minutes; remove foil; bake for 4 more minutes until just beginning to brown. Step 4: Combine the sweet potatoes and sugar in a large bowl; beat in molasses and eggs. Step 5: Add the spices and orange zest and stir well. Step 6: Stir in melted butter and milk. Step 7: Pour filling into pie shell. Step 8: Bake for 15 minutes. Step 9: Reduce heat to 300 degrees fahrenheit.", 
"continue baking for 30 to 40 minutes or until filling is firm around edges, but center remains slightly soft and quivers when you move the pie.

prompt: How do I make Avocado Salsa?
completion: Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the corn (or cucumber), olives, red pepper, and onion. Step 2: In a small bowl, combine garlic, oil, lemon juice, vinegar, oregano, salt and pepper; mix well. Step 3: Pour over corn (or cucumber) mixture; toss to coat. Step 4: Cover and refrigerate overnight. Step 5: Just before serving, chop avocados and stir into salsa. Step 6: Serve with tortilla chips.  note:  make sure that you get good, ripe avocados!  also, you can add some minced jalapeno if you'd like a bit of spiciness.

prompt: How do I make Cocoa Espresso Cooler?
completion: Step 1: Combine cold coffee, cocoa and vanilla. Step 2: Pour over ice in tall glasses. Step 3: Top  each with 2 tablespoons of whipped cream.

prompt: How do I make Iced Mochaccino Smoothie?

prompt: How do I make Iced Jazzberry Java?

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Coffee Ice Cream Soda?

prompt: How do I make Very Chocolate Brownies?

Step 5: Stir in walnuts. Step 6: Line a 13x9x2\" baking pan with foil and grease foil. Step 7: Pour batter into pan. Step 8: Bake  at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 25 to 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted near center comes out with moist crumbs. Step 9: Cool completely. Step 10: For topping: Step 11: Melt chocolate chips, water and butter; stir until smooth. Step 12: Cool to room  temperature.", 
"fold in whipped cream. Step 13: Spread over brownies. Step 14: Chill before cutting. Step 15: Store leftovers in refrigerator.

prompt: How do I make Balsamic Berry Salsa?
completion: Step 1: Thoroughly combine strawberries, balsamic vinegar, wine, sugar, and black pepper in a mixing bowl. Step 2: Serving suggestions: as a summer appetizer, a dessert salsa (with  whipped cream or mascarpone), or with pork.

prompt: How do I make Moist Carrot and Raisin Walnut Loaf?
completion: Step 1: Grease a loaf tin and line the base. Step 2: Cream butter, sugar and vanilla. Step 3: Beat in golden syrup. Step 4: Add eggs one at a time; beat until well combined. Step 5: Stir in carrot, raisins and walnuts. Step 6: (don't worry if the mixture looks curdled; it will come out right when the flour is added.) Step 7: Stir in sifted dry ingredients; stir until combined. Step 8: Pour mixture into prepared pan. Step 9: Bake in moderate oven about 1-1/4 hours. Step 10: Let stand about 5 minutes before turning out onto a wire rack.

prompt: How do I make Sliced Sweet Potato Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Boil sweet potatoes until half cooked, 15 to 20 minutes. Step 2: Peel and slice sweet potatoes thinly. Step 3: Mix brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger and salt. Step 4: Place a layer of sweet potatoes in pastry-lined  9-inch pie pan. Step 5: Sprinkle with some of the spice mixture; dot with a little bit of butter. Step 9: Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 30 for 40 minutes.", 
"if potatoes are still not tender, reduce temperature to 350 degrees fahrenheit and continue baking until they are done.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate and Vanilla Chip Biscotti?
completion:
Step 1: Heat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Spray cookie sheets with nonstick cooking spray. Step 3: In  medium bowl, combine flour, cocoa and baking powder; mix well. Step 4: In large bowl, combine sugar, brown sugar and butter; beat until blended. Step 5: Add eggs; beat well. Step 6: Add flour mixture; mix well. Step 7: Stir in vanilla chips. Step 8: With sprayed hands, shape dough into three 7\" rolls. Step 9: Place rolls 3\" apart on sprayed cookie sheet; flatten  each to 7\" x 3\" rectangle. "remove from cookie sheet; place on wire racks. Step 11: Cool 5 minutes. Step 12: With serrated knife, cut rectangles into 1/2\" slices. Step 13: Arrange slices, cut side up, on  ungreased cookie sheet. Step 14: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 6 to 8 minutes or until top surface is  slightly dry. Step 17: Store in tightly covered container. Step 18: Notes : ingredient substitution: use semi-sweet or milk chocolate chips in  place of the vanilla chips.

prompt: How do I make Carrot and Orange Loaf?

Step 4: Stir in sultanas and grated carrot. Step 5: Add sifted dry ingredients and orange juice. Step 6: Spread into the prepared pan. Step 7: Bake in moderately slow oven 1-1/2 hours. Step 8: Stand 5 minutes before turning cake on to a wire rack to cool. Step 9: Ice when cold. Step 10: Icing: Step 11: Beat butter until creamy, gradually beat in sifted icing sugar. "excellent.

prompt: How do I make Linda'a Guadalajara - Style Burritos?

prompt: How do I make Double Chocolate Chunk Biscotti?

Step 2: Add sugar, cocoa powder and baking powder & beat until combined. Step 3: Beat in eggs. Step 4: Beat in as much of the flour as you can. Step 5: Using a spoon, stir in any remaining flour, white baking bar and semisweet chocolate. divide dough in half. Step 6: Shape each half into a 9\" long log. Step 7: Place log about 4\" apart on prepared cookie sheet. flatten logs slightly until about 2\" thick.", 
"bake logs in a 375 degree oven for 20-25 min. or until a wooden toothpick inserted neat the centers comes out clean. Step 8: Cool on the cookie sheet set on a wire rack for 1 hour. Step 9: Using a serrated knife, cut each log diagonally into 1/2\" thick slices. Step 10: Lay slices, cut side down, on ungreased cookie sheets. Step 11: Bake slices in a 325 degree oven for 8 min. Step 15: Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 1 week or freeze for up to 3 months.

prompt: How do I make Dreamy Blueberry Pie?

Step 3: Bring water to boiling in a small saucepan. Step 4: Remove from heat. sprinkle gelatin over top. Step 5: Let stand 5 minutes to soften. Step 6: Stir to dissolve. Step 7: Reserve 16 berries. "set aside 1/3 cup whipped cream; fold remaining into blueberry mixture. Step 12: Stir in gelatin mixture. Step 13: Spread in pretzel crust. Step 14: Dollop or pipe reserved whipped cream on top. Step 15: Garnish with reserved blueberries. Step 16: Chill 1 hour. Step 17: Serve.

prompt: How do I make Spaetzle - Hungarian?
completion: Step 1: Mix flour, eggs, and a little salt with water into a paste. do not beat! Step 2: Drop bit by bit into boiling salted water (the more the better). Step 3: Two approaches work here, either: (a) lower scant teaspoon of the paste into the boiling water (the spaetzle will separate from the spoon and start to cook) one by one,  (b)use a coarse grater to force drops of the paste into the water. Step 4: Cook for 1-2 minutes then strain (and rinse, optional).

prompt: How do I make Spaetzle - German?
completion: Step 1: Beat eggs well; add remaining ingredients and beat until the dough  blisters. Step 2: Drop from the tip of a wet teaspoon into boiling salted water. Step 3: Cook until tender (about 15 minutes). drain. Step 4: Toss with melted butter.

prompt: How do I make Banana Marshmallow Ice Cream (Still-Freeze)?

prompt: How do I make Calzones?

prompt: How do I make Moussaka?

prompt: How do I make Sweetened Iced Coffee?

prompt: How do I make Fudgie-Wudgies?

prompt: How do I make Deluxe Brownies?

prompt: How do I make Coffee Liqueur (Fake Kahlua)?

prompt: How do I make Sour Cream Carrot Cake?

prompt: How do I make Instant Coffee Kahlua?

Step 4: Add the vodka, brandy, and vanilla extract. Step 5: Filter and pour into dark bottles. Step 6: I use a metal mesh to filter out the coffee grounds. prompt: How do I make Linda's Tuna Burritos?

prompt: How do I make Cheesy Manicotti?

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Bread Pudding with Raisin Nut Bread?

prompt: How do I make Chili Non Carne?

prompt: How do I make Golden Apple Bars?

prompt: How do I make Glazed Pineapple With Macadamia Nut Crunch?

Step 9: Repeat with another 1 tablespoon butter and remaining apples.", 
"add to plate. Step 10: Meanwhile, put eggs,  milk, vanilla and remaining cinnamon-sugar in the bowl. Step 11: Add remaining 1  tablespoon melted butter; whisk until ingredients are well blended. Step 12: Spread bread cubes in pie plate. Step 13: Arrange apple slices in concentric circles on top. Step 14: Pour egg mixture evenly over apples; sprinkle with  reserved 1 teaspoon cinnamon-sugar. Step 15: Set pie plate in roasting pan. Step 16: Place pan on middle rack of oven; add very hot water to roasting pan to come half way up sides of pie plate.", 
"bake for 40 to 45 minutes until a knife inserted near  center comes out clean. Step 17: Remove pie plate from water. Step 18: Serve warm, at room  temperature, or cold.

prompt: How do I make Tomato Salad?
completion: Step 1: Mix tomatoes, corn, green onion, basil, parsley, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper and honey mustard together. Step 2: Marinate 20 minutes at room temperature.

prompt: How do I make Vidalia Onion, Tomato and Basil Salad?
completion: Step 1: "mix all ingredients together and let marinate 20 minutes at room temperature."

prompt: How do I make Blue Mountain Blueberry Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Have an 8-inch double crust pie shell ready. Step 2: Sort, rinse and drain blueberries. Step 3: Sprinkle lemon juice over berries. Step 4: Combine sugar, flour, lemon peel, cinnamon,  nutmeg and salt. toss this mixture gently with the blueberries to coat well. Step 5: Put  berry mixture into pie shell; dot with margarine. place second crust on top of  pie, seal edges and cut 3 slashes in top to allow steam to escape. bake in  preheated 450°f oven for 10 minutes. Step 6: Lower heat to 350°f and continue  baking 30-35 minutes more. cool pie before slicing.", 
"notes : this is an old fashioned pie recipe that is juicy, fragrant and  delicious.  it is important to use the freshest blueberries you can find.

prompt: How do I make Cherry-Pistachio Biscotti?
completion:
Step 1: Oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: Lightly grease a large cookie sheet. in a food processor,  process flour, sugar, lime peel and baking powder until blended. Step 3: Add butter and  cherries. Step 4: Pulse until cherries are coarsely chopped. Step 5: Spoon off and reserve 1  tablespoon of beaten eggs. Step 6: Add remaining eggs and pistachios and pulse until  dough is evenly moistened. Step 7: Turn dough out onto on a well-floured surface.(dough  will be sticky). divide dough in 1/4s. Step 8: With hands, roll each portion into a 9\"  log.", 
"place logs crosswise 3\" apart on prepared baking sheet. press logs to  flatten to 2\" wide. brush with reserved egg. Step 9: Bake 25 min.  or until golden brown. Step 10: Let cool on sheet on a wire rack 10 min. Step 11: Loosen with a spatula and remove to a  cutting board. Step 12: Let cool 10 min.  longer. Step 13: Using a large heavy knife, cut each log  diagonally in 1/2\" thick slices. Step 14: Arrange slices upright on clean cookie sheet  (no need to grease sheet). bake 14-16 min. Step 15: Longer until crisp. Step 16: Remove to wire  rack to cool (cookies will get even more crisp).   - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

prompt: How do I make Orange Hazelnut Biscotti?
completion:
Step 1: Oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: Lightly grease baking sheets. Step 3: Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a bowl. Step 4: Beat oil, orange peel, orange juice, eggs and  sugar in large bowl until smooth. Step 5: On low speed, beat flour mixture into orange  mixture. add hazelnuts. Step 6: Divide dough in half; shape each half into 10x1 1/2\" log on floured work surface. place logs on prepared sheets. Step 7: Bake for about 30 min. Step 8: Cool on baking sheets on racks for 10 min. Step 9: Slice diagonally into 1/2\" thick  slices.", 
"lay slices back on baking sheets. Step 10: Bake 10 min. Step 11: Remove baking sheets from oven; turn biscotti over. Step 12: Bake another 10 min. Step 13: Remove biscotti from baking  sheets to wire racks to cool. Step 14: Chocolate glaze: combine chocolate and vegetable  shortening in small saucepan. Step 15: Melt over low heat, stirring frequently, until  smooth. Step 16: Cool slightly. Step 17: Dip cooled biscotti into chocolate mixture. cool on wire  rack.

prompt: How do I make Alaskan Blueberry Pie?
completion: Step 1: Cook the first seven ingredients until very thick. Step 2: Fold in the 2 cups fresh or frozen blueberries and pour into a baked pie shell. Step 3: Let pie cool and top with whipped cream.

prompt: How do I make Calzones II?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400f and spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Step 2: In bowl combine first four ingredients; set aside. Step 3: Roll  each biscuit between 2 sheets of floured wax paper, forming  four 6-inch circles. Step 4: Spoon 1/4 of cheese mixture onto center of  each. Step 5: Moisten edges of dough slightly, then fold each circle in half over the cheese filling (the edges can be attractively crimped with the times of a fork). Step 6: Bake ten minutes or until golden brown.

prompt: How do I make Tamarillo Steak Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Toss cubes of steak in a mixture of flour and salt and pepper. Step 2: Place in a casserole and cover with the bacon. Step 3: Cover with a layer of tamarillos, a layer of onions, then a layer of potatoes. Step 4: Cover tightly and bake at 180 degrees celsius (350 degrees fahrenheit) for 2 hours. Step 5: About 30 minutes before the end of cooking remove the lid and dot the potatoes with butter.

prompt: How do I make Fha Chicken Chilies Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Bake chicken, wrapped in foil, at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour. Step 2: Cut into bite sized  pieces. Step 3: Blend cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup and milk in a bowl. Step 4: Layer 1/3 of the soup mixture, half the tortillas, chicken, onion, green chilies and cheese in a 9 x l3-inch baking dish. Step 5: Repeat with half the remaining soup mixture, remaining tortillas, chicken,  onion, green chilies, remaining soup mixture and cheese. Step 6: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for  1 hour.

prompt: How do I make Apricot Chicken Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Place chicken drumsticks in a casserole dish. Step 2: Mix onion soup mix, cornflour and ginger into the apricot puree. Step 3: Season with salt and pepper. Step 4: Pour over the chicken. Step 5: Cover and bake at 180 degrees celsius (350 degrees fahrenheit) for 50 to- 55 minutes or until chicken is cooked. Step 6: To serve, sprinkle with chopped chives.

prompt: How do I make Luscious Applesauce Bars?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Grease and flour a 13x9-inch pan. Step 3: In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and butter until light and fluffy. Step 4: Add applesauce and egg; blend well. Step 5: Stir in flour, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, cloves and  nutmeg until well mixed. Step 6: Stir in cereal. Step 7: Spread mixture into prepared pan. Step 8: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out  clean. Step 9: Prepare glaze: Step 10: Melt butter over low heat and stir in brown sugar. Step 11: Cook about 1  minute or until mixture bubbles, stirring constantly.", 
"remove from heat and stir in powdered sugar. Step 12: While glaze is still hot, drizzle it over warm bars. Step 13: Cool completely; cut into squares.

prompt: How do I make Remarkable Rhubarb Bites?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Mix together rhubarb and 1/2 cup sugar. Step 3: Set aside.  cream shortening, remaining 1/2 cup sugar and brown sugar. Step 4: Add egg and then  stir in baking soda, salt, cinnamon and flour. Step 5: Stir in vanilla, then rhubarb  mixture. place batter in a greased and floured 13x9\" baking pan and bake for  40-45 minutes. Step 6: Let cool, sprinkle with confectioners' sugar and cut into 2\" squares. Step 7: Nancy {:-).

prompt: How do I make English Sherry Trifle?
completion:
Step 1: Spoon approximately 1/3 of whipping cream into bottom of glass serving bowl. Step 2: Next, a layer of 1 cup fruit cocktail, a layer of banana, a layer of 1 cup  puried strawberries, and finally half of the sponge cubes. Step 3: Pour 1 cup of sherry over cake cubes. Step 4: Put 1/3 whipping cream on top, and repeat with alternate layers  of fruit cocktail, banana, strawberry, and cubes with sherry. Step 5: Top with remaining whipped cream, and whole berries for garnish. Step 6: Sponge cake:  beat egg yolks and lemon juice until pale, add 3/4 cup sugar and beat well.", 
"in a separate bowl, beat egg whites, add salt, and 1/4 cup sugar beating until stiff. Step 7: Stir 1/4 of the whites into yolk mixture.  spoon the rest carefully into yolk. Step 8: Sift flour on top, fold in melted butter until blended. Step 9: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Step 10: Pour batter into tube pan, bake 45 minutes (or until toothpick comes out clean).  invert and cool.

prompt: How do I make M&m Super Snack Bars?
completion:
Step 1: Heat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Mix granulated sugar, brown sugar, margarine, vanilla and eggs in large bowl until well blended. Step 3: Stir in flour, corn flakes, 3/4 cup of the pecans, 2/3 cup m&m candies, oats, baking soda, baking powder and salt. Step 4: Spread mixture in an ungreased 13x9x2 inch rectangular pan. Step 5: Sprinkle remaining pecans and 1/3 cup m&m candies. Step 6: Bake until golden brown 35 to 40 minutes; cool. Step 7: Cut into 2\" x 1-1/4 inch bars. Step 8: High altitude directions (3500 to 6500) feet:", 
"heat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Step 9: Decrease granulated sugar to 2/3 cup and brown sugar to 2/3 cup. Step 10: Bake 30 to 35 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Spice Scones?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Combine the flour, ginger, and nutmeg. Step 3: In a large mixing  bowl, cream vegetable shortening and brown sugar. Step 4: Beat in the molasses and brandy. Step 5: Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Step 6: Drop the dough by spoonfuls 2-1/2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Step 7: Bake 5 to 6 minutes until golden brown. Step 8: As  soon as the cookies are cool enough to handle, remove them from the baking sheet and roll up around metal cone shapes. Step 9: Place seam side down on wire racks to cool.", 
"nancy {:-).

prompt: How do I make Fruit Loop Cookies and Orange Icing?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°f. Step 2: Cream together butter, shortening, sugar and brown sugar. Step 3: Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Step 4: Add flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and orange extract; mix well. Step 5: Stir in fruit loops. Step 6: Drop by level tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet or baking stone. Step 7: Bake for 10-12 minutes, until light golden brown. Step 8: Remove baking sheet from oven and allow cookie to cool on baking sheet for about 5 minutes before moving them to a wire rack to cool completely.", 
"for orange icing, combine confectioners' sugar and orange juice together in a small bowl, mixing until smooth. Step 9: Ice cookies and garnish with additional fruit loops.

prompt: How do I make Gado Gado: Indonesian Salad?
completion:
Step 1: Bring the water to a boil; add salt, cabbage, bean sprouts, and green beans. Step 2: Boil vegetables for 5 minutes; drain. Step 3: Boil potatoes in a separate pot until tender then peel them. Step 4: Cut potatoes, eggs and cucumber into slices. Step 5: Heat peanut sauce on low heat. Step 6: Arrange the green vegetables on a very large platter. Step 7: Cover them with the sliced potatoes, eggs and cucumbers. Step 8: Pour the peanut sauce over the entire platter and serve. Step 9: Serving ideas : serve with white rice and a meat dish.", 
"notes : the peanut sauce may be made by hand or bought. Step 10: We put the gado gado in a large casserole dish.

prompt: How do I make Greek Lemon Potatoes?
completion: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 200c/400f/gas 6. Step 2: Cut the potatoes into bite sized  chunks and put them in a large ovenproof dish. Step 3: Add the olive oil, lemon  rind and juice, water, garlic, bay leaves, rosemary, thyme, oregano,  sugar, salt and pepper. Step 4: Stir well. Step 5: Bake the potatoes for 1-1 1/4 hours or  until they are cooked through and crispy. Step 6: Stir every now and then during  cooking to coat with the herby oil. Step 7: Finally sprinkle with the chopped  parsley.

prompt: How do I make Pastitsio?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Melt 1 oz of butter in large skillet and saute onion til soft and transparent. add the meat, cook until browned. Step 3: Mix tomato paste with wine and add to meat. continue cooking, adding nutmeg, salt, pepper, and cinnamon. Step 4: Cook about 15 minutes, take off heat, cool and mix in half the breadcrumbs and half the grated cheese. set aside. do not allow meat to \"bulk\", keep it separated. Step 5: Cook the macaroni in boiling water with oil til soft. drain and set aside. make crema: melt butter, add flour, cook briefly stirring constantly.", 
"gradually add milk stirring constantly until it starts to boil and thickens   slightly. Step 6: Add seasonings. Step 7: In a separate bowl, beat eggs. Step 8: Add about 1 cup of   the hot sauce to the eggs, stirring constantly. Step 9: Add the egg mixture back into   the saucepan, stirring constantly. Step 10: Stir in 1/4 cup cheese. to assemble: grease a baking dish (like a lasagna pan) and sprinkle it with breadcrumbs. Step 11: Spread half the cooked pasta over the bottom of the dish and sprinkle it with 1/4 cup reserved cheese. spread all of the meat over the pasta.", 
"pour half the sauce over the meat and spread the rest of the pasta over it. sprinkle it with 2 tablespoons of cheese. Step 12: Pour the rest of the sauce on top and smooth with a spatula. Step 13: Sprinkle with the rest of the cheese and breadcrumbs and bake in the preheated oven 50-60 minutes. Step 14: Let stand 10 minutes before cutting into squares.

prompt: How do I make Summer Corn and Tomato Pasta?
completion: Step 1: In large bowl, stir together corn, tomatoes, beans, coriander, olive oil, garlic, jalapeno, green onions, salt and pepper. Step 2: Let stand at room temperature for 15 minutes or for up to 2 hours. Step 3: In large pot of boiling water, cook pasta for 8 minutes or until tender but firm; drain and return to pot. Step 4: Add tomato mixture; stir over medium heat just until heated through. Step 5: Serve sprinkled with feta. Step 6: Make ahead: Step 7: To serve cold, rinse hot pasta  under cold water and add to tomato mixture; cover and refrigerate for up to 1  day.

prompt: How do I make Lentil Dal?
completion: Step 1: Heat olive oil in large saucepan over medium-high heat. Step 2: Add onion, ginger, cumin, turmeric, red peppers, and garlic. Step 3: Saute 2 minutes. Step 4: Add cauliflower and tomatoes; saute 1 minute. Step 5: Stir in water and lentils; bring to a boil. Step 6: Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 35 minutes or until lentils are tender. Step 7: Stir in lime  juice, cilantro, and salt. Step 8: Serve 1 cup lentil mixture with 1 cup rice.

prompt: How do I make Macadamia Nut Lemon Squares?
completion:
Step 1: Combine flour and butter and mix until crumbly. Step 2: Press into greased 8-inch square pan. Step 3: Bake at 350 degrees f for 16 minutes. Step 4: In a mixing bowl combine eggs, brown sugar, baking powder and vanilla; beat with an electric mixer for 2 minutes. Step 5: Stir in 3/4 cup macadamia nuts and cereal. Step 6: Pour over hot crust and spread evenly. Step 7: Return to oven and bake 25 minutes or until firm in center when touched. Step 8: Remove from oven and partially cool. Step 9: Combine powdered sugar, lemon juice and lemon peel; beat well.", 
"spread over macadamia nut crust. sprinkle with the remaining 1/4 cup macadamia nuts. Step 10: Cool. Step 11: Cut into 2-inch squares. Step 12: Recipe courtesy of macadamia nut festival, hilo, big island hi.

prompt: How do I make Basic Crepes II?
completion: Step 1: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Step 2: Whirl one minute; scrape down and blend 15 seconds more. Step 3: Refrigerate at least one hour before making crepes. Step 4: Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet; remove from heat. Step 5: Spoon in 2 tbsp batter; lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Step 6: Return to heat; brown on one side only. Step 7: To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Step 8: Repeat with remaining batter.

prompt: How do I make Basic Crepes?
completion: Step 1: Place all ingredients in blender container. Step 2: Blend. Step 3: Let stand at least one hour before  making crepes. Step 4: Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet; remove from heat. Step 5: Spoon in 2 tbsp batter; lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Step 6: Return to heat; brown on one side only. Step 7: To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Step 8: Repeat with remaining batter.

prompt: How do I make Mississippi Mud Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Mix margarine, flour and nuts; pat into a 13 x 9 inch pan. Step 2: Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 20 to 30 minutes until lightly browned. Step 3: First layer: Step 4: Mix confectioners sugar, cool whip, and cream cheese until smooth. Step 5: Spread over cooled crust. Step 6: Second layer: Step 7: Beat instant chocolate pudding, instant vanilla pudding, and milk until thickened. Step 8: Careful spread over first layer. Step 9: Cool until set in refrigerator. Step 10: Top with remaining cool whip. Step 11: Sprinkle shaved chocolate on top for decoration.", 
"refrigerate or freeze for up to two months.

prompt: How do I make Couscous Cakes With Tomato-Garlic Ragout?
completion:
Step 1: Put the water into a saucepan over high heat. Step 2: When the water comes to a boil, add the salt, pepper, and couscous. Step 3: Remove the pan from the heat, cover it, and  let it sit undisturbed for 5 minutes. Step 4: Fluff the couscous by lightly running a  fork or whisk back and forth in the pan, starting with the top layer and  gradually working your way down. Step 5: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs; slowly whisk in the flour. Step 6: With a spoon, stir in the parsley and the blue cheese. Step 7: Add the couscous and chill the batter for 30 minutes.", 
"sauce: Step 8: In a medium saucepan, heat 1 tbsp olive oil; add the onion. Step 9: Sauté over medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 10: Add the garlic and sauté for 5 minutes more. Step 11: Add the tomatoes, white wine, and water. Step 12: Let the ragout simmer for 10 to 15 minutes, until it has the consistency of a thick sauce. Step 13: Season it with salt and pepper and keep it warm. Step 14: When the couscous mixture has cooled, heat a large skillet with 1 tbsp olive oil over medium-high heat. Step 15: When the oil is hot, drop couscous batter onto the  skillet to form 3-inch cakes.", 
"sear them on one side for about 3 minutes, or  until the undersides are golden brown. Step 16: Flip them with a spatula and sear them on the other side, for about 3 minutes. Step 17: Remove the cakes to a plate and add more batter to the pan. Step 18: Continue making cakes until all the couscous batter is used. Step 19: You should have 3 cakes per person. Step 20: Serve the cakes hot on top of the warmed tomato-garlic ragout.

prompt: How do I make Galaktoboureko - Greek Custard Pastry?
completion:
Step 1: In a saucepan over medium heat add milk, sugar, semolina, 2 ounces  butter, vanilla, salt and a sliver of lemon peel. Step 2: Bring to a boil, whisking  constantly, until mixture thickens remove from heat and allow to cool  slightly. Step 3: Beat eggs in a separate bowl then stir into milk mixture. set  aside. preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 4: Line a 9 x 13 buttered baking pan with half the sheets of phyllo,  brushing each sheet with the melted butter and allowing the edges to overlap  the sides. Step 5: Spread custard evenly over phyllo.", 
"cover with remaining sheets of  phyllo, brushing each sheet with the melted butter. Step 6: Trim the edges and fold  in carefully to seal the filling. Step 7: Brush the top with melted butter and seal  edges with a bit of cold water. Step 8: Bake 45 minutes or until golden. Step 9: Meanwhile make the syrup;  in a small saucepan combine the sugar, water, lemon juice and sliver of  lemon peel and boil for 10 minutes. Step 10: When galaktoboureko is done and still hot from the oven, spoon syrup over  a little at a time until absorbed by the pastry.", 
"cool completely, cut into  diamond shape and serve. Step 11: Notes : this is best made the day before it is needed.  it gives the  pastry time to absorb the syrup and the filling to become firm.

prompt: How do I make Cappuccino Coffee Mix?
completion: Step 1: Finely grind coffee and orange peel in a blender or food processor. Step 2: Add remaining ingredients and process until well blended. Step 3: Store in an airtight container. Step 4: To serve: stir 2 or more teaspoons of coffee mix into 6 ounce hot water.

prompt: How do I make Frosty Latte Smoothie?
completion: Step 1: In a large pitcher, whisk together coffee, milk and honey until thoroughly  combined and honey is dissolved; chill. Step 2: Just before serving; blend coffee  mixture with ice in blender until frothy and smooth.

prompt: How do I make Whipped Cappuccino?
completion: Step 1: Dissolve espresso powder in hot water. Step 2: Allow to cool to room temperature. (the  quickest way is to mix the ingredients in a small metal bowl and swirl.) Step 3: Combine cooled espresso mixture, sweetened condensed milk and ice in a blender. Step 4: Blend on high for one minute until no visible chunks of ice are left. Step 5: Serve with a spoon and a straw. Step 6: Makes 2 tall or 4 short drinks.

prompt: How do I make Spanakopita?
completion:
Step 1: Wash spinach in plenty of water and cut in small pieces; place in bowl. Step 2: Salt lightly; stir to spread salt evenly. Step 3: Take spinach, a handful at a time; squeeze out the excess water; place it in another bowl. Step 4: Saute the onion  in half the butter until it is a light, golden color. Step 5: Add the scallions and cook until they wilt. Step 6: Add spinach; stir until all vegetables take on a light  color. Step 7: Stir in the dill, parsley, salt and pepper. Step 8: Cover the pot and cook until all the water from the spinach is absorbed.", 
"remove from the  heat; turn into a bowl, and immediately add the evaporated milk (to cool the spinach). Step 9: Beat the eggs in another bowl and add the cheese to them; add to the cooled spinach; mix well. Step 10: Line a pan with 8 sheets of phyllo dough, brushing each sheet with the  melted butter before topping it with the next sheet. do not trim the  overhanging sections. Step 11: Pour in the spinach mixture, spreading it evenly over the phyllo. Step 12: Fold the part of the phyllo that extends out of the back of the pan over the filling.", 
"lay the remaining phyllo on top, again brushing each sheet with melted butter before adding the next. trim the overlap. Step 13: Brush additional melted butter on top of the pie. Step 14: Score it into square or diamond-shaped serving pieces. Step 15: Bake for 30 to 45 minutes in a preheated 300 degree fahrenheit oven. Step 16: Let stand for 30 minutes before serving. Step 17: Note: this can also be made without precooking the spinach. in that case, squeeze the spinach free of as much water as possible, mix it with the seasonings, and proceed as above, baking it for 1 hour.

prompt: How do I make Dublin Coddle II?
completion: Step 1: Place sausage and ham in boiling water and cook for 5 minutes. Step 2: Drain meat, but reserve the liquid. Step 3: Put meat into a large saucepan along  with the onions, potatoes and parsley. Step 4: Add enough of the reserved liquid  to almost, but not quite cover the contents of the saucepan. Step 5: Cover and  simmer gently for 1 hour, or until the liquid is reduced by half and all  the ingredients are cooked through but not soggy. Step 6: Season with salt and  pepper.

prompt: How do I make Maple Salmon?
completion: Step 1: Marinate the 2 salmon fillets in mixture of 1/3 cup maple syrup and 1/4 cup of soy sauce for at least 2 hours in the refrigerator. Step 2: Remove from refrigerator,  spoon out marinade into a saucepan and reduce over medium-low heat until you're left with about half the original volume (about 10 minutes). Step 3: Broil the fillets in a lightly oiled pan for about four minutes, skin side up. Step 4: Flip the fillets over and brush the flesh side liberally with the reduced marinade. Step 5: Sprinkle  sesame seeds over top and broil for another 4 minutes or until the surface is  caramelized and the salmon is no longer translucent in the centre.

prompt: How do I make Irish Dark Soda Bread?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Grease two loaf pans. Step 3: Sift all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda and baking powder together into a large bowl. Step 4: Add brown sugar and stir well to incorporate, being very careful to break up any lumps of brown sugar. Step 5: Add buttermilk and stir well. Step 6: Divide the dough between the two prepared loaf pans. Step 7: Bake for about 45 minutes or until brown and crunchy. Step 8: Cool on wire racks.

prompt: How do I make Fire Ant Mound?
completion: Step 1: Crush cookies in blender. Step 2: Place layer on bottom of large bowl. Step 3: Combine butter,  cool whip, cream cheese and confectioners sugar. Step 4: Place layer over cookie layer. Step 5: Combine pudding, milk and vanilla. Step 6: Add layer over first mixture. alternate  layers of mixture while building dirt layer along sides of bowl. Step 7: Save sufficient  \"dirt\" for top layer. Step 8: Chill for at least one hour.

prompt: How do I make Seared Salmon with Horseradish Tomato Vinaigrette?
completion:
Step 1: Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Step 2: Heat oil in a saute pan. Step 3: Sear   salmon on both sides for 1 to 2 minutes until golden brown. Step 4: Fish should still be raw in the center. Step 5: Combine the horseradish, bread crumbs, butter, rosemary,  tarragon, thyme. salt and pepper. Step 6: Add the white wine and mix to paste.  spread  the top of the salmon with equal amounts of the bread crumbs. Step 7: Place fillets on  an oiled sheet tray. Step 8: Place tray in a preheated 375-degree oven. Step 9: Bake for 5 to  7 minutes until the fish is cooked through and the crust is golden brown.", 
"serve with horseradish-tomato vinaigrette. (horseradish-tomato vinaigrette): combine horseradish, honey, vinegar, tomatoes, tomato paste,  dijon mustard, black peppercorns and tarragon in a blender. Step 10: Blend until smooth. Step 11: While blender is running add oil in a thin steady stream  until well mixed and thick. Step 12: Cover and leave at room temperature.  makes 9 oz.

prompt: How do I make Apricot Chicken With Pasta?
completion:
Step 1: Peel onion and chop finely. Step 2: Crush, peel and chop garlic. Step 3: Heat oil in a saucepan and saute onion and garlic for 5 minutes  or until onion is transparent. Step 4: Cut chicken breasts into thin strips. Step 5: Add chicken strips to pan and stir fry 2 or 3 minutes, or until chicken is cooked. Step 6: Drain apricots, leaving about 2 tbsp of the juice. Step 7: Puree apricots in a food processor or blender. Step 8: Add malt vinegar, ginger, cayenne pepper,  salt and pepper. Step 9: Mix to combine; pour into the saucepan.", 
"bring mixture to the boil. Step 10: Cook fettucine in boiling salted water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until  tender. Step 11: Drain. Step 12: Serve chicken over pasta.

prompt: How do I make Luscious Apricot Squares?
completion:
Step 1: In covered small saucepan over low heat, in enough water to cover, cook apricots 15 minutes. Step 2: Drain apricots; finely chop. Step 3: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Step 4: Grease an 8 x 8 inch pan. Step 5: Into large bowl, measure 1 cup flour, butter or margarine and sugar. Step 6: With mixer at medium speed, beat ingredients until well mixed and crumbly. Step 7: Pat evenly into pan. Step 8: Bake 25 minutes or until golden brown. Step 9: Meanwhile, in the same bowl, measure 1/3 cup flour, eggs, apricots, brown sugar, walnuts, baking powder, vanilla, and salt.", 
"beat at medium speed until well mixed, occasionally scraping bowl with a rubber spatula. Step 10: Pour mixture over baked layer and return to oven. Step 11: Bake 25 minutes longer until golden. Step 12: Cool in pan. Step 13: Cut into squares. Step 14: Sprinkle with confectioner's sugar.

prompt: How do I make Drop Scones?
completion: Step 1: Whip eggs and milk together. Step 2: Add flour, sugar, baking soda, and cream of tartar. Step 3: Grease a griddle or frying  pan. Step 4: Drop on 1 tablespoon of the mixture. Step 5: Brown.

prompt: How do I make English Trifle?
completion:
Step 1: In batter bowl, combine sugar and cornstarch, then whisk in the eggs and milk. Step 2: Microwave on 2 minutes, then whisk well. Step 3: Microwave another 3-5 minutes, or until thickened. Step 4: Stir in the vanilla. Step 5: Lay plastic wrap directly over the pudding (this keeps a \"skin\" from forming on the top) then set aside to stand 5-10 minutes. Step 6: In the meantime, slice the cake into 1/2x1x3-inch \"fingers\" and make little jam sandwiches with the slices. Step 7: Arrange the slices in a single layer in the bottom and sides of trifle dish or other deep bowl.", 
"drizzle with half of the sherry (or orange juice), and the raspberry syrup, if using. Step 8: Layer with half of the pudding, sliced fruit, and whipped cream. Step 9: Add another layer of the remaining jam fingers on top of the pudding and fruit, drizzle with remaining sherry, then remaining pudding and fruit, ending with the remaining whipped cream, then top with the almonds. Step 10: Cover with plastic wrap and allow to stand in refrigerator several hours, or overnight.

prompt: How do I make Forepaughs English Trifle?
completion:
Step 1: For pastry cream, in a large, heavy saucepan, combine egg yolks, 1/2 cup sugar and cornstarch until smooth. Step 2: Add milk and cook and stir just until mixture comes to boiling; remove from the heat. Step 3: Stir in butter and vanilla. Step 4: Cool, cover and chill the mixture for about 2 hours. Step 5: Fold in the whipped cream. Step 6: For raspberry sauce, in a  4- to 5-quart dutch oven, heat raspberries over low heat until thawed; stir in sugar. Step 7: Cook, uncovered, over medium-low heat for 40 minutes or until thickened to consistency of egg whites.", 
"cool for about 30 minutes; sieve to remove seeds. Step 8: Cut the sponge cake into 1-1/2-inch pieces. Step 9: Begin layering the trifle by arranging half of the cake pieces in the bottom of a clear 3-quart glass bowl. Step 10: Sprinkle half of the sherry over cake. Step 11: Spoon 1 package of strawberries over cake to cover. Step 12: Repeat layers. Step 13: Cover and chill for up to 24  hours. Step 14: Beat the 1 cup whipping cream with the 1 tablespoon sugar until stiff peaks form. Step 15: Serve the trifle topped with the raspberry sauce, sweetened whipped cream and almonds.", 
"note: if you like, layer ingredients in individual dessert dishes.

prompt: How do I make Best 7-Up Pound Cake?
completion:
Step 1: This is an old recipe that comes from a request in the local paper for. Step 2: \"classic recipes\". Step 3: They called the 7-up bottling company and they  did not even know about it. someone developed this on their own and  never let the company know about it. btw 7-up comes from the popular  card game in the 1930's. Step 4: Cream the margarine, shortening and sugar together beating until  light and fluffy. Step 5: Add the eggs, one at a time, blending well after  each addition. Step 6: Beat in the flour, then beat in the extract and 7-up.", 
"blend well. Step 7: Pour the batter into a well-greased and floured tube pan  and bake at 325 degrees f for 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Step 8: From the rocky mountain news \"food fare\"  mmmmm  mmmmm----- recipe via meal-master (tm) v8.02.

prompt: How do I make Italian Sausage Soup?
completion:
Step 1: In a 5-6 quart pan, combine onions, garlic and 1 cup broth. Step 2: Boil on high heat, stirring occasionally, until liquid evaporates and vegetables start to brown, about 10 to 14 minutes. Step 3: To deglaze pan, stir in 3 tablespoons water to release browned bits. Step 4: Cook, uncovered, until liquid evaporates and mixture begins to brown again, about 1 minute. Step 5: Repeat deglazing step 3 more times until mixture is richly browned. Step 6: Add  sausage and 1/2 cup more water. Step 7: Stir gently until liquid evaporates and meat begins to brown, 8 to 10 minutes.", 
"add remaining 4 cups broth. Step 8: Stir to loosen browned bits. Step 9: Add wine, tomatoes and their liquid, basil, sugar, green pepper, zucchini and pasta. Step 10: Cover and  bring to boil over high heat. Step 11: Simmer until pasta is just tender to bite, about 15 minutes. Step 12: Serve hot, with chopped parsley, salt and pepper. Step 13: (if made ahead, cool, cover and chill up until the next day. reheat to  simmering).

prompt: How do I make Olive Garden Pasta E Fagioli?
completion: Step 1: Sauté beef in oil in large 10 quart pot until beef starts to brown. Step 2: Add onions,  carrots, celery and tomatoes and simmer for about 10 minute. Step 3: Drain and rinse beans  and add to pot. also add beef stock, oregano, pepper, tabasco, spaghetti sauce  and noodles . Step 4: Simmer until celery and carrots are tender, about 45 minute. Step 5: Notes : makes 9 quarts! just cut the recipe down for smaller batches.

prompt: How do I make Glazed Apples With Cream Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Use medium to large-sized apples. choose apples that are good for baking. Step 2: Peel, core and thinly slice apples. Step 3: Melt butter or  margarine in heavy skillet. Step 4: Add apples, brown sugar, lemon juice, applejack, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Step 5: Cook over medium heat for about 25 to 30 minutes. Step 6: Turn often. Step 7: Apple should be caramelized and tender. Step 8: Serve warm with cream sauce. Step 9: Cream sauce: Step 10: Whip 1 cup heavy cream only until soft peaks form. Step 11: Fold in powdered sugar and grated nutmeg.

prompt: How do I make Tomato and Herb Salad?
completion: Step 1: Cut each tomato into 4 wedges; cut each wedge in half crosswise. Step 2: Cut  cucumber in half lengthwise; cut each piece in half lengthwise, and  slice crosswise into 1/2\" pieces. Step 3: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, purple onion, mint, basil and parsley in a large bowl; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Step 4: Add yogurt, toss gently. Step 5: Serve  immediately.

prompt: How do I make Katjang Sauce: Peanut Sauce?
completion:
Step 1: Mix onion and garlic. Step 2: Place onion mixture in a bowl; add the brown sugar. Step 3: Mash with  the back of a spoon to make a paste. Step 4: Brown the paste in the oil at very low heat. Step 5: Stir in sambal oelek, paprika, and ginger powder. Step 6: Add the peanut butter. Step 7: When the sauce is brown, add the ketjap manis and the milk. Step 8: Keep stirring at low heat until the sauce thickens. Step 9: Finally, add the lemon  juice, salt and pepper. Step 10: If the sauce is too thick, add a little more milk  until it reaches a better consistency.", 
"notes : Step 11: *ketjap manis is a sweet indonesian soy sauce. it may be found in  dutch stores, some chinese stores or maybe european delis. it is worth  looking for as it is just delicious! Step 12: *sambal oelek is a paste made from marinaded chili peppers. Step 13: It can be  found in chinese groceries, or dutch stores.

prompt: How do I make Colcannon?
completion:
Step 1: In a large pot, simmer the kale along with olive oil and 2 cups water  for 10 minutes. Step 2: Drain kale and cool a bit before chopping it finely. set aside and cover to keep it warm. Step 3: In a small pot, bring potatoes and water to a boil and simmer until tender. Step 4: In another small pot, simmer leeks in milk for 10 minutes; turn off heat and cover to keep warm. Step 5: Drain the potatoes and puree them into the large pot. Step 6: Add leeks with the milk, and cooked kale. Step 7: Beat with a spoon or whisk until fluffy.", 
"season with mace, salt and pepper. Step 8: Top with melted butter; garnish with parsley if desired. Step 9: Yields 6 servings.

prompt: How do I make Amazing Nasi Goreng?
completion:
Step 1: Boil the rice according to the instructions on the package. make sure that  the rice is fluffy. Step 2: In a wok or large skillet, heat the vegetable oil and fry the smoked bacon and pork or chicken until done. Step 3: Add the onion and garlic. Step 4: Turn the heat to medium and simmer for about 5 minutes. Step 5: Meanwhile, in a separate large saucepan, bring the carrot and cabbage to a  boil in about 4 cups of water. boil for 3 minutes; drain. Step 6: Add the leek and trassi oedang to the meat mixture; simmer for 3 minutes.", 
"add the cooked cabbage and carrot mixture. Step 7: Keep the entire mixture on low heat and stir in the beaten eggs until they are well incorporated. Step 8: Add the ketjap manis, cumin, curcumae, coriander, and sambal oelek if  using. Step 9: Stir well and add the fluffy white rice. Step 10: Mix well and serve warm. Step 11: Serving ideas: Step 12: May serve with sate (peanut sauce) on the side. Step 13: Notes : trassi is a shrimp paste found in asian grocery stores. if you do  not have any, you can either use peeled shrimp mixed in with the other  meat, or leave it out all together.", 
"ketjap manis is a sweet soy sauce. use regular soy sauce if you can't find this type, but you are missing  something wonderful! we don't use the cabbage in our nasi. Step 14: Instead of  the spices listed above, we usually just buy a nasi goreng spice mixture at a dutch store, or chinese market. it is easy and very good. Step 15: I don't  know what curcumae is so i guess we don't put it in our nasi!

prompt: How do I make Irish Soda Bread?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Step 2: Add the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cornstarch, sugar and salt to a large bowl; mix well. Step 3: Add all of the buttermilk at once; stir until soft dough forms. Step 4: It might be a little lumpy, but don't worry about it at this point. Step 5: Pour contents of bowl out onto the counter. Step 6: Knead for a minute or so until blended. Step 7: Divide dough into two portions. Step 8: Shape each portion into a round loaf with lightly flattened tops. Step 9: Put loaves on large ungreased baking sheet, preferably the nonstick kind.", 
"sprinkle some additional flour on top of each loaf and with a sharp knife, cut a cross in two slashes across the top of each loaf. Step 10: Let the loaves sit for 10 minutes. Step 11: Bake for 40 minutes or until golden brown. Step 12: Makes 2 loaves.

prompt: How do I make Butter Crepes?
completion: Step 1: Place all ingredients in blender; whirl for 1 minute. Step 2: Scrape down sides, then blend for another 15 seconds. Step 3: Refrigerate 1 hour.
