Step 2: Set   cooker on  low and cook for 8 hours. Step 3: Meat  should be fork tender and shred  easily. Step 4: Fill  tortillas with favorite fillings and  meat.

prompt: How do I make Beef Liver and Bacon 'n' Onion Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Cook bacon in a saucepan until crisp. Step 2: Drain, reserving 3 tablespoons drippings; set bacon aside. Step 3: Saute onion in reserved drippings until tender. Step 4: Blend in flour and bouillon mix. Step 5: Gradually stir in milk. Step 6: Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture just comes to a boil and thickens. Step 7: Keep warm. Step 8: Pan fry or broil liver to desired degree of doneness. Step 9: To serve pour sauce over individual servings of liver and top with crisp bacon.

prompt: How do I make Lobster Newburg?
completion:
Step 1: Into a large kettle of boiling salted water plunge lobster, head first, and boil covered for 8 minutes from the time the water returns to a boil. Step 2: Transfer lobsters using tongs to cutting board, cool till they can be handled. Step 3: Break off the claws at the body, crack and remove the meat and cut into 1/2 inch pieces. Step 4: Remove the rest of the meat and do the same.  in heavy sauce pan cook the meat in butter over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes. Step 5: Add 2 tbsp. sherry and 3 tbsp. brandy and cook the mixture , stirring, for 2 minutes.", 
"transfer meat with a slotted spoon to a bowl. Step 6: Add the cream to the sherry mixture and boil till it is reduced to about a cup. Step 7: Reduce heat to low and stir in the 1 tsp. sherry and brandy, nutmeg, cayenne and salt to taste. Step 8: Whisk in the egg yolks. Step 9: Cook the mixture, whisking constantly, until it registers 140* on a deep fat thermometer,, and cook it whisking, for 3 minutes more. stir in meat and serve over toast.

prompt: How do I make Lots of Berries Pie?
completion: Step 1: In a saucepan, combine sugar, salt, cornstarch, and cinnamon. Step 2: Stir in berries. Step 3: Add water and lemon juice. Step 4: Cook over medium heat just to the boiling point. Step 5: Pour into pie shell; dot with butter. Step 6: Top with lattice or full crust. Step 7: If using a full crust, cut slits in the top, brush with milk and sprinkle with sugar. Step 8: Bake in oven preheated to 350f for about 45 minutes or until the crust is golden.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Strawberry Butter?
completion: Step 1: Combine all of the ingredients in a medium saucepan. Step 2: Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer and cook until berries are soft. drain, reserving the juices. Step 3: Place the berries in a food processor or blender and puree until smooth. Step 4: Pass through a fine strainer. Step 5: If too thick, add a few drops of reserved juices to thin.

prompt: How do I make BBQ Ranchero Chicken Salad?
completion:
Step 1: Brush both sides of chicken with barbecue sauce; grill or broil about 5\" from heat source 6 minutes per side, or until juices are clear. Step 2: Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine lettuce, tomatoes, 3/4 cup cheese, pepper, corn, black beans, olives and green onions; mix well. Step 3: Combine dressing, chili powder and cumin; mix well. Step 4: To serve, divide lettuce mixture onto 6 serving plates. Step 5: Cut chicken crosswise into 1/2\" thick slices; arrange over lettuce. drizzle salads with dressing and sprinkle with remaining 3/4 cup cheese. chicken may be cooked, cooled, covered and refrigerated up to 1 day before serving.", 
"reheat chicken or served chilled. Step 6: Lettuce mixture and dressing may be prepared separately, covered and refrigerated up to 4 hours before serving.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Blueberry Grunt?
completion:
Step 1: In large nonaluminum saucepan, combine berries and 1/2 cup brown sugar. Step 2: Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until berries come to a boil. Step 3: Meanwhile, sift flours, baking powder, salt, remaining sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg into medium bowl. Step 4: Add milk, mixing just to moisten. Step 5: Drop dumplings by tablespoonfuls into boiling berries. Step 6: Cover with tight-fitting lid. Step 7: Lower heat slightly. Step 8: Cook without lifting lid, about 15 minutes. Step 9: To serve, using large spoon, transfer dumplings into bowl.", 
"surround with berries. Step 10: Break dumplings open with two forks. Step 11: Serve warm, topped with vanilla ice cream or nondairy frozen vanilla dessert.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Cauliflower Tomato Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350f. Step 2: Place cauliflower in a steamer basket over boiling water. Step 3: Cover saucepan and steam 4-5 minutes or until cauliflower is almost tender. Step 4: Arrange cauliflower in a buttered shallow baking dish. Step 5: Arrange tomatoes over cauliflower. Step 6: Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Step 7: Combine cheeses in a bowl and sprinkle over cauliflower mixture. sprinkle with breadcrumbs, drizzle with butter and bake 20-25 minutes or until top is golden.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Cauliflower with Bacon?
completion: Step 1: Place cauliflower in a steamer basket over boiling water. Step 2: Cover pan and steam about 8 minutes or until almost tender. Step 3: Remove steamer basket and set aside. heat a heavy nonstick skillet over medium high heat. cook bacon 4-5 minutes or until browned. Step 4: Add scallions, cauliflower and salt and pepper to taste. cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently until hot.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Fudge Bars?
completion: Step 1: Combine the flour, oat bran, cocoa, sugar and salt, if desired, and stir to mix well. Step 2: Add the sweet potato, egg whites, and vanilla extract, and stir to mix well. Step 3: Fold in nuts if desired. Step 4: Coat an 8-inch square pan with non-stick cooking spray. Step 5: Spread the mixture evenly in the pan and bake at 325° for about 25 minutes or until the edges are firm and the center is almost set. Step 6: Cool to room temperature, cut into squares and serve.

prompt: How do I make Indian Spiced Chicken?
completion:
Step 1: In small bowl, stir together oil and garlic. stir in water, paprika, ginger, coriander, cumin, nutmeg, turmeric and cayenne pepper. Step 2: Spoon 1 tbsp (15 ml) into another small bowl; stir in lemon juice and set aside. arrange chicken in single layer in shallow glass dish; brush with remaining spice mixture. cover and refrigerate chicken for 1 hour. Step 3: (chicken can be prepared to this point and refrigerated for up to 24 hours; let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes.) place chicken, flesh side down, on greased grill over medium-high heat; close lid and cook for 5 minutes.", 
"turn and brush flesh with reserved lemon mixture. close lid and cook, turning often, for about 12 minutes longer or until chicken is no longer pink inside and juices run clear when chicken is pierced. Step 4: Serve with lemon wedges.

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Potatoes Romanoff?
completion: Step 1: Boil potatoes until tender. Step 2: Mash with butter, sour cream, onions, 3/4 cup cheese, salt and pepper. Step 3: Turn mixture into buttered 1-1/2 quart casserole. sprinkle with remaining cheese and paprika. Step 4: Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 40 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Lasagna Pinwheels?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375. Step 2: Coat rectangular 2-quart baking dish with no-stick cooking  spray. Step 3: Brown turkey in non-stick skillet. while turkey is cooking combine  ricotta, mozzarella, parmesan , eggs and parsley in medium mixing bowl; stir to  blend. Step 4: Spread a scant 1/4 cup cheese mixture on each lasagna noodle. roll up  starting with a short end. Step 5: Place seam side down in baking dish. Step 6: Add pasta sauce  to turkey in skillet and heat. pour sauce over rolls in baking dish. Step 7: Cover with  foil.", 
"bake 30 to 35 minutes or until heated through. Step 8: Let stand 5 minutes before  serving.

prompt: How do I make Baked Red Onions?
completion: Step 1: In large saucepan, cover onions and lemon rind with water; bring to Step 2: Boil and boil for 5 minutes. Step 3: Drain; refresh under cold running water and drain again. Step 4: Discard rind. Step 5: Peel onions and arrange in 13x9 inch casserole; pour olive oil over. Step 6: Bake, uncovered, in 375= f oven, basting occasionally for 40 minutes. Step 7: Add raisins, port, vinegar, sugar, and pepper to taste.  bake for 30 minutes or until juices are syrupy.

prompt: How do I make Lemon Cake?
completion: Step 1: Mix together; beat 4 minutes.  put into greased tube pan. Step 2: Bake in 350°f oven 35-40 minutes. Step 3: Cool, then   pierce the top of the cooled cake with a fork. Step 4: Make icing  from confectioners' sugar and lemon juice, drizzle over cake.

prompt: How do I make Lemonade Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 300. Step 2: Grease and flour a bundt pan. Step 3: Dissolve jello in hot water  and set aside - do not jell. Step 4: In a large bowl, mix next 3 ingredients. Step 5: Add jello  and beat together 3 minutes. Step 6: Turn into bundt pan. Step 7: Bake 1 hour or until inserted  knife comes out clean. Step 8: Meanwhile: while cake is baking mix next 2 ingredients and let sit. while cake is still warn, loosen it from edges of pan but leave cake in pan. Step 9: Pour lemonade mixture over cake allowing it to run down the sides.", 
"save some lemonade mixture. when you turn your cake out onto your, rack put some wax paper under rack and pour saved lemonade mixture over top of cake. this cake is simply divine. enjoy...

prompt: How do I make Hot Fudge Pudding Cake?
completion: Step 1: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: In a greased 8\" square baking dish, mix baking mix,  1/2 cup sugar and 3 tbs. cocoa. Step 3: Stir in milk and vanilla until blended. Step 4: Sprinkle evenly with remaining 1/3 cup cocoa and 1/2 cup sugar. Step 5: Pour water over top (no  need to stir). Step 6: Bake 40 min. or until top is firm. Step 7: Dust lightly with  confectioners' sugar. Step 8: Spoon while hot into dessert bowls; top cake with sauce.

prompt: How do I make Iced Coffee II?
completion: Step 1: Place 1 bag for each 8-10 oz. of unheated water in a large container.  refrigerate for 24 hours. Step 2: Remove the bags.  pour over ice as needed. you will probably want to fool around with the proportions but this is what makes a brew i like.

prompt: How do I make Irish Beef Stew With Guinness Stout?
completion:
Step 1: Heat a 6 quart stove top casserole or oven proof pot and add the oil and the bay leaves. Step 2: Cook the bay leaves for a moment and then add the meat. brown the meat on both sides on high heat. Step 3: Add the onion and cook for a few minutes until it is clear. Step 4: Reduce the heat to low and add the garlic, thyme, rosemary and flour and stir until smooth. Step 5: Add the beef stock and stout; simmer, stirring until the stew thickens a bit. add the remaining ingredients and cover. Step 6: Place the pot in the oven at 275 f: for about 2 hours, stirring a couple of times.", 
"check for the salt and pepper before serving.

prompt: How do I make Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees combine peanut butter, shortening, brown sugar, milk, vanilla and egg in large bowl. Step 2: Beat at medium speed of electric mixer until  well-blended. Step 3: Combine flour, salt and baking soda. Step 4: Add to creamed mixture at  low speed. Step 5: Mix just until blended. Step 6: Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheet. flatten slightly in crisscross pattern with lines  of fork. Step 7: Bake at 375 degrees for 7 to 8 minutes, or until set and just  beginning to brown.", 
"cool 2 minutes on baking sheet before removing to cooling  rack.

prompt: How do I make Healthy Pie Crust?
completion: Step 1: Combine oil with flour and salt . Step 2: Drizzle with milk. Step 3: This makes 2 crusts, or  one top and one bottom enjoy! cindy

prompt: How do I make Heloise's Cake Mix Cookies?
completion: Step 1: Mix all ingredients well to remove lumps. Step 2: Stir in raisins and/or nuts and/or chocolate chips if you so desire. Step 3: Drop by teaspoonfuls on an ungreased baking sheet about 2-inches apart. Step 4: Bake at 350°f for 8-10 minutes.

prompt: How do I make 3 Berry Shakes?
completion: Step 1: Place the frozen strawberries, milk, raspberry jam, frozen blueberries, and  neufchatel cheese in blender container. Step 2: Cover and blend until smooth. Step 3: If  necessary, add more milk to make mixture the desired consistency. Step 4: Pour into 4 glasses. Step 5: If desired, garnish with fresh strawberries, raspberries,  and blueberries,  serve immediately.

prompt: How do I make Baked Fish with Lemon & Black Pepper?
completion:
Step 1: Place fish fillets into a medium sized bowl and sprinkle with salt, turmeric, cumin, black pepper and garlic, tossing to coat well. Step 2: Cover and marinate for 50 - 60 minutes in the refrigerator. Step 3: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Step 4: Coat the bottom of an 8 x 8 inch baking dish with the vegetable oil. Step 5: Place the fish in a single layer inside the baking dish, and pour the marinade on top. Step 6: Bake uncovered for 20-25 minutes. Step 7: The fish should be firm to the touch. Step 8: Fish is done when it easily flakes with a fork.", 
"sprinkle with lemon juice 5 minutes before serving.

prompt: How do I make Gypsy Tart?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven 400°f, 200°c, gas 6. Step 2: Roll out pastry and use to  line 10 inch (25cm) flan ring and bake blind for 15-20 minutes until  cooked. Step 3: Let it cool. Step 4: Whisk evaporated milk and sugar together for 10-15 minutes until light  and fluffy. Step 5: Pour into the pastry case and bake for 10 minutes. Step 6: It will  have a slightly sticky top but will not set completely until it has  cooled completely. Step 7: Serve cold.

prompt: How do I make Hamantaschen-Cookies (Haman's Hats)?
completion:
Step 1: Hamantaschen are the traditional cookies of purim, a festive holiday on the jewish calendar. Step 2: Grease cookie sheets. Step 3: In large bowl, beat eggs slightly. Step 4: Add sugar, orange peel and margarine; beat until mixture is light and fluffy. Step 5: Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup; level off. Step 6: Add flour; mix well. Step 7: Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate 1 1/2 hours for easier handling. Step 8: Heat oven to 350°f. Step 9: On lightly floured surface, roll out 1/4 of dough at a time to 1/4-inch thickness.", 
"keep remaining dough refrigerated. Step 10: Cut with floured 3-inch round cookie cutter. Step 11: Place 1 inch apart on greased cookie sheets. Step 12: Spoon heaping teaspoonful poppy seed filling on center of each circle. moisten edges of dough circles with water. Step 13: Shape into triangles as shown in diagram, folding 3 sides in without completely covering filling; pinch corners to seal. Step 14: Bake at 350° for 8-12 minutes or until edges are light golden brown. Step 15: Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets.

prompt: How do I make Best Hamburger Diane?
completion: Step 1: Mix the ground round, salt and pepper together lightly and form into 3 1-inch patties. Step 2: Melt butter in skillet.  remove from heat.  blend mustard into butter, return to heat.  saute hamburgers on medium heat about 5 minutes each side.  remove and keep warm. Step 3: Add lemon juice and worcestershire sauce to pan and stir over low heat until well blended. Step 4: Return patties to pan and let simmer in juices a few minutes while spooning juice over the top occasionally. Step 5: Serve over toasted french bread.

prompt: How do I make Hobo Bread?
completion: Step 1: Pour water over raisins. Step 2: Add baking soda. Step 3: Let stand overnight.  in morning add remaining ingredients. Step 4: Grease three 1-pound coffee cans and bake at 350 for 1 hour, then remove bread from cans.

prompt: How do I make Homemade Mayonnaise?
completion: Step 1: In a food processor or blender, blend the egg and lemon juice for 10  seconds. Step 2: With the processor running, slowly pour in the oil through  the feed tube. mixture should thicken. Step 3: Add the pepper and salt and  pulse once or twice to blend. Step 4: Transfer to an airtight container and  refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before using. Step 5: Best if used within  24 hours. Step 6: This recipe yields 1 1/4 cups.

prompt: How do I make Homemade Pop-Tarts?
completion: Step 1: Take pie dough, roll out as usual. cut into rectangles. Step 2: Spread jam on half of them, leaving a half inch or so on the edges without jam. cover with the other half of the rectangles. crimp the edges with a fork. Step 3: Bake till the pie dough is done. Step 4: You can frost these with a simple glaze, like powdered sugar and milk, or leave plain.  you can either make up a batch of these, or just do one or two with leftover dough the next time you make a pie.

prompt: How do I make Hot Cocoa Mix?
completion: Step 1: In a mixing bowl combine dry milk powder, powdered sugar, creamer, and cocoa. Step 2: Store in airtight container. Step 3: For each serving, place 1/3 cup of the mix in a mug and add 3/4 cup boiling  water. Step 4: Notes : mocha mix: prepare as above, except stir 1/2 cup instant coffee crystals into mix.

prompt: How do I make Hot Fruit Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Drain each piece of fruit on a paper towel. Step 2: Using a 1 1/2 quart casserole  arrange fruit in layers. Step 3: Cream butter, sugar, cornstarch, and  curry powder. Step 4: Cover each layer with creamed mixture. cook uncovered about 1 hour.

prompt: How do I make Japanese Chicken Karaage (Fried Chicken)?
completion:
Step 1: Cut chicken meat into a bite sized pieces. Step 2: Sprinkle a teaspoon of salt and a  tablespoon of japanese sake on the meats, knead them, and leave it about 30  minutes. Step 3: Sop up the sake with paper towels and put the meats, all spices,  and  flour into a plastic bag. Step 4: Knead the plastic bag until all spices and flour cover all meats. Step 5: Fill a pan with vegetable oil for deep frying  and heat it up with  middle flame. when the pan is heated up enough, put the meats into the pan. Step 6: If  your pan is  big enough(about 30 cm diameter),  you can put them all at once  (don't put only a few pieces; it will make only the surface of meat char).", 
"notes:  if you see bubbles as soon as you put a wooden chop stick into the oil, this is too hot.  if you see them after 2 seconds, it's just the right temperature.  after  deep-frying the meat about 7~8 minutes, make the flame stronger. Step 7: When the  chicken fried beautifully brown,  take them out of the pan onto paper towels. Step 8: In addition if you sprinkle lemon juice on the chicken, it  tastes better.

prompt: How do I make Keftedakia?
completion:
Step 1: Pour ouzo in a small bowl. Step 2: Tear bread into small pieces and soak in ouzo 5 minutes. Step 3: In a skillet, over medium heat, saute onion in 3 tablespoons oil until translucent, about 5 minutes. Step 4: Remove from skillet with a slotted spoon and place in a large mixing bowl. Step 5: Squeeze bread dry, discarding ouzo, and combine with onions. Step 6: Add in turkey, egg, mint, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper and mix well to combine. form meat mixture into 1\" balls and roll in flour to coat evenly. Step 7: Place on a cookie sheet and refrigerate 1 hour.", 
"add remaining 4 tablespoons olive oil to a large skillet, over medium high heat, and saute meatballs until browned, about 8 - 10 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Kentucky Biscuits?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 425.  sift into mixing bowl flour, salt, sugar and baking powder. Step 2: Make a nest in the flour mix and add milk. Step 3: Add shortening and begin kneading with hands (to cut in) the vegetable shortening and flour in the milk until thoroughly mixed. Step 4: Add milk -  if needed - to form, and mix. Step 5: Turn onto floured board, and knead gently 6 to 8 times. Step 6: Pat dough to 1/2\" thickness. Step 7: Cut into biscuits. Step 8: Place on baking sheet and brown in oven 10-13 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Lentil-Bulghur Salad?
completion:
Step 1: Place lentils in a sieve, and rinse thoroughly. Step 2: Transfer lentils to sauce pan  with 2 1/2 cups water and bring to a boil. Step 3: Reduce heat to low and simmer for  30-45 minutes, until lentils are tender but not mushy. Step 4: Lentils should hold their shape.  while lentils are simmering, place the bulghur wheat in a bowl. Step 5: Boil the remaining cup of water and pour over the bulghur wheat. cover and let stand  until all water has been absorbed, about 15 minutes. Step 6: Fluff bulghur wheat with a  fork.", 
"when the lentils are done, pour off any remaining liquid and let the  lentils cool. Step 7: Heat an iron-cast skillet over high heat. add walnut pieces and  stir them constantly with a wooden spoon until they begin to brown. Step 8: Turn off the heat and set aside.  in a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, vinegar,  garlic, and salt and pepper with a fork to make a dressing. Step 9: Place lentils in a  large bowl, preferably glass. Step 10: With a wooden spoon, carefully mix in the bulghur  wheat, followed by the chopped vegetables and the toasted walnuts.", 
"pour dressing evenly over the salad, and mix in with a fork. Step 11: Refrigerate salad at least one  hour to allow the flavors to blend. Step 12: Suggestions  french lentils are small, dark-green lentils that can be found in most health food stores. Step 13: If they are unavailable, substitute brown lentils. Step 14: Bulghur wheat can also be found in health food stores and ethnic groceries. Step 15: It comes in several different degrees of coarseness. Step 16: For this recipe, the finely cracked variety is preferred.

prompt: How do I make 3 Step Cheesecake?
completion: Step 1: Mix cream cheese, sugar and vanilla at medium speed with electric mixer until well blended. Step 2: Add eggs; mix until blended. Step 3: Pour into crust. Step 4: Bake at 350 for 40 minutes or until center is almost set. cool. Step 5: Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight. spread sour cream over cheesecake. top with strawberries, stem side down. Step 6: Drizzle with jelly.

prompt: How do I make Bananas Flambe?
completion: Step 1: Take 2 ripe, but not soft bananas and cut in half, then split lengthwise.  melt  a few tablespoons butter over medium heat.  add 2-3 tablespoons brown sugar and  stir. Step 2: Add bananas. Step 3: Cook until fairly warm and starting to soften (about 1  min.).  flip bananas and allow to cook an additional 30 seconds. Step 4: Add rum to taste, and swirl in pan a bit. allow to  thicken slightly, remove from heat and serve.

prompt: How do I make Mai Tai Dessert?
completion:
Step 1: Line sides and bottom of 9 inch spring form pan with the split ladyfingers. Step 2: Soften gelatin in pineapple juice. beat egg yolks in top of double boiler. Step 3: Stir in sugar and salt.  blend in milk, cook over boiling water, stirring for 5 minutes or until well thickened. Step 4: Blend in gelatin mixture, lime juice and rum. Step 5: Add well drained pineapple.  chill until thickened but not set.  beat egg whites, gradually adding sugar. Step 6: Fold pineapple custard and whipped cream into egg whites. Step 7: Pour into spring form pan.", 
"chill several hours or overnight.  to serve, remove pan rim, sprinkle with nuts and add little puffs of whipped cream piped around the edge.

prompt: How do I make Manifold Roast (Car-b-que)?
completion: Step 1: Start with a 2- to 3-pound roast, the flatter the better. Step 2: Season with dry good  seasons salad dressing mix or dry mushroom soup, salt and pepper or any way you  season a roast before roasting. Step 3: Double or triple wrap in heavy-duty aluminum  foil, crimping on sides so liquid will not leak when you turn the roast. place  on or against the flat part of exhaust manifold or against hot part of engine  block. Step 4: Drive five to six hours. Step 5: Turn once halfway to destination. Step 6: You will  arrive with a tender, juicy roast, ready to eat, and you will enjoy the smells  of a home-cooked meal en route. note: this will not work on all vehicles, only those with appropriate engine design.

prompt: How do I make Maple Baked Pork and Beans?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 250 degrees. Step 2: Place beans in a large bean pot or flameproof  casserole. cut the rind off the salt pork in one piece leaving a 1/2 inch of fat attached; reserve. cut remaining salt pork into strips about 1 1/2 x 3/4 x 3/8  inch. Step 3: Blanch rind and strips in a large saucepan for 5 minutes to remove some of the salt. drain and rinse well under cold running water. Step 4: Add salt pork strips and all remaining ingredients, except rind, to bean pot and mix well to combine. lay pork rind on top, cover tightly and bake 3 hours.", 
"remove rind, recover  and continue to bake 3 - 5 hours longer, until beans are tender and liquid has  been reduced to a thick sauce.    check occasionally during last few hours of  baking and add additional boiling water, if necessary, to prevent burning.

prompt: How do I make Maple Walnut Fudge?
completion: Step 1: Combine butter, evaporated milk,sugar and salt in medium, heavy duty saucepan. Step 2: Bring to a full rolling boil, stirring constantly, over medium heat. boil,  stirring constantly for 4-1/2 to 5 minutes. Step 3: Remove from heat. stir in  marshmallows, morsels, nuts and maple flavoring. Step 4: Stir vigorously for 1 minute or until marshmallows are melted. Step 5: Pour into buttered 13x9 inch baking pan. Step 6: (i used  a square casserole) cool until firm. Step 7: Cut into squares. Step 8: Makes about 50 pieces  makes a nice, creamy fudge!

prompt: How do I make Maryland White Potato Pie?
completion: Step 1: Combine potatoes, butter, sugar, baking powder and salt in medium bowl, mix well. Step 2: Gradually add whipping cream and milk, stirring until well blended. Step 3: Stir in lemon rind, juice, vanilla and nutmeg. Step 4: Add eggs mixing well. Step 5: Pour into pie crust. bake at 350'f for 55 minutes knife comes out of center clean.

prompt: How do I make Mexican Hamburgers?
completion: Step 1: Mix  ground beef, taco seasoning mix, green chilies, finely chopped onion. Step 2: Shape into patties and grill. Step 3: Serve with salsa.

prompt: How do I make Barbecue Chicken?
completion:
Step 1: Remove the skin and all visible fat from the chicken pieces. Step 2: Cut 2-3 slits, 1 inch long and 1/2 inch deep, in each piece of chicken. Step 3: Place in a casserole dish and set aside. cut onion into 4-5 pieces. Step 4: In a blender jar put onion, tomato sauce, yogurt, ginger, garlic cloves, coriander, cayenne pepper, cloves, cumin seeds, cardamom pods, salt, garam masala and red food coloring. Step 5: Blend to a smooth paste. pour the tandoori paste on the chicken and turn pieces to thoroughly coat with spices.", 
"cover with a lid or plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator 4-24 hours. Step 6: Preheat oven to 400 f. Step 7: Remove chicken pieces from the marinade, saving marinade. arrange pieces in a broiler pan. Step 8: Bake uncovered in the middle of the oven for 30 minutes. Step 9: Turn pieces over and brush with remaining marinade. bake for 10-15 minutes until chicken is tender. Step 10: Turn oven to broil. Step 11: Turn pieces over once again and broil for 5 minutes to get a nice red color. Step 12: Transfer to a serving platter.", 
"serve with lemon wedges or squeeze lemon juice over the chicken before eating, if desired.

prompt: How do I make Microwaved Garlic Mushroom Rolls?
completion: Step 1: Place butter and garlic in a bowl. Step 2: Cover and cook on high 20 - 45 seconds to melt.  add mushrooms, lemon juice and pepper to taste, blending well. Step 3: Cover and cook on high 5 minutes, stirring once. cut a thin slice from the top of each roll and reserve.  pull out the soft crumb centre and use as breadcrumbs in another dish. Step 4: Stir the parsley into the mushroom mixture, mixing well. Step 5: Spoon the mixture into each roll and replace the lids. Step 6: Arrange on a plate lined with absorbent paper and heat on high 30 - 60 seconds to heat through.

prompt: How do I make Minestrone?
completion: Step 1: Heat oil in dutch oven over medium heat.  cook garlic and onion in oil about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until onion is tender. Step 2: Stir in remaining ingredients except cheese, breaking up tomatoes. Step 3: Heat to boiling; reduce heat.  cover and simmer 1/2-hour. Step 4: Add pasta and cook an additional 1/2-hour. Step 5: Serve with parmesan.

prompt: How do I make Mixed Onion Soup in Sourdough Bread Bowls?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 Step 2: Cut 1/2 inch to 3/4 inch off top of the bread loaves. Step 3: Scoop out bread leaving 1/2 inch thick shell. Step 4: Generously brush inside of bread bowls with melted butter. Step 5: Place bread bowls and lids, buttered side up, directly on oven rack; bake until crisp about 20 minutes. Step 6: Remove from oven and set aside. melt 1/4 cup butter in a heavy, large pot over med.-high heat. add white onions, leeks, red onions, garlic and shallots to the pot. cook until the vegetables are dark brown, stirring occasionally, about 25 minutes.", 
"add flour and stir for 1 minute. gradually mix in sherry. Step 7: Boil mixture until very thick, scraping up browned bits, about 5 minutes. Step 8: Gradually mix in stock; add thyme and rosemary and bring to a boil. Step 9: Reduce heat to med.-low and simmer 30 minutes. Step 10: Add cream; simmer until slightly thickened, about 15 minutes. Step 11: Season with salt and pepper. Step 12: Place 1 bread bowl on each plate placing the bread lid alongside. ladle soup into the bread bowl and serve.

prompt: How do I make Mock Apple Pie?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: In a saucepan, combine sugar, water, cream of  tartar and butter. Step 3: Bring to a boil. Step 4: Add 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon to the  mixture and continue to boil for approximately 4 minutes, stirring constantly. Step 5: Crush the saltine crackers and put in a 9-inch unbaked pie crust.  pour mixture  from saucepan into the pie crust and sprinkle the top with cinnamon. Step 6: Bake for 40 minutes or until done.  serves 8. Step 7: Dorothy nuckols, indiana

prompt: How do I make Ritz Mock Apple Pie II?
completion:
Step 1: Roll out bottom crust of pastry and fit into 9-inch pie plate.  break ritz crackers coarsely into pastry-lined plate.  combine water, sugar and cream of tartar in saucepan, boil gently for 15 minutes. prompt: How do I make Pizza Dough and Sauce?

Step 2: Stir in salt, oil and half of flour. gradually add remaining flour, mixing well. Step 3: Knead 8-10 minutes or until smooth and elastic. place in greased bowl and let rise until double (1/2-1 hour) punch down and let rise again until double. punch down and divide. pat out on two pizza pans. Step 4: Top with pizza sauce & toppings. bake at 400 degrees for 20-25 minutes.", 
"pizza sauce:  mix all ingredients together, blending well. (you can also add a few sprinkles of garlic powder if you want). Step 5: Makes enough for two 12- or14-inch pizzas or one thick 16-inch pizza. Step 6: Top with meats, cheese and other toppings. Step 7: To freeze, prepared pizza method: double wrap and freeze the prepared pizza (without baking it) on the pizza pan. unwrap and bake the frozen pizza at 400â°f for about 22 minutes. Step 8: Alternative freezing method: after first punch down of dough, divide dough and place in a zip-loc bag and place in the freezer. to prepare, remove from freezer and place in a greased bowl. the dough will take about 8-10 hours to thaw and raise slightly. pat out on grease pizza pan and proceed as directed above. i also freeze half the sauce in a small container for future use.

prompt: How do I make Potato-Plum Dumplings?

"do not boil too hard or dumplings may split open. prompt: How do I make Rock Candy for Kids?
completion:
Step 1: Put one cup of water into a small saucepan, pour 2 cups of granulated sugar into the water, heat the water and sugar on the stove over a medium heat, continue  stirring until the sugar melts, keep adding sugar and stirring until it melts,  stop adding sugar when you see that it will no longer dissolve in the water  (that is until you see sugar lying on the bottom of the saucepan). remove the  pot from the stove, let the liquid cool until it is just warm. Step 2: Pour the liquid  into a clean glass jar.", 
"tie one end of a piece of heavy cord around the middle  of a pencil. Step 3: Place the pencil over the top of the glass jar letting the cord  fall into the liquid. Step 4: Crystals will begin to form in a few hours the next day,  remove the cord from the jar, pour the sugar liquid back into the saucepan,  reheat and cool it just as you did before. pour the liquid back into the jar and reinsert the cord with the crystals into it. more crystals will form. Step 5: If you  repeat this procedure every day the crystal candy will grow bigger and bigger.",

prompt: How do I make Peach Vinegar?

prompt: How do I make Herbal Vinegar with Garlic & Basil?

"remove from heat; keep  chocolate warm over water in the double boiler. Step 7: Dip large ends of cooled  cookies into melted chocolate, then roll in remaining 3/4 cup chopped  pecans. Step 8: Cool to set chocolate.

prompt: How do I make Butter Pecan Cookies II?
completion: Step 1: In a large bowl, cream butter, brown sugar; add egg and mix until well blended. Step 2: Slowly add flour and salt and mix well. Step 3: Cover and refrigerate for at least one  hour. Step 4: Preheat oven to 375°f. Step 5: Roll 1-inch pieces of dough into balls and place 2-inches apart on cookie sheets. Step 6: Flatten balls with the bottom of a glass dipped in flour. Step 7: Press a pecan into top of dough. Step 8: Bake 10 to 12 minutes until lightly colored.

prompt: How do I make Coconut Bread?
completion: Step 1: Combine flour, bak  ing powder, soda, and salt. set aside. in a large bowl,  combine sugar, oil, eggs, and vanilla. Step 2: Add dry ingredients alternately with  buttermilk. Step 3: Stir just until moistened. Step 4: Fold in coconuts and walnuts. Step 5: Pour into  three pam sprayed small loaf pans. Step 6: Bake in preheated 300 degree oven on lowest  rack for about 30-35 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.

prompt: How do I make Coconut Bread II?
completion: Step 1: Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside. in a large bowl  combine sugar, oil, eggs and coconut extract. add dry ingredients alternately  with buttermilk; stir just until moistened. Step 2: Fold in coconut and nuts. Step 3: Pour   into  two greased and floured 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pans. Step 4: Bake at 325~f. for  1 hour or until breads test done. Step 5: Cool 10 minutes in pans before removing to a  wire rack to cool completely.

prompt: How do I make Peppered Cheddar Muffine?
completion: Step 1: Stir together first 6 ingredients in a large bowl; make a well in center of  mixture. stir together milk, egg, and vegetable oil until blended. Step 2: Add to dry  ingredients, stirring just until moistened. Step 3: Spoon batter into greased muffin  pans, filling 2/3 full. Step 4: Bake at 400 f. Step 5: For 18 - 20 min. Step 6: Or until tops are golden brown. Step 7: Cool muffins in pans 2 min.; remove from pans, and serve. yield: 1 doz.

prompt: How do I make Lemon Crumb Bars?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: In large bowl, heat cake mix, margarine and 1 egg with  mixer until crumbly. Step 3: Stir in saltine crumbs. Step 4: Reserving 2 cups of crumb mixture,  press remaining crumbs into bottom of greased 13x9 baking pan. Step 5: Bake 20 minutes. Step 6: With mixer or wire whisk, beat 3 egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk and lemon juice. spread over prepared crust. top with reserved crumb mixture. bake 25  minutes or until set. cool. Step 7: Cut into bars. store covered in refrigerator.

prompt: How do I make Baked Cucumbers?
completion: Step 1: Place 1 layer of cucumbers on a baking dish. Step 2: Dab the cucumbers with the butter. Step 3: Add some water to barely cover the cucumbers. Step 4: Mix all seasonings into a small dish. Step 5: Add 1/2 of the seasonings to the first layer. Step 6: Next, make a second layer--repeating w/ the butter and seasonings. Step 7: Bake uncovered in a 400° oven for 1 hour. Step 8: During the first 30 minutes, rotate the bottom layer to the top and put the second layer to the bottom and finish off for the second 30 minute increment.

prompt: How do I make Date Loaf Candies?
completion: Step 1: In a medium sauce pan, mix sugar, dates, butter and milk. Step 2: Cook for 10 - 15 minutes. Step 3: Remove from heat and add walnuts, and vanilla. Step 4: Beat until it thickens. Step 5: Pour onto a cleaned dish towel (not terry cloth).  make sure the towel is wet but not soaking wet--little over damp.  roll it lengthwise and put into fridge until it has completely cooled. Step 6: Unroll the wrap and slice.

prompt: How do I make Steak and Kidney Pie?
completion: Step 1: Trim the beef to remove all the fat. skin and remove the core from  the kidneys and chop into small pieces. Step 2: Brown the beef and kidneys in  hot oil. Step 3: Add the onions and cook 5 minutes. Step 4: Stir in the flour and  add the stock gradually. Step 5: Season with salt and pepper. Step 6: Add sauce and  bay leaf. Step 7: Transfer to a saucepan, cover and simmer 1 1/2 hours until  b  eef is tender. Step 8: Transfer to the pie dish. Step 9: Top steak and kidney with the pastry. Step 10: Cut  a design deeply into the pastry to allow the steam to escape. brush  with egg yolk and milk glaze. bake at 180 c for 35 minutes until the  beef is hot and the pastry is golden brown.

prompt: How do I make Rosy Applesauce?
completion: Step 1: Cut unpeeled but cored apples into chunks, place in large sauce pan. Step 2: Add 1/2 inch of water. Step 3: Stir in sugar, vanilla and cinnamon. Step 4: Heat to boiling, reduce to low and simmer, covered, until apples soften (about 30 min.)  press through a fine sieve or the fine disc of a food mill. Step 5: Taste and adjust seasoning. Step 6: Refrigerate.

prompt: How do I make Hainanese Chicken Rice?
completion: Step 1: Pound ginger and rub all over chicken. Step 2: Boil water, add chicken and boil for 15  minutes, cover pot tightly and turn heat off and let it cook slowly for 1 hour. Step 3: Turn on flame again, when it start to boil take out chicken and rinse it under  cold water, then set aside wash rice and drai n. Step 4: Heat oil and fry garlic and  celery for 2 minutes. Step 5: Add rice and stir until rice is covered with oil. Step 6: Pour in  broth and reduce heat to cook. Step 7: Mix all the sauce ingredients together to make  sauce.

prompt: How do I make Almond Chicken?
completion: Step 1: Marinate chicken for 20 minutes, drain and set aside. Step 2: Mix chopped almonds with  corn starch. Step 3: Beat egg white and dip in chicken. Step 4: Preheat oil to 350f in a deep fryer or large saucepan. Step 5: Roll chicken pieces in cornstarch mixture and deep fry until golden brown.

prompt: How do I make Chao Ga (Arroz Caldo)?
completion: Step 1: Heat oil and fried garlic, remove set aside. add onion and ginger and fry for 1  minute. add chicken and fry until chicken is golden brown. Step 2: Return 1/2 of fried  garlic to pot and all ingredients except green onions and simmer for 45 minutes. Step 3: Serve garnished with fried garlic and green onions. Step 4: Vietnamese style:  2 lbs. chicken, breasts and legs only  1 onion, cut in half  1 tsp. grated ginger  1 tsp. salt  2 1/2 cups rice, roasted  1/2 cup rau ram or coriander, chopped  4 green onions, chopped  6 pieces of dau chao quay, sliced  6 cups of water (more if necessary)  pepper, fish sauce to taste  fresh sprouts  g  rounded fresh red chilies  toast the rice and set aside. boil the chicken with water, salt and ginger.  when  well done remove chicken and pour roasted rice into the pot and simmer for 50 to  60 minutes. remove bone from chicken and shred the meat. to serve, put green  onions, chopped rau ram or coriander and sprouts in bottom of the bowl and pour  hot soup over so that the onions and herb are half cooked. eat with sliced dau  chao quay and add fish sauce, pepper or red chilies to taste.",

prompt: How do I make Chicken with Mushrooms?

Step 1: Divide the chicken breasts into two natural fillets.  place each between two sheets of plastic wrap and flatten to a thickness of 1/4 inch with a rolling pin. Step 2: Cut into 1 inch diagonal strips. Step 3: Heat the 2 tablespoons of the oil in a large frying pan and cook the onion and crushed garlic slowly until tender. Step 4: Add the mushrooms and cook them for another 5 minutes; remove and keep warm. Step 5: Increase the heat and add the reamining oil and fry the chicken very quickly, in small batches, for 3 to 4 minutes, until lightly colored.", 
"season each batch with a little salt and freshly ground black pepper. Step 6: Remove and keep warm on a plate while frying the rest of the chicken. Step 7: Add the sherry and lemon juice to the pan and quickly return the chicken, onions, garlic and mushrooms, stirring to coat. Step 8: Stir in the cream and bring to a boil. Step 9: Adjust the seasonings to taste. Step 10: Serve and enjoy.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Fritada?

prompt: How do I make Chicken in Tomato Gravy?

prompt: How do I make Chicken Chasseur?

prompt: How do I make Buttermilk Cornbread?

prompt: How do I make Braised Duck with Onion?

prompt: How do I make Caramel Topped Pecan Cheesecake?

Step 1: Preheat oven to 375f. Step 2: For the crust, place the cracker crumbs, Step 3: Butter and sugar in a small bowl, and toss with a fork. Step 8: Place a roasting pan or baking dish filled  with hot water on the bottom rack of the oven to create moisture.  for the cake filling, cream the cream cheese in a medium size mixing  bowl with an electric mixer  on medium speed for 1 minutes.", 
"scrape  the sides of the bowl. Step 9: Add brown sugar and beat on medium-high until  the cream cheese is fluffy, about 1 minute. scrape the bowl. Step 13: Add the pecans and mix to blend, 15 to 20 seconds. Step 14: Pour the  filling over the crust. bake the cake on the center oven rack until  the top is set, about 1 3/4 hours. Step 15: Remove from oven, allow to cool on  a wire rack for 1 1/2 hours, then refrigerate overnight.  two hours before serving the cake, prepare the topping.", 
"place the  brown sugar, cream and butter in a small saucepan over medium heat  and stir until the sugar is dissolved. "keep the cake at room temperature until ready to serve.

prompt: How do I make Kung Pao Chicken?

prompt: How do I make Bacon Biscuits?

prompt: How do I make Egg Kichelach?

prompt: How do I make Caprese?

prompt: How do I make Mushroom Alfredo?

prompt: How do I make Greek Chicken and Rice?

prompt: How do I make Chicken Teriyaki with Cashew Pineapple Rice?

Step 4: Pour the sauce  over the chicken and bake for 30-45 minutes until chicken is cooked through.

prompt: How do I make Feaver's Pumpkin Fudge?
completion: Step 1: In saucepan combine milk, sugar, syrup, pumpkin and salt. cook over medium heat  and when mixture begins to bubble, reduce heat to simmer and cook to soft ball  stage. remove from heat and beat in cinnamon, allspice, margarine and vanilla. Step 2: Allow to cool. Step 3: Then beat until thick and the mixture loses its gloss. Step 4: Spoon into buttered dish. Step 5: When firm, cut into squares.

prompt: How do I make Sylvia's Famous Spareribs?
completion:
Step 1: To make the ribs easier to handle, cut each slab between the middle bones  into  2 equal pieces. Step 2: Rub the salt, black pepper, and red pepper into both sides of   the  ribs. Step 3: Place the ribs in a deep baking dish, cover them, and refrigerate   overnight. preheat the oven to 450f. Step 4: Pour the vinegar over the ribs and bake 1  1/2  hours. Step 5: Rotate the ribs two or three times during baking and spoon some of  the pan  juices over them. Step 6: Remove the  ribs from the baking dish and place in a  single layer on baking  sheets.", 
"(line the baking sheets with aluminum foil for  easy cleanup.) bake at  450 f for 1 hour. Step 7: The ribs should be tender and well  browned. Step 8: This much can  be done up to a day in advance. cool the ribs, cover  tightly, and  refrigerate.  bring to room temperature for about 1 hour before  continuing. Step 9: To finish the ribs, preheat the oven to  400 f. Step 10: Cut the slabs  between the  bones  into individual ribs. Step 11: Place the ribs in a baking dish large  enough to hold  them  comfortably. Step 12: Spoon enough of the barbecue sauce over them  to coat lightly.", 
"cover the pan with aluminum foil and bake until heated  through, about 20  minutes. serve with additional barbecue sauce on the side. Step 13: Barbecue sauce   ruth developed this recipe because she found most barbecue sauces too  vinegary  or bitter, and it's the secret to our popular ribs. Step 14: Simple to  prepare and   absolutely delicious, once made and strained it keeps for quite a while, at   least  a month. Step 15: Combine all the ingredients in a heavy pot and heat just till hot. don't  bring  to  a boil or the sauce will turn dark and become thin.", 
"cool the sauce to room   temperature, strain it, and store it in a tightly covered jar in the   refrigerator.

prompt: How do I make Quick 'n' Tasty Alfredo Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Melt butter in saucepan and add sour cream slowly, stirring constantly. Step 2: Shake  in parmesan cheese while stirring until sauce thickens. Step 3: Add cracked pepper to  taste.  add optional crushed red pepper for a fiery twist.  pour over pasta & serve immediately. Step 4: This is enough sauce for two normal servings of pasta. Step 5: Recipe can be doubled,  tripled, etc. depending on servings.

prompt: How do I make Seafoam Cake?
completion: Step 1: Grease cake pan. Step 2: Line with waxed paper. Step 3: Mix, sift flour, sugar, and baking  powder 3 times. Step 4: Add gradually to  the egg whites, stirring after each addition. Step 5: Mix in the vanilla. Step 6: Pour into the pan. Step 7: Bake in oven at 350° for 35 - 45  minutes.

prompt: How do I make Homemade Cottage Cheese?
completion: Step 1: Heat the sour milk until it reaches 100*. Step 2: When it reaches this temp.,  pour into a strainer lined with cheese cloth. Step 3: Pour over 1 quart of  hot water. Step 4: Let curd hang in cheesecloth until all the whey has been  drained off. Step 5: In a mixing bowl, add enough cream and melted butter to  moisten the food. Step 6: Add salt.

prompt: How do I make Grandma Hornsby's Homemade Noodles?
completion: Step 1: Mix and sift flour and salt. gradually add the egg until a stiff  dough is formed. Step 2: Knead for a few minutes on floured board. Step 3: Roll out  until it is 1/8 inches thick. Step 4: Cut into any length strips and let dry  completely.

prompt: How do I make Gingerbread Man Cookies?
completion:
Step 1: In a small bowl combine flour, ginger, baking powder, cloves, cinnamon and nutmeg. Step 2: Set aside. in small saucepan heat over low heat (melt) margarine, sugars and molasses. Step 3: Pour in large bowl; cool for 10 minutes. Step 4: Alternately stir in flour mixture and 1/4 cup water until well blended. Step 5: Cover; chill an hour. Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Step 7: Roll out dough 1/8-inch thick, using 6-inch long cookie cutter. Step 8: Bake on sheet, sprayed with nonstick vegetable spray. Step 9: Decorate with raisins.", 
"bake 5 to 7 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Bruschetta?
completion: Step 1: Prepare the topping: cut the tomatoes in little cubes. Step 2: Add the salt, the oregano and the oil. Step 3: Rub the bread with garlic. Step 4: Then grill it (or on the barbecue). Step 5: Quickly spread the seasoned tomatoes and eat immediately. Step 6: (nice with grilled meat and red wine.)

prompt: How do I make Cheese and Onion Pie?
completion: Step 1: Layer onion slices, grated cheddar cheese and salt and pepper into prepared pie shell. Step 2: Continue layering until pie is heaped up.  cover with pastry. Step 3: Bake. Step 4: Let cool slightly before slicing.  can be eaten warm or cold.

prompt: How do I make Good Season's Italian Dressing?
completion: Step 1: "for dressing, mix 1/4 cup of cider vinegar, 2/3 cup of oil, 2 tablespoons of  water and 2 tablespoons of dry mix."

prompt: How do I make Peanut Patties?
completion: Step 1: Mix all of the ingredients in a heavy boiler (i use my 4 quart pressure cooker).  bring to a boil. Step 2: Turn burner to simmer and cook for 1 hour. Step 3: Remove from heat and  add 1 teaspoon vanilla. Step 4: Beat until creamy as it cools. Step 5: Beating is a must for it  to turn out right. spoon out into buttered muffin pan.

prompt: How do I make Bobbing Apple Punch?
completion: Step 1: In punch bowl mix orange juice -- apple cider, pineapple juice and sugar. Step 2: Chill a couple of hours. Step 3: Before serving add ginger ale, apples, orange slices and ice  cubes.

prompt: How do I make Lemon Squares?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven and lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch pan. Step 2: Mix together butter, powdered sugar, 2 cups flour and salt. Step 3: Pour into prepared pan. Step 4: Bake for 20 minutes. Step 5: Mix together eggs, lemon juice, sugar, lemon rind and 6 tbsp flour and pour over the first part. Step 6: Bake for 25 additional minutes.

prompt: How do I make Cabbage Roll Taste Alike?
completion: Step 1: Cook beef, onions , celery, and green pepper until done and brown. Step 2: Drain well. Step 3: Sprinkle meat mixture with oats, parsley, salt, and garlic powder. Step 4: Core cabbage  and cut into small wedges. Step 5: Place on meat. combine tomato sauce, vinegar, pepper and brown sugar. Step 6: Mix well. Step 7: Pour over cabbage and meat. cover and let simmer  20-30 minutes until the cabbage is done.  serve immediately. Step 8: Note: i like to  add 1/2 cup minute rice, prepared, at the end and heat through.

prompt: How do I make Buttermilk Dressing?
completion: Step 1: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil and lemon juice. Step 2: Whisk in the  buttermilk and parsley. Step 3: The dressing will keep, covered, in the refrigerator  for 3 days.

prompt: How do I make Feta Dressing?
completion: Step 1: Process the feta, vinegar and oregano in a blender or food processor until  smooth. Step 2: Then with the machine running, slowly pour the oil through the feed tube and  process until smooth. Step 3: Taste and adjust the seasoning with the salt and  pepper. Step 4: Use immediately or cover and refrigerate.

prompt: How do I make Dirk's Hot Sauce?
completion: Step 1: Blend the tomatoes, peppers, garlic, cilantro, and half the onion. Step 2: I like to  chop the other half by hand to make it chunkier. Step 3: Add salt and sugar to taste.

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Fudge?
completion: Step 1: In a 2 quart saucepan cook together sugar, pumpkin, spice, cornstarch and milk, stirring frequently, until mixture reaches 234 degrees on a candy thermometer or a small amount forms a soft ball in a little cold water. Step 2: Add vanilla and cool in a pan of ice water to 110 degrees. Step 3: Beat until fudge loses its gloss. Step 4: Pour into a lightly buttered 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan and cool. Step 5: Score and cut when almost cold. Step 6: Store in a wax paper lined metal can. Step 7: Will keep for several weeks. Step 8: If nuts are desired, mix in 1 cup of broken walnuts when the vanilla is added.

prompt: How do I make Baked Barbecue Sauce Chicken?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Melt margarine, fry onion until softened (about 5 minutes), add  remaining ingredients (except chicken)to onion and boil for 3 minutes. Step 3: Place skinned chicken pieces in a casserole dish, and pour sauce over. Step 4: Bake uncovered for 1 hour.

prompt: How do I make Creamy Turkey Pie?
completion:
Step 1: In a large skillet, cook ground turkey or turkey sausage, onion, pepper and salt, until meat is browned, stirring to break up meat. drain. Step 2: Stir in cream cheese till combined.  add mushrooms and set aside. Step 3: For the crust: lightly grease a 9 inch pie plate with non-stick spray.  unwrap crescent rolls and separate. arrange them in pie plate, pressing onto the bottom and up the sides of the plate, extending the biscuits at 1/2 inch intervals, if desired. Step 4: Spoon turkey mixture into shell, spreading evenly.", 
"in blender or food processor, combine egg, cottage cheese, and flour.  cover and blend or process until smooth.  spoon over turkey  mixture. Step 5: Bake, uncovered, for 25-30 minutes at 350 degrees fahrenheit or until edges are  browned and filling is set. let stand 5-10 minutes. Step 6: Cut into wedges and garnish with chopped tomatoes.

prompt: How do I make Caribbean Chicken?
completion: Step 1: Puree in blender lime juice, soy sauce, oil, hot pepper sauce, ginger, garlic,  thyme, pepper, allspice and salt. combine marinade with chicken in plastic  food-storage bag. Step 2: Seal. Step 3: Marinate in refrigerator overnight. place oven rack in  top position. Step 4: Heat oven to 500°f: Step 5: Drain chicken; discard marinade. pat dry. Step 6: Arrange in roasting pan. Step 7: Roast on top rack in 500°f: oven 25 minutes for breasts,  30 minutes for thighs and drumsticks, or until instant-read thermometer  registers 170°f: without touching bone.

prompt: How do I make Baked Acorn Squash With Spicy Maple Syrup?
completion: Step 1: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: Split the squash into thirds and remove the seeds. Step 3: Cut a slice off the bottom of each piece so that it sits evenly, skin-side down, in a 9 x 13-inch glass baking dish. Step 4: In the hollow of each piece, place 1 teaspoon unsalted butter, 1 tablespoon maple syrup, cinnamon and nutmeg to taste. bake in the heated oven until fork tender, about 45 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Sweet Potato Pie II?
completion: Step 1: Cream eggs and sugar. Step 2: Add sweet potato, vanilla flavoring and melted butter, mix then add milk.  mix well. Step 3: Pour into unbaked pie shells. Step 4: Bake for 1 hour at 350 degrees f. Step 5: Serves 8 for each pie.

prompt: How do I make Ramen Foo Yung?
completion:
Step 1: Open ramen package and remove seasoning packet, it will be retained for later. Step 2: Boil noodles until soft, and drain. Step 3: In a separate fry pan melt butter or margarine on medium-high heat. once melted and bubbling, add seasoning packet and stir. Step 4: Then add the drained noodles and fry them for several minutes, stirring and turning them as you go. Step 5: The noodles will start to separate from the clump as they get done.  they will be slightly turning golden brown. Step 6: In a separate bowl, scramble the two eggs.", 
"when noodles are slightly browned, add the eggs and stir thoroughly. Step 7: Reduce heat to medium-low immediately. Step 8: Flip and let the top cook. Step 9: Enjoy!

prompt: How do I make Red Capsicum Toasts?
completion:
Step 1: Cut capsicums in quarters, remove membrane and seeds. Step 2: Grill capsicum, skin side  up, until skin blackens and blisters; peel skins from them. Step 3: Finely chop  capsicum. Step 4: Heat oil in pan, stir in peppers and sugar, cook over low heat,  covered, for about 45 minutes or until capsicums are soft, stirring  occasionally. Step 5: Stir in wine and vinegar, bring to the boil, simmer, uncovered  for about 15 minutes or until thick, remove from heat; strain, cool then stir in the basil. Step 6: Remove the crusts and cut  the bread into 2 1/2cm squares, place on an ungreased oven tray and bake in a moderate oven about 10 minutes or until  lightly browned, cool.", 
"spoon capsicum mixture onto toast squares, top with lime  wedges. Step 7: The capsicum and toasts can be made a day ahead of time.

prompt: How do I make Rhubarb Crunch?
completion: Step 1: Mix  flour, rolled oats, brown sugar, margarine and cinnamon until crumbly:   press half of this mixture into a 9\" greased pan. Step 2: Cover with  chopped rhubarb. Step 3: Combine sugar, cornstarch,   and water. Step 4: Cook until thick and clear in a small saucepan. Step 5: Remove from heat and add vanilla. Step 6: Pour over rhubarb. top with remaining crumbs. Step 7: Bake at 350°f for 1 hour.

prompt: How do I make Orange Bread?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease a loaf pan. Step 2: Cut two oranges into small pieces, peelings and all. Step 3: Cover with cold water and boil until tender, about 10 minutes. Step 4: Add a scant cup of sugar, stir and let cool. Step 5: Put in a bowl aqnd add remaining ingredients. Step 6: Bake for one hour or until tests done.

prompt: How do I make Orange Butterscotch Walnut Clusters?
completion: Step 1: Blend sugar with pudding. Step 2: Mix in a 2 quart saucepan; stir in evaporated milk and orange rind. Step 3: Add butter. Step 4: Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil. Step 5: Lower heat and boil gently for 3 1/2 minutes, stirring constantly. Step 6: Remove from heat  and stir in walnuts. Step 7: Beat until candy thickens. Step 8: Drop from a teaspoon onto foil  or into paper candy cups. Step 9: Let cool until set.

prompt: How do I make Fried Rice Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Mix all ingredients together in a casserole. Step 3: Cover and bake 1 hour.

prompt: How do I make Pierogi Dough?
completion:
Step 1: Mix with enough water to make like a bread dough. Step 2: Cover with plastic wrap or lid and let sit overnight. Step 3: In a medium bowl, whisk the eggs. Step 4: Add the salt, water, and oil; whisk until smooth. Step 5: Slowly add about 3 cups flour, and stir with a wooden spoon to combine. Step 6: Turn dough out onto a well-floured surface, and work in about 1 cup flour as you knead. Step 7: Use a plastic scraper to lift the dough as it will stick to the counter before the flour is worked inches Step 8: Continue kneading for about 8 to 10 minutes, working in another 1/2 cup flour.", 
"the dough should be elastic and no longer sticky. Step 9: Be careful not to add too much flour as this will toughen the dough. Step 10: Place dough in a lightly floured bowl, and cover with plastic wrap; set aside while you prepare the filling of your choice. Step 11: When you're ready to fill your pierogies, lay a clean linen towel on your counter, and evenly distribute cornmeal on it to prevent sticking. Step 12: On a floured surface, roll out dough to about 1/8-inch thickness. Step 13: Using a 2 1/2-inch-diameter glass or cookie cutter, cut out as many circles as possible.", 
"gather dough scraps together, roll out again, and continue cutting. Step 14: Place a teaspoon of your chosen filling in the center of each dough circle. Step 15: Holding a circle in your hand, fold dough over filling, and pinch the edges, forming a thoroughly sealed crescent. Step 16: Transfer to linen towel. Step 17: Continue until all dough circles are filled. Step 18: Add pierogi to the boiling water in batches. Step 19: They will sink to the bottom of the pot, then rise to the top. Step 20: Once they rise, let them cook for about 1 minute more.", 
"meanwhile, drizzle platter with melted butter. Step 21: Remove pierogi from pot, and transfer to platter to prevent sticking. Step 22: Serve immediately.

prompt: How do I make Butter Tart Slice?
completion: Step 1: Mix and press into an 8\" pan. Step 2: Bake for 15 minutes at 350 degrees. Step 3: 1/3 cup melted margarine 1 tsp. Step 4: Vanilla 1 tbsp flour 1 cup brown sugar 2 tbsp milk 1 cup raisins 1 egg, beaten mix and pour over bottom layer. Step 5: Bake 20-30 minutes at 350 degrees.

prompt: How do I make Butter Tarts?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 425°f. Step 2: Prepare muffin pans by rolling out pie dough and cutting 4-inch circles; fit dough circles into muffin cups; set aside in fridge until ready to fill. Step 3: In a large bowl, using a wooden spoon, mix together the soft butter, brown sugar, salt and corn syrup; stir well until sugar is dissolved and butter is creamed. Step 4: Add vinegar, eggs and vanilla and mix well. Step 5: Divide butter mixture into all tarts, not filling more than 2/3 full. Step 6: Bake at 425f for 5 minutes; reduce heat to 375f and continue baking for 15 to 20 minutes (filling will be lightly browned but still bubbling).", 
"let cooked butter tarts cool in pans for 10 minutes after removing from oven; then remove and place on racks until completely cool.

prompt: How do I make Butter Tarts II?
completion:
Step 1: Melt butter and pour over sugar. Step 2: Beat well. Step 3: Beat egg yolks and mix with all ingredients. Step 4: Beat egg whites and fold in last. line miniature muffin pans (or use regular ones) with rich pie crust. put filling in and bake at 350 degrees for 35 min-  utes. Step 5: (i always halve this recipe and it makes a lot of butter tarts.) Step 6: Butter tarts pastry for tarts: 5 cup flour 1 tsp. salt 1 tbsp sugar 1 tsp. baking powder 2 cup shortening 1 egg 1 tbsp vinegar 1 tsp. vanilla Step 7: Mix dry ingredients; add shortening and mix well.", 
"beat the egg in a measuring  cup; add enough lukewarm water to make 3/4 cup liquid. Step 8: Add vanilla and vinegar  to this liquid, then mi x into flour, shortening mixture. treat as pie crust. cut into circles and place in muffin tins. Step 9: Fill with: 2 eggs 2 tbsp vinegar 1 tsp. vanilla 2 cup brown sugar (pack) 1 1/2 cup raisins 1/2 cup melted margarine Step 10: Beat eggs in bowl. Step 11: Add brown sugar, vinegar and vanilla. Step 12: Stir in melted butter  and raisins. Step 13: Pour in shells about 1/2 full. Step 14: Bake in 350 degrees oven for 15 to  18 minutes.", 
"makes about 24 to 30 tarts.

prompt: How do I make Velveeta Cheese Fudge?
completion: Step 1: Melt cheese and butter in saucepan over low heat, stirring almost constantly. Step 2: Sift sugar and cocoa together, stir into cheese butter mixture. Step 3: Stir in vanilla and nuts. Step 4: Spread in buttered pans, cool, cut into squares and store in tightly covered tin or container.

prompt: How do I make Pizzelle Waffle Cones?
completion: Step 1: Beat the eggs and  gradually  beat  in  the  sugar  until the mixture is creamy. Step 2: Stir in the melted butter and vanilla. Step 3: Combine the flour and baking powder, and  then  add  it to the mixture.  blend it in well. Step 4: Drop about 4 tsp  of  the   batter  into  a  heated  pizelle iron, and cook both sides over medium-high   heat for about 1  minute  each,  or  until  golden  brown. Step 5: Remove  the  waffle   from  the  pizelle  iron  and  immediately shape it into a cone while it is  still  pliable.

prompt: How do I make Dot's Creamy Fudge?

prompt: How do I make Mrs. Field's Lemon Macadamia Cookies?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 300* f. Step 2: In a medium bowl combine flour, soda and  salt. mix well and set aside. in a large bowl blend sugars well with  an  electric mixer set at  med speed. Step 3: Add the butter and cream cheese,  and mix to form a smooth paste. add the egg and lemon extract, and  beat at medium speed until light and soft.  scrape down sides of bowl  occasionally. Step 4: Add the flour mixture and nuts. Step 5: Blend  at low speed just  until combined. Step 6: Do not overmix. Step 7: Drop by rounded tablespoons  onto  ungreased cookie sheets, 2 inches apart. bake 23-25 min.", 
"immediately   transfer to a cool flat surface.

prompt: How do I make Hush Puppies?

Step 3: Drop batter by rounded  teaspoonfuls into deep hot fat (375 degrees). Step 4: Cook, turning frequently, about 3  - 5 minutes, until golden brown.

prompt: How do I make Southern Spoon Bread?
completion:
Step 1: Heat oven to 350 f and grease or oil a shallow 2 quart pan  (i use my \"small\" pyrex lasagna pan). mix cornmeal, sugar, baking powder and salt in a medium saucepan. Step 2: Stir in the milk and cook over a medium heat until milk is absorbed, which only takes a few minutes. Step 3: Stir gently but constantly to prevent the mixture from catching on the bottom of the saucepan. Step 4: Remove from heat.  stir in the butter, and slightly beaten egg yolks. Step 5: Beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Step 6: Fold into cornmeal mixture, and turn it all out into the prepared 2 quart pan.", 
"bake for 35 minutes, or until puffed and golden. Step 7: I hope this is what you are looking for! regards, spooky

prompt: How do I make Virginia Spoon Bread?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375° and grease a 8x8x2-inch baking pan. Step 2: Stir cornmeal  and grits into water very slowly over low heat until the mixture is thick and  smooth. Step 3: Stir frequently, it will take about 30 minutes. Step 4: Beat in the butter,  cream and salt, then the egg yolks. Step 5: Whip egg whites until soft peaks form and  fold into cornmeal. Step 6: Pour into prepared pan  and bake for 30 minutes, or until  puffed and lightly browned. Step 7: •serving ideas : serve immediately with lots of butter.

prompt: How do I make Texas Spoon Bread?
completion:
Step 1: In saucepan, scald the milk; stir in cornmeal. Step 2: Reduce heat; simmer 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Step 3: Remove from heat; stir in butter, sugar, salt and baking powder. Step 4: In small bowl, beat egg yolks. Step 5: Gradually stir a small amount of the hot mixture into yolks; return all to pan and mix well. Step 6: In mixing bowl, beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Step 7: Fold egg whites into hot mixture until well blended. Step 8: Pour into greased 8-inch square baking dish. Step 9: Bake at 350° for 40-45 minutes or until well puffed.", 
"use a spoon to serve.

prompt: How do I make Jade Tree Salad Dressing?
completion: Step 1: Mix first seven ingredients together and refrigerate. Step 2: Immediately before serving, add 1/2  cup parmesan cheese and 1/4 cup sesame seed. Step 3: Serve on lettuce with chopped water chestnuts. Step 4: Note: i usually add the cheese and sesame seed directly to the salad, so as not to spoil the dressing for later use.

prompt: How do I make Harvard Beets?
completion: Step 1: Combine sugar, cornstarch, butter, water and vinegar. Step 2: Cook until smooth and thick. Step 3: Add beets. Step 4: Heat thoroughly and  serve while hot.

prompt: How do I make Harvard Beets (Sweet Sour Red Beets)?

(can marinate in fridge overnight or just while you prepare other dishes). Step 5: Before serving, heat to boiling point and add butter. Step 6: Serve warm.

prompt: How do I make Colorado Beef Stroganoff?
completion: Step 1: Trim fat from beef and cut into 1/2-inch slices. Step 2: Over high heat sear the beef  quickly in 1 tablespoon butter. Step 3: In 3 tablespoons butter (same pan) saute onion,  garlic and mushrooms about 5 minutes. Step 4: Remove from heat. stir in flour, meat  extract paste, catsup, salt and pepper. Step 5: Stir until smooth. Step 6: Gradually add  bouillon, stirring constantly bring to a boil. Step 7: Reduce heat and simmer for 5  minutes. Step 8: Over very low heat, add wine, dill and sour cream. Step 9: Add beef, simmer  only until beef is hot. serve over wild rice. serves 6.

prompt: How do I make Minnesota State Fair Corn Dogs?
completion: Step 1: Other:   10 bamboo skewers, soaked in water heat oil to 350 degrees. Step 2: In a bowl, combine cornmeal, salt, honey and   boiling  water. Step 3: Mix. Step 4: In a separate bowl, beat together egg, milk and   butter. Step 5: Add egg  mixture to cornmeal mixture. sift together flour and   baking powder, then  incorporate it into the mix until smooth. Step 6: Insert   stick into hot dogs, dip in  batter, and place in a preheated fryer   until golden brown - approximately  eight to 10 minutes. Step 7: Drain, and  serve.

prompt: How do I make Lemon Poppy Seed Cake?
completion: Step 1: Mix above ingredients together until smooth. Step 2: Bake in a loaf pan or bundt pan 45 minutes at 350°f. Step 3: Cool 5 minutes. Step 4: Remove from pan and glaze with mixture  of 5 tablespoons lemon juice and 1/2 cup sugar. Step 5: Jen.

prompt: How do I make Molasses Taffy?
completion: Step 1: Combine first 4 ingredients. Step 2: Boil until it reaches the brittle or crack stage. when just about ready to remove from the stove, add the pinch of soda. Step 3: Cool on platter until able to touch it. butter your hands and pull until it is light in color. Step 4: Cut into sticks (if still able to do anything!) lots of fun for a party. Step 5: A family oriented website    http://home.sprynet.com/~jmjohnsn      seasonal page topic - fall foliage

prompt: How do I make Basic Tea Biscuits?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Step 2: Combine dry ingredients. Step 3: Cut in shortening with two knives or a pastry  blender until mixture resembles coarse cornmeal. Step 4: Make a well in the centre  and add liquid all at once. stir vigorously until dough comes freely from  the sides of the bowl. Step 5: Turn dough onto a lightly floured board and roll or  pat to 1/2-inch thick. Step 6: Cut out 2-inch biscuits with a floured water glass  or biscuit cutter. Step 7: Place on an ungreased baking sheet. bake for 12 to 15  minutes, until tops are golden brown.", 
"serve immediately with butter, jam or  honey. Step 8: Variations:  cheese tea biscuits  use only 3/4 tsp salt and 1/4 cup shortening. Step 9: Add 3/4 cup shredded cheese (yellow or marble) to dry ingredients. Step 10: Buttermilk tea biscuits  use only 2 tsp baking powder  add 1/2 tsp baking soda  replace milk with 1 cup   buttermilk or sour milk. Step 11: Raisin or nut tea biscuits  add to dry ingredients  1/4 cup sugar; and  3/4 cup seedless raisins or chopped nuts  use only 7/8 cup milk  whole wheat tea biscuits  replace 1 cup of white flour with 1 cup whole wheat flour.

prompt: How do I make English Cream Scones?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Step 2: Combine dry ingredients. Step 3: Cut in shortening with two knives or a pastry blender until mixture has the consistency of coarse cornmeal. Step 4: Set aside. reserve a little of the egg whites (to brush over tops of scones) and beat eggs until light. stir in milk. Step 5: Make a well in the dry ingredients and add liquid all at once, stirring with a fork vigorously until dough comes freely from the sides of the bowl. Step 6: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and pat dough out to 3/4-inch thickness.", 
"cut into 8 triangles or squares or form into \"biscuits\". Step 7: Brush tops with egg whites and sprinkle generously with sugar. Step 8: Place on an ungreased baking sheet. bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until tops are golden. Step 9: Variations: raisin scones add to dry ingredients 1/2 cup seedless raisins, currants, craisins or other fruits (fresh blueberries or raspberries, apple chunks etc). cheese scones reduce sugar to 1 tsp add 1 cup of shredded sharp cheese to dry ingredients. Step 10: Do not sprinkle with sugar before baking.

prompt: How do I make Prize Butter Tarts?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°f. Step 2: Prepare pastry dough; cut in circles and line 3-inch tart pans with pastry circles. Step 3: Combine balance of ingredients. Step 4: Spoon mixture into unbaked pastry lined pans, filling each no more than 2/3 full (if the filling bubbles over it makes one heck of a mess!). bake for 20 minutes or until filling has cooked and pastry is golden. Step 5: Notes: this can be made without the raisins or nuts, but  they are very plain. Step 6: I generally make these with a combination of nuts and raisins.", 
"craisins can be substituted for the raisins. Step 7: For jam tarts: line tart pan cups with pastry. Step 8: Fill cups 1/2 full with your choice of jam. Step 9: Bake at 400°f for 20 minutes or until pastry is golden.

prompt: How do I make Nurnberger?
completion: Step 1: Heat honey to boiling in sauce pan. Step 2: Cool. Step 3: Stir in sugar, egg, lemon juice and rind. Step 4: Stir together flour, soda, and spices. Step 5: Mix into honey mixture. stir in citron and nuts. Step 6: Chi ll in plastic wrap overnite.  heat oven to 350 deg. Step 7: Shape into 1 inch balls and flatten. Step 8: Place on greased baking sheet. press almond halves into cookes and cherry slice into center. Step 9: Bake just until set 10-12 minutes. Step 10: Glaze while warm. Step 11: Glaze:  stir ingredients until smooth. Step 12: Store in air tight container and let mellow.

prompt: How do I make Caribbean Key Lime Pie?
completion:
Step 1: To prepare crust, place coconut in thin layer on 2 (10 x 13-inch) cookie sheets. Step 2: Toast coconut in 350 degrees oven for 10 minutes or until light golden brown. Step 3: Stir frequently, and watch carefully. Step 4: Remove from oven and let cool. Step 5: Meanwhile,  reduce the oven to 250 degrees. Step 6: In small mixing bowl, beat egg whites to stiff  peaks, then slowly beat in superfine sugar until completely dissolved. Step 7: Fold in  cooled coconut. press this mixture into greased 9-inch pie plate and bake at 250  degrees for 7 minutes and set. remove from oven and let cool.", 
"to make filling: Step 8: Blend together sweetened  condensed milk, lime juice, lime rind and rum in large  mixing bowl. Step 9: Beat in the egg yolks. Step 10: Gently mix in sour cream to combine well. Step 11: Pour into cooled crust. swirl meringue over top of filling. Step 12: Bake in 350 degrees  oven 20 minutes or until meringue is nicely browned. Step 13: Cool, then chill at least  30 minutes before serving. Step 14: To make meringue: Step 15: Beat egg whites in large mixing bowl until soft peaks are formed. Step 16: Gradually beat  in sugar until whites are stiff, but not dry, being sure the sugar is dissolved.

prompt: How do I make Coconut Haystacks?

prompt: How do I make Coconut Haystacks II?

prompt: How do I make Fresh Rhubarb Pie?

Step 1: Roll half of pastry to 1/8-inch thickness on a lightly floured surface.  place in a 9-inch pie plate; trim off excess pastry along edges. Step 2: Cover with plastic wrap, and chill until ready to fill. Step 3: Combine sugar, cornstarch and nutmeg in a heavy saucepan, stirring to blend cornstarch well. Step 7: Spoon rhubarb mixture into prepared pastry shell. Step 8: Roll remaining pastry to 1/4-inch thickness; cut into 1/2-inch strips.", 
"arrange strips, lattice fashioned, across top of pie.  trim strips even with edges; fold edges under and flute.  bake at 425°f or 10 minutes. Step 9: Reduce heat to 350°f and bake an additional 30 minutes or until crust is brown. Step 10: Enjoy!

prompt: How do I make Buttertart Squares?

prompt: How do I make Buttery Drop Cookies?
completion:
Step 1: Heat oven to 375°f. Step 2: Grease baking sheet. Step 3: Combine butter flavor crisco, sugar and milk  in medium bowl. Step 4: Beat at medium speed of electric mixer until well blended. Step 5: Beat in egg and vanilla; beat until blended. Step 6: Combine flour, salt and baking powder. Step 7: Mix into creamed mixture at low speed until just blended. Step 8: Drop by level tablespoonfuls of dough 2-inches apart onto baking sheet. Step 9: Bake at 375°f for 7-9 minutes or until set. Step 10: Cool 2 minutes on baking sheet.  remove to cooling rack.", 
"there are several variations that can be used with these cookies such as frosting them as wreaths or ornaments for the holiday season. Step 11: Using a chocolate frosting between two cookies for a sandwich. Step 12: Or dipping 1/2 of the cookie into chocolate frosting then into nuts. Step 13: Note: for larger cookies, drop by tablespoonfuls of dough into a mound for each cookie.  place 3-inches apart on baking sheet.  bake at 375°f for 11-13 minutes, or until set.  cool 2 minutes on baking sheet. remove to cooling rack.

prompt: How do I make Chi Chi's Sweet Corn Cake?

Step 1: With an electric mixer, beat butter until fluffy. Step 2: Gradually beat in masa  harina. Step 3: On low speed, beat in water. Step 4: Place corn in bowl of food processor and  pulse until chopped coarsely. Step 5: Stir in masa mixture. in a small bowl, stir  together sugar, cornmeal,cream, baking powder, and salt. stir into corn  mixture. spread in a greased 8\" sq. Step 6: Baking pan. Step 7: Cover with foil. Step 8: Place in a  larger pan and pour boiling water half way up the side of the smaller pan. "sprinkle with chilies and parsley, if desired.

prompt: How do I make African Ginger Cake?
