prompt: How do I make Zucchini Puff Pies?
completion:
Step 1: Steam marrow until tender. Step 2: Puree marrow in blender / food processor. Step 3: Saute onions in minced garlic in butter until tender. Step 4: Shred cheddar cheese. add onions, garlic, cheese, bread crumbs, eggs and herbs to zucchini. Step 5: Thaw frozen puff pastry 20 minutes. Step 6: Roll out each sheet on slightly floured board. Step 7: Divide each sheet into 4 squares. Step 8: Fill each of the 8 squares with marrow mixture leaving 1-inch border on all sides. Step 9: Brush border with egg white; prick top with fork. Step 10: Place pies on cookie sheet and bake in 400f oven for 30 minutes or till golden brown.", 
"serve warm. Step 11: See cheese puff pies for frozen puff pastry directions.

prompt: How do I make Crisco Cookies?
completion: Step 1: Cream crisco and sugar together; add egg. Step 2: Sift soda, cream of tartar and flour together. Step 3: Add vanilla. Step 4: Form into balls the size of walnuts. Step 5: Roll in sugar; place on cookie  sheet. press down with thumb. Step 6: Bake at 350° for 12-15 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Crisco Cookies II?
completion: Step 1: Mix 4 1/2 cups of flour with 6 eggs. Step 2: Add 1/2 can of crisco plus remainder of ingredients. Step 3: Don't work dough too much. Step 4: Flatten dough and use cookie cutters. Step 5: Bake in 350 degrees oven until beige or tan on bottom, approximately 10-12 minutes. Step 6: Cool at room temperature and add frosting. Step 7: Frosting: mix powdered sugar with milk until it looks pasty. Step 8: Dip top of cookie in and add sprinkles.

prompt: How do I make Buttermilk Banana Chiffon Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Grease two (2) 8-inch round pans well and dust with flour. Step 2: Beat egg whites until  fluffy. Step 3: Gradually beat in 1/3 cup of sugar. Step 4: Beat until very stiff and glossy. Step 5: In another bowl stir remaining sugar, flour, baking powder, soda and salt. Step 6: Add oil, bananas, half of buttermilk and vanilla. Step 7: Mix well for 1 minute at  medium speed on mixer. Step 8: Add remaining buttermilk and egg yolks. Step 9: Beat another  minute. fold in beaten egg whites and nuts. Step 10: Pour in prepared pans. Step 11: Bake at  350°f for 30-35 minutes.", 
"frost with cream cheese frosting.

prompt: How do I make Kraft Caramel Popcorn Balls?
completion: Step 1: Melt caramels with water over low heat, stirring until smooth. Step 2: Pour over popped corn; toss until well coated. Step 3: With hands slightly moistened with cold water, form into balls.

prompt: How do I make Blackberry Pie?
completion: Step 1: Use 2 bowls. Step 2: In one bowl mix berries and 2/3 cup of sugar. Step 3: Melt butter in  microwave. mix butter with berries and sugar mixture. in second bowl mix flour  and sugar; then slowly add milk. Step 4: Mix well. Step 5: Pour berry mixture into 2 quart  casserole dish, top with batter mixture. bake 45 minutes in 400 degrees oven or  until golden brown. Step 6: Serves 4 to 6 people. may be topped with favorite whipped  topping.

prompt: How do I make Beef Stroganoff with Dill?
completion:
Step 1: Cut meat into 1/4\" strips and brown in butter. Step 2: In a separate pan, saute mushrooms and add to meat. in the separate pan, saute onions and add to meat mixture. add beef stock. Step 3: Cover and simmer 1 hour. Step 4: At about 40 min., begin to cook noodles. Step 5: Mix corn starch and water in small container and add, stirring rapidly until sauce is thickened. Step 6: Stir in sour cream and dill weed. Step 7: Serve over paprika noodles: drain noodles and p ut in bowl. Step 8: Toss gently with chicken stock base, butter, and paprika.", 
"note: chicken stock base or granular boullion may be very salty. Step 9: Let diners salt and pepper to their own tastes. Step 10: Robert boston http://home.earthlink.net/~bboston/

prompt: How do I make Creamy Dark Chocolate Fudge?
completion: Step 1: In a heavy saucepan, over low heat, melt chips and miniature marshmallows with sweetened condensed milk and salt. remove from heat; stir in nuts and vanilla. Step 2: Spread evenly into wax paper-lined 8 or 9-inch square pan. Step 3: Chill for 2 hours or until firm. Step 4: Turn fudge onto cutting board; peel off paper and cut into squares. Step 5: Store loosely covered at room temperature.

prompt: How do I make Cookie Icing?

prompt: How do I make Peanut Butter Squares?
completion:

Step 5: Bake in  a 350 degrees oven for 20 to 25 minutes. Step 6: While still hot, sprinkle with 6 ounces of chocolate chips. Step 7: Spread over top. Step 10: Peanut butter squares 1 (18 oz.) crunchy peanut butter 1 cup margarine 2 1/2 cup graham cracker crumbs 1 box powdered sugar 1 tsp.",

Step 11: Mix well. Step 12: Then press  into square pan. Step 13: Topping: melt over very low heat chocolate chips and 1/2 cup   margarine and stir thoroughly. Step 14: Spread over peanut mixture. let cool, then cut  into squares.

prompt: How do I make East-West Flank Steak Wraps?
completion:
Step 1: In large bowl, combine dressi ng ingredients; whisk until blended. Step 2: Place beef  steak in plastic bag; add 3/4 of dressing, turning to coat. close bag securely  and marinate in refrigerator 10 minutes. Step 3: Meanwhile add coleslaw mix, green onions, salt and pepper to remaining 1/4 of dressing  in bowl; toss. Step 4: Set aside. wrap tortillas in aluminum foil. Step 5: Remove steak from  dressing; discard dressing. Step 6: Place steak on grid over medium, ash-covered coals. Step 7: Grill, uncovered, 17 to 21 minutes fro medium rare to medium doneness, turning  once. a few minutes before steak is done, place tortilla packet on grid near  edge of grill to heat. remove steak from grill; let rest 2 to 3 minutes.", 
"season  steak with salt and pepper, as desired; carve diagonally into thin slices. Step 8: To  assemble, layer an equal amount of beef, coleslaw mixture and the peanuts down center of each tortilla. Step 9: Fold bottom edge of tortilla up over  filling. Step 10: Fold right and left sides to center, overlapping edges. Step 11: Garnish with  green onion and  peanuts, if desired. Step 12: Tip: to broil, place steak on rack in broiler pan so surface of meat is 2 to 3  inches from heat. broil 13 to 18 minutes, turning once. thinly sliced green  cabbage may be substituted for packaged coleslaw mix.

prompt: How do I make Almond Creme Brulee?
completion: Step 1: Heat cream in a heavy saucepan. Step 2: Add granulated sugar and stir until  dissolved. Step 3: Beat egg yolks until light and creamy. Step 4: Add t  he hot cream to the  egg yolks gradually, whipping constantly with a wire whisk (not an electric  beater). stir in remaining ingredients except the brown sugar. Step 5: Pour into  a 6-cup souffle dish, and sprinkle brown sugar on top. Step 6: Bake at 325 degrees  for 45 minutes, or until custard tests done.   - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  notes : this is not for anyone on a low cal, low fat, or low cholesterol  diet.

prompt: How do I make Poppy Seed Cake?

Step 1: Mix poppy seeds and buttermilk together, and let stand in refrigerator for several hours or overnight.  sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.  cream butter and 1 1/2 cups sugar; beat in eggs, one at a time; beat in vanilla and grated orange rind. Step 2: Stir in flour mixture alternately with buttermilk mixture in about 4 additions of each, stirring until just smooth. Step 3: Spoon half of batter into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Step 4: Mix remaining sugar and cinnamon together and sprinkle mixture over batter.", 
"pour rest of batter into the pan. Step 5: Bake in 350°f oven for about 1 hour, or until a wooden pick comes out clean. Step 6: Cool in pan for 15 minutes, then turn out to finish cooling. Step 7: Cover tightly and let season for a day or two for best flavor.

prompt: How do I make Delicious Pizza Sauce?

prompt: How do I make Low-Fat Apple Cake?

prompt: How do I make Pork and Chicken Adobo?

Step 8: Reduce heat to = low, simmer covered until pork and chicken are tender, about 30 minutes.emove pork and chicken with slotted spoon, draining well.",

prompt: How do I make Coca Cola Cake?

Step 10: Cool before serving.

prompt: How do I make Jenny's Chicken Stuffed Stromboli?
completion:
Step 1: In a cup dissolve 1 pack of yeast in 4 tablespoons of warm (but not hot) water. Step 2: Allow to proof (sit) for 10 minutes. Step 3: In another cup, mix together 12  tablespoons of cold water, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, 1 teaspoon of salt and 1  tablespoon of honey. Step 4: Add the wet ingredients (cold stuff first) to 3 cups of  flour and mix (i sometimes use a food  processor, but you can use your hands.)    allow the dough to rise.  personally, i make the dough the night before i need  it, put it in the refrigerator overnight, and let it rise the next day (all  day.)  but as long as you let it rise at least 2 hours, it should be ok.", 
"saute onion with a little olive oil until vaguely transparent.  add chicken and  cook until just not salmonella city - pink inside is ok because it will also  cook inside the stromboli. Step 5: Add green peppers at last minutes and just warm  through to take the edge off (i like mine crunchy, so cook as long as you think  they need to). roll out pizza dough on a floured board until its about the shape and size of a pizza pan. Step 6: Lay the dough on a nonstick pizza pan or a cookie  sheet. layer the chicken, tomato, onion, peppers on one half of the dough.", 
"sprinkle cheese overtop and flop the rest of the dough and seal- use a fork to  crimp the edges if necessary. Step 7: As for cooking, i set the oven at 500 degrees. Step 8: Stuff the stromboli and place it on a cookie sheet greased with olive oil. Step 9: I  usually coat the stromboli with an egg wash, oregano, and pretzel (or kosher)  salt.  the egg wash will make it brown nicely. Step 10: The other stuff is just for  taste.  there is no set time to cook it.  just keep checking it after about 1 2  minutes. Step 11: When the bottom is brown, it's done.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Corn Chowder?

prompt: How do I make Philadelphia Scrapple?

Step 2: Drain, reserving 3-quarts cooking liquid. Step 3: Grind meat fine; bring reserved liquid to a boil. Step 4: Add sage, marjoram and black pepper. Step 5: Gradually stir cornmeal and then flour into the boiling broth. Step 6: Add meat, then reduce heat to low; cook for 30 minutes, stirring frequently. Step 7: Pour into 2 loaf pans; chill until firm. Step 8: To serve, slice and fry until brown.

prompt: How do I make Orange Blossom Muffins?

Step 7: Bake at 400 degrees for 20 to 25 minutes. Step 8: Makes 1 dozen.

prompt: How do I make Rhubarb Squares?
completion: Step 1: Combine flour and powdered sugar; cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Step 2: Press into the bottom of a greased 11-inch x 7-inch x 2-inch baking pan. Step 3: Bake at 350 degrees f for 12 minutes. Step 4: For filling, combine the first four ingredients in a bowl. Step 8: Store in refrigerator.

prompt: How do I make Sweet Pepper Sauce for Pasta?

prompt: How do I make Alice's Doughnuts?
completion:
Step 1: In a large bowl, beat the eggs until foamy. Step 2: Gradually add sugar, beating constantly. Step 3: Stir in the milk, shortening and vanilla. Step 4: Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt. add to the liquid mixture,mixing well. Step 5: Cover and chill the dough for 30 min.-1 hour for easier handling. Step 6: Preheat oven to 450 d egrees. Step 7: Spray a baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray. Step 8: Roll out and pat the dough on a lightly floured board to a 1/2\" thickness. Step 9: Cut with a doughnut cutter. Step 10: Place the doughnuts and holes on the baking sheet, about 1\" apart. bake for 10-15 min.", 
"or until golden brown. Step 11: Brush each doughnut and hole with melted butter and roll in cinnamon-sugar mixture to coat all sides. Step 12: Cinnamon-sugar: 1 cup sugar 1 teaspoon cinnamon, in a small bowl, combine; blending well.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Fried Rice II?
completion: Step 1: Combine chicken, soy sauce and 1/2 teaspoon salt. let stand 15 minutes. Step 2: Cook  rice in hot oil in skillet over medium heat until golden brown; stir   frequently. Step 3: Reduce heat, add chicken with soy sauce and broth. Step 4: Simmer, covered, 20 to 25  minutes, or until rice is tender. Step 5: Remove cover last few minutes. Step 6: Stir in onion,  green pepper and celery. Step 7: Cook uncovered over medium heat until liquid is  absorbed. Step 8: Push rice mixture to sides of skillet. add eggs; cook until almost  set. blend into rice mixture. stir in lettuce; serve at once with soy sauce.

prompt: How do I make Sesame Chicken with Honey Dip?
completion: Step 1: Mix mayonnaise, dry mustard and minced onion; set aside. mix crumbs and sesame seeds. Step 2: Coat chicken with mayonnaise mixture, then crumb mixture. place on baking sheet. bake at 425 degrees for 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Step 3: Serve hot with dip. Step 4: Honey dip: 1 cup mayonnaise 2 tbsp. honey mix ingredients.

prompt: How do I make Apple Strawberry Cobbler?
completion: Step 1: Combine sugar, flour, lemon rind and cinnamon. Step 2: Stir in apples, strawberries and  lemon juice. spread mixture in 8-inch square baking dish and bake in 400 degree  oven for 10 minutes. Step 3: Topping: in bowl, mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and  salt. cut in butter until crumbly. Step 4: With fork, stir in buttermilk until soft  dough forms. Step 5: Drop by spoonfuls onto fruit. bake 35 to 40 minutes or until top is golden and biscuits are cooked through.

prompt: How do I make Brunch Eggs?

Step 6: Pour sauce into greased 9x13-inch pan. Step 7: Break eggs on top of sauce. crumble and sprinkle on bacon. Step 8: Bake 20 minutes at 350  or until eggs are set. spoon 1 egg and sauce on a toasted muffin half.

prompt: How do I make Mr. Walker's Feta Burger?
completion:
Step 1: Select your favorite pure beef burgers (make them yourself, or buy the best frozen ones you can find) and hamburger buns (white bread). Step 2: While the beef burgers are still frozen, marinate one (or both) sides with tabasco sauce. the sauce will stay put as it freezes directly on the surface. Step 3: The burgers should then be grilled. Step 4: Meanwhile, heat oil in a medium skillet. Step 5: Add onions or shallots and garlic, oregano, thyme, salt, pepper, and cook 10-15 minutes until onion is slightly carmelized.push aside.", 
"when almost done, put 2 thick slices of (preferrably) real greek feta-cheese (you can select any brand of feta here, depending on taste and availability). let the cheese fry with the onions for the last couple of minutes. before putting the feta on the burger, cover it with a few thin slices of onions and garlic.

prompt: How do I make Sour Cream Cupcakes?

Step 3: Sift the flour, salt,  cream of tartar, and mace together. Step 4: Mix with the first mixture and  beat together. Step 5: Bake in a greased cupcake pan or you can use foil  wraps at 400° for 15 - 20 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Collections (4) Tapioca?
completion:
Step 1: Mix the egg yolk with a little bit of the milk in a saucepan. Step 2: Add the  rest of the milk, tapioca, sugar, salt, water, and coffee. bring it  to a boil over direct heat until tapioca  is clear. Step 3: Stir constantly to  avoid sticking. Step 4: Remove from heat. add the stiffly beaten egg whites  and fold into the hot mixture. add vanilla into mixture and fold  again. Step 5: Cool. Step 6: Pineapple tapioca 2 1/2 cups of crushed pineapple (keep juice) 1/4 cup of minute tapioca 1/3 cup of sugar 1/8 tsp salt. mix all ingredients into a double boiler.", 
"cook for 20 minutes or  until the tapioca is clear. Step 7: Chill and serve. indian tapioca pudding 1/3 cup of minute tapioca 1/4 cup of all purpose corn meal 1 quart of milk, scalded 1 cup of dark molasses 1/2 tsp salt 2 tbsp butter 1 1/2 cups of cold milk combine tapioca, corn meal, and put it into the scalded milk. Step 8: Cook  until tapioca is clear--stirring constantly so it will not stick or  burn. Step 9: Add the molasses, salt, and butter. Step 10: Pour into a well greased  baking dish. Step 11: Add the milk and do not stir.", 
"bake in oven at 350* for 1  hour. Step 12: Serve with whipped cream. Step 13: Also great with dried fruit, fresh  fruits, or an assortment of nuts. Step 14: Princess  pudding 1 cup of minute tapioca 3 1/2 cups of boiling water 1/2 cup of sugar 1/2 pint of tart jelly 1/2 tsp salt cook the tapioca in the water with sugar and salt until it is clear  and has \"jellied\". Step 15: Add the jelly and stir until dissolved. Step 16: Chill and  serve cold. Step 17: Can be served with whipped cream or a soft custard.

prompt: How do I make Tapioca Cream?
completion: Step 1: Beat the egg white until stiff. Step 2: Add the tapioca to the milk in a double boiler. Step 3: Cook until tapioca is transparent, stirring frequently. Step 4: Add half the sugar to the milk and half to the egg yolk, lightly beaten. Step 5: Add salt to the egg mixture. Step 6: Pour hot mixture slowly over the egg mixture. Step 7: Return to the double boiler and cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Step 8: Fold in the stiffly beaten egg white. Step 9: Serve very  cold.

prompt: How do I make Tapioca Custard Pudding?
completion: Step 1: Add the tapioca to the milk and cook in double boiler for 30 minutes. Step 2: Remove. to the sugar add the salt and eggs. Step 3: Pour this mixture slowly  over the hot mixture. mix into a buttered pudding dish. Step 4: Add the  butter to this mixture. put the pan in really hot water and bake in oven at 325° over for 30 minutes. Step 5: Great with crushed or whole fruits  and berries.

prompt: How do I make Marinated Vegetable Salad?
completion: Step 1: Boil water, vinegar, salt and dry mustard for 1 minute. Step 2: Cool; stir in remaining  dressing ingredients. Step 3: Chill. Step 4: Toss salad ingredients with cold dressing; cover  and chill several hours.

prompt: How do I make Baked Orzo and Greek Cheese?
completion: Step 1: Cook orzo in a large pot according to package directions until al dente. drain  and set aside. preheat oven to 350 degrees and lightly oil a 1 1/2 quart oven  proof casserole. transfer orzo to a large mixing bowl and add, cream, oil. Step 2: Feta  and dill. Step 3: Mix well. Step 4: Seas  on with salt and pepper. Step 5: Transfer orzo mixture to  prepared casserole, sprinkle top with kasseri, and bake until heated through,  about 40 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Breasts Stuffed with Feta and Spinach?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees, wash and dry chicken. Step 2: Cut a horizontal pocket in  each breast taking care not to pierce the top, bottom or sides. Step 3: In a small bowl combine spinach an d feta and mix well. Step 4: Fill pockets in chicken breasts with feta mixture and secure with toothpicks. Step 5: Place in a glass or ceramic baking dish. Step 6: Mix together lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper and pour over chicken. Step 7: Marinate 30 minutes, turning once. Step 8: Season chicken with salt and pepper and broil until  golden, about 15 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Mom's Excellent Creamy Cauliflower Soup?
completion:
Step 1: Salt to taste in a large stock pot, saute onion, garlic, celery, and carrots till tender. Step 2: Add stock or water to pan with potato cubes, cauliflower and banana pepper. Step 3: Bring to a boil and simmer for 20 minutes, or till vegetables are tender. Step 4: At this point, add seasonings, except salt. taste for heat, and if ok, remove banana pepper now. Step 5: If you like it hotter, leave till desired heat is achieved, remembering that reheating the soup will make it hotter each time. next, add the milk and heat to a slow simmer.", 
"now, add the cheese. i use 1-2 cups of velveeta, and or sharp cheddar cheese shredded, and  stir in until melted. Step 6: Now salt to taste and serve. Step 7: Notes : if a banana pepper is unavailable, use crushed red pepper flakes. Step 8: I also add shredded sharp cheddar cheese with the velveeta. Step 9: I also like the caraway flavor and add more than my mom does.

prompt: How do I make Twice Baked Potato Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Spread potatoes in greased shallow casserole dish. Step 2: Top with sour cream, cheese,  bacon and onions. Step 3: Casserole may be covered and refrigerated up to 24 hours, if  desired. Step 4: Bake uncovered in 350°f oven for 30 minutes or until hot.

prompt: How do I make Mississippi Mud Pie & Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Melt margarine and cocoa. Step 2: Add sugar, vanilla and salt.  beat eggs inches. Step 3: Add flour and nuts. Step 4: Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan at  300 degrees for 30 minutes. Step 5: While hot spread on 1 jar marshmallow  cream and then icing. Step 6: Icing:  1/2 cup melted margarine  1/2 cup cocoa  1 box powdered sugar  1/3 cup milk  1 teaspoons. Step 7: Vanilla  swirl with scraper to look like mud. Step 8: Mississippi mud cake  4 eggs  1 cup butter  2 cup sugar  1 teaspoons vanilla  1 1/2 cup flour  1/4 cup cocoa  dash of salt  1 cup chopped walnuts  1 jar marshmallow cream.", 
"in a large mixing bowl, with mixer at medium speed, beat eggs, butter, sugar and  vanilla until light and fluffy, scraping sides of bowl. Step 9: Add flour, cocoa and  salt. beat just until well blended. Step 10: Fold in walnuts; spread batter evenly into 9  x 13-inch pa  n. Step 11: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Step 12: After baking, immediately place drops  of marshmallow cream onto cake and let cool on rack. Step 13: Spread until smooth; let  cool on wire rack before frosting. Step 14: Frosting for mississippi mud cake:  1/3 cup butter  1/2 cup cocoa  1/3 cup milk  1 teaspoons vanilla  2 1/2 cup confectioners sugar.", 
"combine all ingredients; mix until light and fluffy. Step 15: Frost cake and chill.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Scarpariello?
completion: Step 1: Season chicken with salt and pepper and let sit a few minutes heat butter and  olive oil in a large frying pan on med/low heat. add garlic and saute just until garlic softens, do not brown. Step 2: Add chicken and saute until lightly browned. Step 3: Add  mushrooms and saute about 3 minutes add all other ingredients except wine and  saute about 3 or 4 minutes. Step 4: Add wine and simmer for about 5 minutes or until  chicken is cooked through and sauce thickens slightly

prompt: How do I make Miracle Pie ( Impossible Pie)?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Literally throw all ingredients into the blender. Step 3: Use the \"mix\"  cycle. Step 4: As it is all mixing, lightly butter and flour coat a pie  pan. Step 5: Pour mixture into the pan and bake for 40 -45 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Lemon-Sour Cream Pie?
completion: Step 1: In a heavy saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch, lemon rind, lemon juice and  egg yolks and milk. Step 2: Cook  on medium heat until thick, stirring constantly. Step 3: Add   butter  and let mixture cool to room temperature.  stir in sour cream and pour  filling  into pie shell. Step 4: Cover with whipped cream. Step 5: Store in refrigerator. Step 6: \"from simple meals (lively50)\"                                     - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

prompt: How do I make Old Fashioned Potato Dumplings?
completion: Step 1: Mix all ingredients together to form a soft dough. Step 2: Drop by tablespoon  full into a slightly salted boiling water. Step 3: Cover and boil until light and fluffy (approximately 12 minutes). Step 4: Do not lift lid or they will fall and  turn out doughy.

prompt: How do I make Good Ol' Pumpkin Pie?
completion: Step 1: Combine sugar, spices and flour. Step 2: Add all other ingredients and beat until smooth. Step 3: Pour into unbaked pie shell. Step 4: Bake at 400 for 15 minutes. Step 5: Reduce oven temperature to 350 and bake another 45 minutes or until knife blade comes out clean when inserted in center of pie.

prompt: How do I make Cucumber Lemonade?
completion: Step 1: Make a pitcher of your favorite lemonade. Step 2: Grate the cucumber over the pitcher, and mix in the cucumber juice and pulp. Step 3: Serve over ice.

prompt: How do I make Old Fashioned Crumb Cake?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375f and grease an 8\" baking pan; line pan with parchment paper and lightly oil. Step 2: Mix shortening, sugar, and 2 cups of flours until it is crumbly and  fine. Step 3: Reserve 3/4 of this mixture and set off to side. Step 4: Sift the rest  of the flour and add to it the baking powder, cinnamon, and salt. Step 5: Combine the crumb mixture. Step 6: Add the egg and milk, mixing well. Step 7: Pour  into prepared pan. Step 8: Take the reserved crumbs and sprinkle it on top of the cake. Step 9: Bake in oven for 35 - 40 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Feta Cheese Spread?
completion: Step 1: Beat cream cheese, feta cheese and sour cream until  fluffy. Step 2: Add chopped green onion and garlic salt. refrigerate,  covered, several hours. Step 3: Garnish with additional green onion.

prompt: How do I make Pear Bread?
completion: Step 1: Cream butter, gradually beat in sugar. Step 2: Beat in eggs,  one at a time. combine dry ingredients. Step 3: Add to egg mixture  alternately with yogurt. stir in pears and vanilla. Step 4: Pour into  buttered loaf pan. Step 5: Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Step 6: Freezes well. Step 7: Excellent for mini loaves.

prompt: How do I make Mallow Sweet Potato Balls?
completion: Step 1: Season mashed sweet potatoes and add melted   butter. Step 2: Mold sweet potatoes around the marshmallows forming 8 balls  with a marshmallow in the center of each. Step 3: Beat egg and add  cold water. Step 4: Dip sweet potato balls in egg and then in the  crushed cornflakes. Step 5: Place in a greased pan and bake until  crisp at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Breakfast Souffle?
completion: Step 1: Put hash browns (slightly thawed), flour and green pepper in greased 9-x13-inch pan. Step 2: Brown meat and add rest of ingredients. Step 3: Pour in pan. Step 4: Refrigerate overnight. bake at 350 for 1 hour.

prompt: How do I make Blueberry Muffins?
completion: Step 1: In large bowl, combine bran, flour, sugar, baking powder and baking soda. Step 2: In  another bowl, mix together eggs, buttermilk, oil and molasses. Step 3: Pour egg mixture  into bran mixture and stir to moisten. Step 4: Do not overmix. Step 5: Fold in blueberries. Step 6: Spoon batter into nonstick or paper-lined large muffin tins, filling almost to  top. Step 7: Bake at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until firm to the touch.

prompt: How do I make Mallow Topped Sweet Potatoes?
completion: Step 1: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Step 2: Pour sweet potatoes in a 10x6\" (1 1/2 quart) baking  dish coated with cooking spray. Step 3: In a separate bowl, combine butter, orange  juice, brown sugar, salt and spices. Step 4: Mix thoroughly. Step 5: Pour mixture over sweet  potatoes. Step 6: Top with marshmallows. Step 7: Bake for 18-20 min. Step 8: Or until hot and  marshmallows are lightly browned.

prompt: How do I make Heavenly Chilled Orange Cheesecake?
completion: Step 1: Soften gelatin in juice. combine crumbs and butter. Step 2: Press into bottom of 9 spring form pan. Step 3: Bake at 350 f for 10 minutes. Step 4: Cool. Step 5: Stir over low heat until dissolved. Step 6: Combine cream cheese and sugar, mixing well on medium. Step 7: Gradually add gelatin. Step 8: Chill until slightly thickened, fold in whipped cream and peel. Step 9: Pour over crust. chill until firm. Step 10: Garnish with orange slices and fresh mint, if desired.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Livers in Black Bean Sauce?
completion:
Step 1: Trim livers, discarding any core part.  cut into 2cm pieces. Step 2: Place livers in a bowl with the soy sauce, sherry, salt, sugar, pepper and stock powder. Step 3: Marinate 5 minutes. Step 4: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and quickly cook the chicken livers over a high heat until almost cooked. Step 5: This is best done in two batches. Step 6: Transfer to a plate.  add the capsicum to the pan and cook 1 minute.  tear the large bok choy leave in halve lengthwise.  add all the leaves to the pan and sprinkle the livers on top.", 
"cover and cook 1 minutes. Step 7: Mix together the sauce ingredients and pour into the pan. Step 8: Toss until the sauce is hot and the bok choy has wilted and the livers just cooked. Step 9: Season with salt and pepper if wished and serve on noodles.

prompt: How do I make Home Fries?
completion: Step 1: Boil potatoes with jackets on until the fork goes in  fairly easily. Step 2: Peel potatoes after they cool. Step 3: Put small  amount of oil in skillet. slice and fry until brown.

prompt: How do I make Home Fried Potatoes?
completion: Step 1: Press potatoes between paper towels; sprinkle with seasonings. Step 2: Heat  drippings in heavy skillet; add potatoes. Step 3: Cover and cook over low heat 5  minutes. Step 4: Remove cover and fry over medium heat for about 20 minutes,  turning to brown evenly.

prompt: How do I make Home-Fried Potatoes?
completion: Step 1: Peel and cube potatoes. Step 2: Cook in oil in covered skillet, turning often  about 5 minutes. Step 3: Add onions, salt and pepper to taste and continue to cook  over l  ow heat until potatoes are almost cooked, turning often. Step 4: Remove  cover and continue cooking until well browned and slightly crisped. Step 5: Serves  2 to

prompt: How do I make Sweet Potato Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350f and grease a 3 quart casserole. Step 2: Mix together mashed sweet potatoes, eggs, vanilla, butter, milk and coconut. Step 3: Pour into greased 12-inch round casserole. Step 4: For topping, mix together brown  sugar, nuts, flour and butter. Step 5: Crumble over the sweet potatoes (not too thick as it's sweet). Step 6: Bake for 25 to 35 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Grandma's Apple Muffins?
completion: Step 1: Prepare streusel topping by mix topping ingredients in small bowl until crumbly. Step 2: Set aside. Step 3: In large bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, soda and cloves. Step 4: Add apple and walnuts; toss to coat. Step 5: In small bowl, beat eggs with fork; beat in buttermilk and butter. Step 6: Add to flour mixture; stir just until blended. Step 7: Fill greased pans 2/3 full. Step 8: Sprinkle with streusel topping. Step 9: Bake in preheated 400 degrees oven until pick inserted in center comes out clean, 15 to 25 minutes for muffins, 30 to 35 minutes for 9-inch square coffee cake.

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Soup?
completion: Step 1: Peel and dice pumpkin and potatoes melt half the butter or margarine in a  saucepan and saute the onion until golden brown. Step 2: Add the diced pumpkin and  potatoes and milk.bring to a boil,reduce heat and simmer for about 40 minutes. Step 3: Sieve or puree in an electric blender. Step 4: Season to taste with salt and pepper. Step 5: Saute the leeks in the remaining butter or margarine. add to the soup with the  chicken stock.bring to a boil. Step 6: Reduce heat and simmer for five minutes. Step 7: Before  serving,stir in cream and chopped parsley.

prompt: How do I make Carrot Apple Casserole?
completion: Step 1: Cook carrots in boiling water until barely tender. Step 2: Do not overcook them because they are going into the oven. Step 3: Drain and mix the carrots and apples in a baking dish that has been lightly buttered. Step 4: Combine sugar, cornstarch and cinnamon, sprinkle over the carrot and apple mixture. dot with the butter. Step 5: Pour the orange juice over all and bake 350: for about an hour. Step 6: This dish can be expanded very easily.

prompt: How do I make Cucumber Raita?
completion: Step 1: Combine cucumbers with yogurt in a bowl. Step 2: Fry cumin in a dry pan for 1 minute until fragrant, then add to yogurt mixture with the ginger. Step 3: Season with salt and pepper. Step 4: Place in a bowl and dust with paprika. Step 5: Serve chilled. Step 6: Can be refrigerated up to 2 days.

prompt: How do I make Chocolatetown Special Cake (Chocolate Cake)?
completion: Step 1: In small bowl combine cocoa and boiling water, set aside. heat oven to 350 degrees f. Step 2: Grease and flour 2 9-inch round pans. (don't use 8-inch pans or they will overflow!). Step 3: Cream shortening, sugar, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Step 4: Add eggs, beat well. Step 5: Combine flour, baking soda and salt; add alternately with buttermilk to creamed mixture. blend in cocoa mixture. pour into prepared pans. Step 6: Bake for 35-40 minutes or until they test done. cool and frost with a icing of your choice.

prompt: How do I make Dark Chocolate Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Heat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Grease and flour two 9 inch round baking pans or one 13x9 inch pan. Step 3: In large mixer bowl, stir together dry ingredients. Step 4: Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla; beat on medium speed for 2 minutes. Step 5: Stir in boiling water by hand (batter will be thin). note: i have tried it with 1/2 cup, 2/3 cup and 3/4 cup boiling water and we prefer it with less than 1 cup water. i usually use between 2/3 & 3/4 cups. the cake is still very moist but it doesn't seem to \"fall\" as much as it cools. this might have to do with our high humidity or brand of flour or other factors so i don't know if it will work for everyone.", 
"pour into prepared pan. Step 6: Bake 30 to 35 minutes for round 9-inch pans, 35 to 40 minutes for rectangular pan or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean. (do not use 8-inch pans or the batter will overflow.). Step 7: Because they have a tendency to overflow if you fill them more than 2/3 full, i usually get about 27-28 cupcakes per batch. bake for approximately 18-20 minutes. Step 8: Cool 10 minutes; remove from pan to wire racks. Step 9: Please note: baking cocoa isn't hot chocolate drink mix! baking cocoa contains no sugar and it is found on the baking aisle. chocolate drink mixes that you add to milk or water to drink will not work in this recipe.

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Pie Crunch?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°f. Step 2: Grease bottom of 13x9x2-inch pan. Step 3: Combine pumpkin,  evaporated milk, eggs, sugar, pumpkin pie spice and salt in large bowl. Step 4: Pour into pan. Step 5: Sprinkle dry cake mix evenly over pumpkin mixture. top with  pecans. Step 6: Drizzle with melted butter. Step 7: Bake at 350°f for 50 to 55 minutes or until golden. (check it early). Step 8: Cool completely. serve with whipped topping. refrigerate leftovers.

prompt: How do I make Chocolate Pumpkin Spice Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Step 2: Grease and flour a 10-inch bundt pan  or tube pan. Step 3: In a large heavy saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. Step 4: Remove from heat and mix in the sugar, pumpkin puree, vanilla, and eggs. Step 5: Add the baking powder and baking soda in pinches, breaking up any lumps  with your fingers. Step 6: Stir in thoroughly. Step 7: Stir in the salt, cinnamon,  ginger, cloves, nutmeg, and cocoa. Step 8: Stir in the flour, just until blended,  then the nuts and raisins. Step 9: Pour and scrape the batter into the pan.", 
"smooth the top. Step 10: Bake for 45 minutes. Step 11: Cool in the pan on a rack for 10  minutes. Step 12: Remove from the pan and cool on the rack for about 15 minutes  more. when cool, dust top with confectioners' sugar, if desired.

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Bundt Cake?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Step 2: Grease and flour a 10-inch bundt pan or tube pan. Step 3: In a large mixing bowl, mix the eggs with a large fork until well blended. Step 4: Mix in the sugar. Step 5: Add the oil in a steady stream, mixing all the while, until the mixture is thick and smooth. Step 6: Mix in the  pumpkin, vanilla, cinnamon, clove and salt. add the baking soda and baking powder in pinches, breaking up any lumps with your fingers. Step 7: Stir in thoroughly. Step 8: Stir in the whole wheat and all-purpose flours just until blended.", 
"stir in the walnuts. Step 9: Pour and scrape the batter into the pan and bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until a tester inserted in the center comes out clean. Step 10: Cool in the pan on a rack for 10 minutes. Step 11: Invert, remove the pan, and cool on the rack for about 15 minutes more.  (makes 10-12 servings)

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Roll?
completion:
Step 1: Line 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper and grease. preheat oven to 375°f. Step 2: In a large bowl, beat eggs and sugar with an electric mixer on high speed for five minutes. gradually mix in pumpkin. combine the flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon; stir into the pumpkin mixture. Step 3: Spread batter evenly into the prepared pan. bake at 375°f for 15 minutes. Step 4: After you take it out of  the oven sprinkle top with powdered sugar, and flip onto a dish towel. remove the waxed paper and sprinkle with more powdered sugar; roll up like a jellyroll in the dish towel.", 
"refrigerate for 1 hour or put in freezer for 15 minutes. unroll; spread filling on roll and roll again without the towel. Step 5: Place in container or reynolds wrap. refrigerate or you  may freeze for up to 4 months.

prompt: How do I make Lite or Light Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Muffins?
completion: Step 1: Mix first 5 ingredients together; separately, mix dry ingredients. Step 2: Blend the  two mixtures together, fold in chips. Step 3: Generously fill 24 greased or  paper-lined muffin cups. (i have found the paper liners don't work very well.). Step 4: Bake at 400 degrees f. for 16-20 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Pie Spice Bread?

Step 4: Pour into two greased 9-in. x 5-in. x 3-in. loaf pans. Step 5: Bake at 350 f for  60-70 minutes or until bread tests done. cool in pans 10 minutes before  removing to a wire rack; cool completely.

prompt: How do I make Zesty Punch Sipper?
completion: Step 1: "combine all ingredients in a large punch bowl or two large pitchers."

prompt: How do I make Cauliflower with Lemon?

prompt: How do I make Honey and Garlic Dressing?

prompt: How do I make Baked Apples in Maple Syrup?

prompt: How do I make Oatmeal Squares?

prompt: How do I make Veggie Dill Dip?
completion: Step 1: Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate for at least 1/2 hour. Step 2: Serve cold with cut up veggies.

prompt: How do I make Carrot Souffle?
completion: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°f. Step 2: Cook peeled carrots until soft. Step 3: Place in food processor;  add remaining ingredients and process until smooth. Step 4: Bake for about 30 minutes.

prompt: How do I make Carrot Casserole?

prompt: How do I make Holiday Carrot Salad?
completion: Step 1: Mix all ingredients together and chill for a few hours. Step 2: T  his is really good so different to the usual carrot salad.

prompt: How do I make Warr-Shu-Gai Almond Boneless Chicken?
completion:
Step 1: Prepare sauce:  in a small saucepan, stir together cornstarch and water until smooth. Step 2: Gradually stir in chicken broth, mushrooms (if desired), butter, soy sauce and bouillon granules. Step 3: Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring constantly. Step 4: Let boil 1 minute.  keep warm. Step 5: Prepare batter:  beat together cornstarch, flour, baking powder, egg and water until smooth. Step 6: Coat each piece of chicken with batter. Step 7: Pour vegetable oil into a large skillet or wok to the depth of 1/2 inch; heat to 375 degrees.", 
"cook coated chicken pieces in oil, turning once, until golden -- 5 to 7 minutes. Step 8: Drain on pa per towels. Step 9: Cut chicken diagonally into strips. Step 10: Reassemble strips in chicken breast shapes and place on a bed of shredded lettuce.  sprinkle with almonds and green onion. Step 11: Spoon sauce over chicken and serve immediately. Step 12: Makes four to six servings. Step 13: It's been some time since i last made this, but i recall that the batter seemed not quite the same, but the rest is authentic.  this can also be made with duck, in which case it becomes warr shu opp.

prompt: How do I make Chicken Soup?
completion: Step 1: Mince the chicken, mix in the tarragon, lemon zest and pepper. Step 2: Beat in the egg  white, form the mixture into small balls using your hands. Step 3: Place the butter,  flour, milk and crumbled stock cube in a saucepan, heat stirring until soup  boils, thickens and is smooth. Step 4: Add pepper to taste. drop in the chicken balls  and boil for 4-5 minutes. Step 5: Just before serving add watercress leaves to the  soup. Step 6: Serve hot with brown bread.

prompt: How do I make Four Grain Muffins?
completion:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400. Step 2: Lightly coat muffin tins with cooking spray, or insert with liners. Step 3: In a large bowl, stir together the all purpose flour, rye flour,  oat bran, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt until well combined. Step 4: Make a  well in the center of the flour mixture. in a small bowl, stir together the  milk, oil, and egg, then pour the mixture into the well of the dry ingredients. Step 5: Stir until just combined. Step 6: Spoon the batter into the muffin cups filling them 2/3 full. Step 7: Bake for 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes  out clean.", 
"let the muffins cool  in the pan for 5 minutes, then turn them out  onto a wire rack to cool.

prompt: How do I make Cheese Straws?
completion: Step 1: Sift the flour, mustard powder, salt and cayenne pepper into a bowl. Step 2: Cut the  butter into the flour and rub in until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Step 3: Add the cheese and mix the ingredients together. Step 4: Mix to a stiff paste with the  egg yolk and water. Step 5: Turn out onto a floured work surface. knead quickly until  smooth and crack-free.  wrap in a polyethylene bag or foil. Step 6: Chill for 30 minutes before using. Step 7: Roll out, cut into strips and place on a baking sheet.  bake at  200 c / 400 f / gas 6 for 15 minutes until golden brown.

prompt: How do I make Pumpkin Soup II?
completion: Step 1: Place the pumpkin, onion, turmeric, tomatoes, sugar, nutmeg and milk in a large  saucepan. Step 2: Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Step 3: Cool and  puree in a processor or blender. Step 4: Return to the rinsed saucepan. Step 5: Blend the  cornflour with a little yogurt.  add to the soup with the remaining yogurt.   bring to the simmering point but do not boil. Step 6: Serve garnished with parsley and  a swirl of yogurt.

prompt: How do I make Peanut Butter Pie?
completion: Step 1: Combine crust ingredients; press into a 9-inch pie plate. bake at 375* for 10 minutes. Step 2: Cool. in a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, peanut butter, sugar, butter and vanilla until smooth. Step 3: Fold in whipped cream. gently spoon into crust. garnish with chocolate or cookie crumbs if desired. Step 4: Refrigerate.

prompt: How do I make Hot Pepper Chicken Marinade?
completion: Step 1: Remove seeds from hot chili peppers (wear rubber gloves to do this) and finely chop peppers. Step 2: Combine peppers and remaining marinade ingredients in a small bowl. Step 3: Cover and refrigerate for 2 days to allow the flavours to blend. Step 4: Makes enough marinade for 8 boneless skinless chicken breasts.(~2 lbs). put chicken breasts in a closable plastic bag and pour in the marinade. seal bag and marinate overnight in the refrigerator. Step 5: Remove chicken from marinade and discard leftover marinade. grill chicken over medium heat for 5-7 minutes per side. makes 8 servings.

prompt: How do I make One-Pot Cabbage Soup?
completion: Step 1: Put bacon, potato, carrot, turnip and onion in a heavy saucepan. Step 2: Cover with cold water, bring to a boil and simmer very gently for 45 minutes. Step 3: Raise heat to a  bubbling boil and add beans. Step 4: After 5 minutes add peas. Step 5: After another 5 minutes  add cabbage. reduce heat and simmer a further 10 minutes. Step 6: Lift out bacon, cut  into small pieces and return to pot. taste for salt and season with pepper and  nutmeg. Step 7: Serve with good sourdough bread.

prompt: How do I make Coca Cola Brownies?
completion: Step 1: Combine flour and sugar in large bowl. Step 2: Heat butter, cocoa and coca cola to boiling point; pour over sugar mixture. Step 3: Mix buttermilk, eggs, baking soda, marshmallows and vanilla and add to mixture. mix well. batter will be thin. Step 4: Pour into a greased and floured 9x13-inch pan and bake 30 minutes at 375 degrees f. Step 5: Frosting: combine margarine, cocoa and coca-cola and heat to boiling. Step 6: Pour over sugar. Step 7: Blend with mixer until smooth; add nuts and vanilla. Step 8: Pour over cake while frosting is still hot. cool and cut into squares.

prompt: How do I make Cucumber and Cheddar Cheese Sandwiches?
completion: Step 1: Peel cucumber skin and cut thin round slices. Step 2: Spread butter or mayonnaise on two slices of baked bread. Step 3: Cut cheddar cheese into thin slices and place on of the slices until thoroughly covered. Step 4: Then place the thin slices of cucumbers on top of the cheese and add salt and pepper on top of the cucumbers only. Step 5: Place the second (buttered or mayonnaised) slice on top of the cucumbers and cut in half.

prompt: How do I make Decadent Apple Pie?
completion:
Step 1: Pastry for double crust pie-------------. Step 2: Combine flour, lard and salt with a pastry blender or fork until balls are the size of a large pea. Step 3: Add cold water by the spoonful and blend until the bowl starts to clean itself as you work the dough. Step 4: Then it is ready for rolling. Step 5: Preheat oven to 450°f. Step 6: Combine sliced apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and lemon rind. Step 7: Line pie plate with unbaked pie crust, trim pastry, crimp to edge of pie plate. fill pie crust with apple mixture and dot with softened butter.", 
"brush crust edge with  water and place pie crust top on top of pie, crimp to the bottom crust. make some slits in the top crust for steam to escape. bake for 10 minutes. Step 8: Turn oven down to 350°f and bake for 45 minutes longer.

prompt: How do I make Pineapple Freeze?
completion: Step 1: Place unopened can of pineapple in freezer until hard. Step 2: Then, place under hot running water for 30 seconds and remove from can. Step 3: Place in blender half at a time and blend to slush consistency.

prompt: How do I make Pineapple Milkshake?
completion: Step 1: In a food processor, combine pineapple, ice cream, milk, and cinnamon. Step 2: Process until smooth.

prompt: How do I make Applesauce Raisin Bars?

prompt: How do I make Nuts & Dried Fruit Mooncake?

prompt: How do I make Slow-Simmered Chicken?

prompt: How do I make Soft Flatbread - Mjukt Tunnbrod?

prompt: How do I make Herbed Pizza Crust?

prompt: How do I make Sour Cream Pecan Pralines?

Step 2: Melt the remaining cup of granulated sugar in a heavy bottomed pot, stirring constantly until it is caramelized. Step 3: Pour the mixed ingredients into the melted sugar at first slowly, stirring rapidly, so that it mixes with the sugar. Step 4: Then pour the rest of the mix in. Step 5: Much steam will be released in this process, so it is advised to wear a cooking mitten on the hand that is used to stir.", 
"cook without stirring until the mixture reaches a temperature of 250 f (midway between the softball and hardball stage.) to accurately measure the temperature, calibrate and adjust your thermometer for you elevation. Step 6: Place the thermometer in a pot of water and bring it to the boiling point. note the reading on your thermometer. Step 7: Apply the difference between the boiling point shown and the true boiling point of 112 f to the 250 f true praline temperature. if, for example, the thermometer shows the water boiling at 202 f, then subtract 10 degrees from the praline temperature of 250 f to get the reading of 240 f at which the praline syrup is done. add the cleaned pecans all at once. fold and mix the pecans into the syrup until thoroughly mixed.", 
"drop by spoonfuls onto oiled parchment paper or onto an oiled marble surface. if you wish to individually wrap your fresh pralines, use wax paper. Step 8: Do not use plastic wrap, as it will stick to the candy. Step 9: Notes:: * do not use \"lite\" or \"non-fat\" sour cream

prompt: How do I make Sour Cream Raisin Pie II?

prompt: How do I make Spotted Dick?

prompt: How do I make Stephen's Pork Chop Dinner in a Pan?
completion:
Step 1: Peel potatoes and julienne them i.e. cut into  slices about 1/8 - 1/4\" wide (i  use an old vegamatic slicer that  has a julienne setting on it. it makes the  whole job faster and  easier. Step 2: I usually cut the baker in half before putting  through  the vegamatic.) trim any fat from the chops and fry the  fat pieces in an electric skillet while it's preheating to 360  degrees(this greases the  bottom of the pan and makes  chitlin's - there is less fat on chops nowdays than in my dad's day, who  designed this dish.", 
"he used to serve them as appetizers to whomever was watching his kitchen wizardry. Step 3: Now there's just  enough to grease  the pan). brown the chops quickly on both sides. Step 4: Sprinkle liberally with   worcestershire sauce while doing this. Step 5: Turn heat down to 300°f. Step 6: Add enough hot water to cover the chops about 1/4 of the way up. Step 7: Now layer  the julienned  potatoes over the top of the chops. Step 8: Then add  enough more hot water mixed with  (oh, say a tablespoon)  worcestershire sauce to cover the chops about 1/2 way  up.", 
"pour directly  over the potatoes so they look a little brown from the   water/worcestershire mix. Step 9: Cover and leave for about 25-30 minutes. Step 10: When you return, flip the chops on top of the  potatoes. Step 11: The water should be  gone or almost, so you need to  add another 1/4-1/2 cup of hot water - enough to cover the  bottom of the electric skillet to keep the potatoes from  burning. Step 12: Cover again and lower heat to 250-275°f. Step 13: Leave  another 20 minutes. Step 14: Now switch the chops to the bottom of the  pan with potatoes layered above. the  potatoes may be quite  brown by this time and the chops should be getting softer and ready to  cut with a fork.", 
"add a little more water if needed. Step 15: If the   potatoes and chops still aren't done enough, just turn up the heat  and cook a  little more. drain all the juice from the can of sauerkraut  and spread over the potatoes. Step 16: Sprinkle liberally with brown  sugar. Step 17: Check often during the next 15  minutes to see when the  brown sugar melts. Step 18: Mix it around into the kraut and  potatoes  and flip  the chops around to get some too. Step 19: The dish is done when the  chops tear apart to a fork and potatoes are soft. i like the chops  falling  apart  and i have all the water cooked off.", 
"this dish serves two or more  depending on  appetites. Step 20: Serve with the kraut and potatoes mixed up together and add cold applesauce as a side. good summer dish because the  electric skillet  keeps the temperature down in the kitchen.

prompt: How do I make Beer Can Chicken?
completion:
Step 1: Place wood chips in bowl. Step 2: Pop tabs of each beer can, and make 2 additional holes in each top, using a church-key opener. Step 3: Pour half the beer from each can over the chips. Step 4: Add additional beer or water to cover the chips, soak them for 1 hour and drain. Step 5: Set up grill for indirect grilling. Step 6: Sprinkle 1 teaspoon barbecue rub in neck cavity and 2 teaspoons in main cavity of each chicken. Step 7: Add 1 tablespoon rub to each open, half-full can of beer. Step 8: (don't worry if it foams up.) season outside of each bird with 2 tablespoons rub.", 
"stand beer cans on work surface. holding each chicken upright, lower it over can so that can goes into main cavity. Step 9: Pull chicken legs forward to form a sort of tripod. Step 10: The chicken should sit upright over the can. Step 11: Carefully transfer chickens to grill in this same position, placing them in center over drip pan away from heat.    if using charcoal, toss half the wood chips on each mound of coals. Step 12: If using gas, place chips in smoker box.barbecue chickens until nicely browned and cooked through, about 1 1/2 hours, keeping temperature about 350 degrees f.", 
"(if using charcoal, replenish coals as needed.) the internal temperature of the birds (taken in thickest part of thigh)  should be 165°f. Step 13: Carefully transfer birds to platter in same position. Step 14: To carve lift bird off of can, and discard can. Step 15: You can use any seasoning on the birds and other flavorful liquids  - not just beer in the can. Step 16: You can use a can of coke or sprite. soda is more interesting than you might imagine. just be sure you open the can first.   opal fitzgerald quinlan, texas.

prompt: How do I make The Bottomless Chicken Soup Pot?
completion:

"let the meat cool until it can be handled. Step 5: Remove meat from bones. Step 6: Discard bones. Step 8: Stir in ingredients from recipe. cook, stirring, until done. add 2 cup shredded cooked chicken & heat through: Step 9: North boston: 2 (15 oz.) cans drained & rinsed white beans, 1 (8 oz.) can stewed tomatoes, 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, 1 teaspoons italian seasoning. serve with grated parmesan cheese.", 
"south miami:  2 (15 oz.) cans drained & rinsed black beans, 1/2 cup long grain white rice, 3 cup cubed winter squash, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoons dried thyme. serve with lemon wedges. Step 10: New orleans:  1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen cut okra, 1 (15 oz.) can stewed tomatoes, 1 (17 oz.) can whole kernel corn, 1/2 cup long grain white rice, 1 teaspoons dried thyme. top with crumbled crisp bacon. Step 11: Santa fe:  4 cup diced zucchini, 1 1/2 cup shredded carrot, 2 (15 oz.) cans drained & rinsed chick peas, 2 teaspoons chili powder, 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin. serve sprinkled with crushed taco chips.", 
"san francisco:  3 cup fine egg noodles, 2 cup frozen green peas, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoons ground ginger. just before serving, whisk in 1 beaten egg. sprinkle with sliced scallions. Step 12: Milwaukee:  4 cup cubed raw potatoes, 4 cup shredded cabbage, 1/2 cup diced smoked sausage, 1/2 teaspoons caraway seeds. serve sprinkled with chopped celery leaves & a little vinegar.

prompt: How do I make Tomato Sauce II?
completion: Step 1: Heat some olive oil (one or two tbs) on medium-low heat. Step 2: Add finely chopped onions until soft but not golden. Step 6: Let it simmer for 5 to 10 minutes, covered, then blend it thoroughly (you can do that in the saucepan with the appropriate blender), and let it simmer for at least 30 more minutes.
